job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

You will join a team with diverse backgrounds and skills including Java, Go and Python developers, data base experts and site reliability engineers.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for an enthusiastic intern with an interest in understanding how maps are constructed and the elements that comprise map data. This internship provides a valuable opportunity to gain insights into the development process used in large-scale systems, providing you with best practices and skills necessary for creating production-level applications. You will be on site and you will report to the Senior Engineering Manager based in Cluj.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will apply best practices to deliver high-quality code and contribute to the project quality.
  • You will work with map data and learn about scalable solutions tailored for map-making applications.
  • You will explore the development of JOSM plugins, expanding your technical expertise.
  • You will familiarize yourself with deploying and maintaining Java services using Azure, Kubernetes, and Docker.
  • You will use AI tools in your daily tasks to enhance productivity and new ideas.
  • Availability from July to October 2025, with a commitment of 8 hours daily.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Solid understanding of the Java programming language.
  • Grasp of OOP concepts.
  • Familiarity with backend API development or experience with Java frameworks.
  • Knowledge of unit testing and mocking frameworks.
  • Experience with SQL databases and Git version control.
  • Learner who stays informed about technological advancements and industry trends.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

In our Strategy and Analytics team, we are dedicated to applying data to drive strategic decisions for our Commercial and Support functions. We work with multiple teams and partners to provide comprehensive data insights that help us better serve our consumers and partners in the marketplaces across Southeast Asia.

Get to Know the Role

It takes a village to give a safe and delightful service to our customers. As things get more complex, "the village" needs experienced data analysts who can lift their head above the noise and guide us through data insights on what is best for our customers.

You will support data projects working with different teams across Grab with the purpose of giving our customers the best service in the world.

You will be directly reporting to the Data & Reporting Analytics Manager. You will be based onsite at our Ortigas office with flexible work arrangements.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Functional

  • You will independently assemble large and complex data sets that meet the business or analytical needs
  • You will build and deploy data models that help improve support experience
  • You will work with the Business or Operations Teams to understand their problem statements and conceptualize analytics frameworks that convert business problems into technical hypotheses
  • You will Design and recommend A/B testing to evaluate the model performance and provide interpretation of the experiment results, and provide data-driven recommendation
  • You will develop data insights and performance dashboards

Customer

  • You will have to be the radical advocate for our users on the quality of their experience with us above anything else
  • You will lead the charge: Influence and serve to deliver through others

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need:

  • You have at least 3 years of data analytics experience
  • You have project management skills - track record in executing and delivering projects independently
  • You can work with partners across several organization levels and several cultures
  • Experience of analytical tools such as Power Apps, PowerBI
  • You have knowledge in SQL to extract large disconnected datasets on Azure/AWS data platform
  • You have knowledge of data programming (Python, R)
  • You have familiar with User experience function and tools is good to have
  • You have familiar with startup environment and understanding of dynamics between design, engineering, product and customer service

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Tech for Good Institute (TFGI), founded by Grab, is an independent non-profit think tank focused on harnessing technology's positive impact in Southeast Asia. We foster dialogue and conduct research to address social concerns, driving positive transformation in the region. Learn more at www.techforgoodinstitute.org.

Get to Know the Role

Join us as a Digital Content and Engagement Intern, contributing to our mission of using technology for social impact. Gain valuable experience in digital marketing and content creation in a dynamic, fully on-site role.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will develop digital content strategies and manage social media scheduling.
  • You will create engaging content for social media, websites, and other digital channels.
  • You will collaborate on brainstorming ideas for digital campaigns.
  • You will design basic graphics for digital platforms.
  • You will analyse engagement metrics and prepare reports on campaign performance.
  • You will update the institute's website.
  • You will organise and promote virtual events and webinars.
  • You will research trends in technology for social good and digital marketing.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Undergraduate in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related fields.
  • Express ideas in writing and verbally, encouraging positive team interactions.
  • Proficient in social media platforms, content management systems, and graphic design tools.
  • Experience with analytics, data interpretation, and digital marketing through internships or volunteering.
  • Demonstrated interest in technology for social good and understanding of digital marketing trends.
  • Collaborative skills in team settings.
  • Knowledge of tech-driven social and economic issues in Southeast Asia.

Life at Grab

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Guided by The Grab Way and our four core values of Heart, Hunger, Honour, and Humility, we make a lasting difference for Southeast Asia by creating economic empowerment for everyone.

Job Description

Get to know the Team

The Singapore Operations team oversees, shapes and grows the business of Grab Singapore. You will sit within the Demand Optimisation & Analytics team of the Singapore Deliveries business, which supports all businesses in insights formulation, campaign analysis and pricing strategy. More specifically, the role will help support the growth of Grab's Omnicommerce business in Singapore.

Reporting to the Head, GrabExpress, Delivery Fulfilment & Demand optimisation, you will be part of a lean and agile team setup, collaborating closely with other departments to drive P&L growth and achieve key performance metrics. This role will be onsite and based in the One North office.

The Critical Tasks You will Perform

  • Generate insights to support growth of the SG Omnicommerce business, ensure that business plans are well strategized and positioned to achieve financial targets
  • Analyse our performance, campaign outcomes, user behaviour, and competitive landscape to generate actionable insights that drive decisions
  • Support experiments aimed at improving and finding product-market fit
  • Collaboration with internal and external stakeholders, ensuring alignment on objectives and deliverables.
  • Take ownership of key business metrics; manage weekly reporting to the relevant stakeholders.
  • Support and execute ad-hoc initiatives on short notice

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 2-5 years in Business Analytics, Strategy & Planning, Consulting. Sales Analytics experience a bonus
  • Structured thinking; able to derive clear, actionable insights from vague problems and complex datasets.
  • High ability to pivot quickly from long-term strategy to immediate tactical action.
  • Proficiency in excel (can perform complex functions) , data analysis, and PowerPoint; SQL/Python skills are a bonus.
  • Strong ability to collaborate across teams.
  • Experience in a tech company/startup and an entrepreneurial mindset a bonus

job_title: Senior Associate, SME and Consumer Lending
job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to know our Team: We are living in exciting times. Technology is reshaping how we live and we want to use it to redefine how financial services are offered - using data, technology and trust to solve problems and serve customers. We have big dreams to unlock financial inclusion for people in our region - especially for SMEs and entrepreneurs. If you have what it takes, help build our vision for socio-economic empowerment in South-East Asia (SEA). Our Objectives As a Team To research, design, and support the building, rollout, and commercialization of Lending products across our regional markets. Perform in-depth analysis on lending performances across markets and provide actionable insights. Assist in managing partnerships that help expand market access, acquire capabilities or drive commercialization of products. Share knowledge and support countries to replicate products, launch new initiatives within local markets or identify and close new partnerships. Drive growth, engagement and retention of users of Grab platform across Lending products The Day-to-day Activities Business analysis and insights Design market intelligence metrics and performance measurement dashboards to monitor ongoing performance of Lending's portfolio of businesses Conduct in-depth market research/competitor analysis across both SME and Consumer portfolios to provide team with key growth insights Own the day to day monitoring of key lending metrics, highlight areas of strength and improvement and independently drive changes working with the country teams Assist segment heads (SME and Consumer) in periodic review and reporting of business performance (e.g. Exco level documents) Business owner support - SME and Consumer Lending Work closely with the SME and Consumer Lending segment leads to rollout products and partnerships across markets, collaborating with country teams. Assist with inputs into product development via a keen grasp of business imperatives and a clear understanding of technology and regulatory framework's possibilities and/or limitations. Support and execute key strategic projects, from identifying issues, gathering information from various sources, analyzing data, and interpreting patterns and trends with the purpose of generating insights about the market. Travel occasionally to support our colleagues across the region Qualifications The Must-Haves More than 4+ years of experience in a commercial or analytical role, preferably within financial services, consulting, or a related field. Strong analytical skills with experience in SQL is a plus. Clarity of thought, sharp analytical ability, effective problem-solver. Can do both strategic thinking and effective execution. Ability to construct and deliver clear presentations to senior company executives. Strong skills with Excel/PowerBi for data analysis, including using Pivot Tables. Intelligent, motivated self-starter with strong interpersonal skills and work ethic. High levels of adaptability, comfortable with ambiguity and working in a VUCA (Volatile, Uncertain, Complex & Ambiguous) environment. Experience in supporting complex, cross-functional projects. Ability to empathize and collaborate with stakeholders across functions and at all levels of experience. Preferred Qualifications Understanding of finance and experience in SME and consumer lending portfolios. Experience in risk strategy and decision analytics will be highly beneficial. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know our Team:

We are living in exciting times. Technology is reshaping how we live and we want to use it to redefine how financial services are offered - using data, technology and trust to solve problems and serve customers. We have big dreams to unlock financial inclusion for people in our region - especially for SMEs and entrepreneurs. If you have what it takes, help build our vision for socio-economic empowerment in South-East Asia (SEA).

Our Objectives As a Team

  • To research, design, and support the building, rollout, and commercialization of Lending products across our regional markets.
  • Perform in-depth analysis on lending performances across markets and provide actionable insights.
  • Assist in managing partnerships that help expand market access, acquire capabilities or drive commercialization of products.
  • Share knowledge and support countries to replicate products, launch new initiatives within local markets or identify and close new partnerships.
  • Drive growth, engagement and retention of users of Grab platform across Lending products

The Day-to-day Activities

Business analysis and insights

  • Design market intelligence metrics and performance measurement dashboards to monitor ongoing performance of Lending's portfolio of businesses
  • Conduct in-depth market research/competitor analysis across both SME and Consumer portfolios to provide team with key growth insights
  • Own the day to day monitoring of key lending metrics, highlight areas of strength and improvement and independently drive changes working with the country teams
  • Assist segment heads (SME and Consumer) in periodic review and reporting of business performance (e.g. Exco level documents)

Business owner support - SME and Consumer Lending

  • Work closely with the SME and Consumer Lending segment leads to rollout products and partnerships across markets, collaborating with country teams.
  • Assist with inputs into product development via a keen grasp of business imperatives and a clear understanding of technology and regulatory framework's possibilities and/or limitations.
  • Support and execute key strategic projects, from identifying issues, gathering information from various sources, analyzing data, and interpreting patterns and trends with the purpose of generating insights about the market.
  • Travel occasionally to support our colleagues across the region

Qualifications

The Must-Haves

  • More than 4+ years of experience in a commercial or analytical role, preferably within financial services, consulting, or a related field.
  • Strong analytical skills with experience in SQL is a plus.
  • Clarity of thought, sharp analytical ability, effective problem-solver. Can do both strategic thinking and effective execution.
  • Ability to construct and deliver clear presentations to senior company executives. Strong skills with Excel/PowerBi for data analysis, including using Pivot Tables.
  • Intelligent, motivated self-starter with strong interpersonal skills and work ethic.
  • High levels of adaptability, comfortable with ambiguity and working in a VUCA (Volatile, Uncertain, Complex & Ambiguous) environment.
  • Experience in supporting complex, cross-functional projects. Ability to empathize and collaborate with stakeholders across functions and at all levels of experience.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Understanding of finance and experience in SME and consumer lending portfolios.
  • Experience in risk strategy and decision analytics will be highly beneficial.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team Grab's lending business, Grab Financial Services Asia (GFSA), focuses on providing microcredit to under-served communities. The GFSA team combines talent from its Regional Hub in Singapore with deep local market operators. We aim to build a team with the best mix of business drive, industry expertise, and local market knowledge. The GFSA team handles all aspects of lending, from conceptualization to ongoing management in its focus markets. The Country Credit team sets and executes credit risk management policies, working closely with the Country Head and Regional Credit Risk team to use data and technology in risk management. Get to Know the Role We're looking for a Risk Associate who will manage and structuring of the internal and external data, automating the credit risk assessment processes, and developing dashboards to monitor portfolio risk performance. You will report to Head of Lending, and work onsite at the Grab Malaysia office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will develop and implement an end-to-end credit framework and policies for the Driver and Consumer segments in collaboration with the regional credit team. You will manage credit risk operations and create a credit whitelist using alternative data to enhance credit models for the MEX segment. You will establish and refine credit models, uncover insights, and collaborate with lending and collections teams to optimize the lending portfolio. You will work with external agencies like RAMCI and Experian to improve credit processes and operational efficiency. You will monitor credit performance, identify underwriting weaknesses, and adapt to new methods for business growth. You will coordinate with cross-functional teams to develop data-driven strategies, credit policies, and collection strategies while minimizing credit loss. You will design and implement performance dashboards to provide senior management with actionable insights for decision-making. Qualifications The must haves: You have a Bachelor's degree, preferably in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Finance, Risk Management, or a relevant background. You have 5+ years of relevant work experience in credit policy and credit analytics. You can conceptualize and build credit scoring using non-conventional alternative data. You have technical expertise regarding data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques. You are fluent with SQL, Python, R or other tools for statistical analysis. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. The work you do in the PDW team will have an amplifying impact on Grab as it improves thousands of Grabbers who work together to unlock the potential of Grab to drive hundreds of millions to economic empowerment and prosperity. Building on our robust data platform, we're now focused on translating its power into tangible impact. We're developing a web application platform to create a dynamic data product experience, transforming the PDW's solid data foundation into interactive applications that deliver actionable insights to our internal stakeholders. Get to Know the Role As a Full-Stack Data Engineer Intern, you'll be involved in the entire lifecycle of our data product platform. You'll work closely with the team to design, develop, and deploy user-facing applications that seamlessly integrate with our data pipelines. This includes building interactive front-end interfaces using React, developing robust back-end APIs in Python, and ensuring seamless data flow from our PDW to our applications. You'll contribute to the automation of manual tasks, improve the user experience, and help maintain our AWS infrastructure. You will work in Petaling Jaya and working onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Develop and maintain interactive front-end applications using React, focusing on data visualization and user experience. Build and maintain back-end APIs using Python to serve data to the front-end applications. Integrate front-end applications with data pipelines and the PDW, ensuring seamless data flow. Maintain our AWS infrastructure using Terraform, focusing on deploying and scaling our data product platform. Work on the automation of manual tasks across the full-stack development lifecycle. Work closely with the team to troubleshoot issues and propose effective solutions across both front-end and back-end components. Contribute to the CI/CD pipeline to ensure efficient deployment of new features and updates. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Your studies as an Undergraduate in Software Engineering or Computer Science. Proficiency in React and JavaScript for building dynamic user interfaces. Proficiency in Python for building back-end APIs and data processing scripts. Experience using SQL for data querying and manipulation. Some familiarity with AWS infrastructure and Terraform. Understanding of data platforms and pipelines. Understanding of implementing automation and workflows of manual tasks. A desire to create data driven user interfaces. A basic understanding of API design. EPF (Employees Provident Fund) or SOCSO (Social Security Organization) where applicable. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

GrabFin Analytics team supports the GrabFin product and business organisations, across Payments Core, Payments Experience, Lending, Insurance, and Kios. Our team is focused on understanding user experiences and partnering with Business, Product, Design, and Tech teams to achieve the right outcomes. We are integral to product development, from understanding user journeys with UX designers, to developing hypotheses, through to post-rollout optimisation.

Get to Know the Role

You will use data to understand user needs and be the de-facto Voice of the Customer (users, driver-partners, merchants, agents) across GrabFin's suite of products. You will leverage data to unveil insights to help launch our products. You will provide thought leadership and generate data-driven hypotheses to solve key Product and Business problems, and drive our GrabFin strategies forward. You will report into Senior Analytics Manager, GrabFin Regional and work onsite in Grab Jakarta South Quarter office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will partner with product, design, and engineering teams to derive insights, design experiments, and drive key product decisions.
  • You will support strategic plans with data insights, performing deep-dives into user behaviour, segmented views and product efficacy.
  • You will provide tailored analysis for specific products and strategies, define critical business and product metrics, and make regular recommendations for continuous improvements.
  • You will design, measure, and recommend A/B tests and multivariate experiments, including layout optimisation, UI/UX efficacy, algorithm effectiveness, and API performance.
  • You will analyse clickstream and transactional data to uncover insights on user behaviour and drive product metrics. You will manage instrumentation for all feature releases within assigned tech families within GrabFin.
  • You will develop self-serve solutions for stakeholders that are scalable and automated to handle a product environment. You will drive plans involving Large Language Models or Generative Artificial Intelligence.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 1+ years of experience in Analytics, Business Intelligence, or Data Science, in a Tech (FinTech or E-Commerce) company.
  • You have a Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Analytics, Economics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields.
  • You are proficient in writing advanced SQL queries and querying large relational databases.
  • You have hands-on experience with data analysis and programming tools such as Python or R.
  • You are experienced in data visualisation platforms like PowerBI or D3.js to present findings.
  • You have experience designing, running, and analysing A/B tests and product experiments, with knowledge of hypothesis testing and the basic principles of Design of Experiments (DoE).

Additional Information

Life at Grab

  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Technical Infrastructure team at Grab is a collective of product managers, software engineers, and program managers focused on enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of Grab's Technology and Data platforms, serving millions of users daily. These platforms encompass Experimentation, Data Discovery and Catalog layers, Metrics Engine, Customer Data Platform, Streaming Platforms, and Machine Learning Platform. Our mission is to build and maintain a suite of tools and platforms that enable Grabbers to work smarter, faster, and more collaboratively.

Get to Know the Role

We're looking for a Principal Product Manager to join our Technical Infrastructure team, specifically focusing on Data Platforms. In this role, you'll collaborate with engineering, data science, analytics, and product teams to pinpoint areas for improvement and develop impactful solutions. Data is crucial for high-quality, reliable decision-making & business-operations at Grab, and a necessary pre-requisite for any ML/AI applications. You'll work with cross-functional leaders across the company to drive organization-wide changes.

You will report to the Head of Product, Data Tech, and you will be based onsite at Grab's OneNorth Office in Singapore.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Define and execute the product strategy for one or more data platforms
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for improvement and develop tailored solutions.
  • Gather requirements, conduct user research, and prioritise the product backlog ensuring the team focuses on high-impact projects.
  • Establish strong relationships with internal stakeholders and deeply understand their needs and challenges.
  • Drive the adoption and onboarding of internal tools and data platforms, ensuring user engagement and success.
  • Oversee product launches and go-to-market activities for internal tools and data platforms.
  • Communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring the team's work is well-understood and well-supported.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Product Management: At least 6 years of experience, with at least 3 years in managing internal tools or data platforms.
  • Software Development Practices: Strong understanding of modern development practices and tools.
  • Analytical and Problem-Solving: Proficient in data-driven decision-making.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Ability to effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Technical Discussions: Comfortable engaging in high-level technical discussions and explaining topics to a non-technical audience.
  • User Research and Requirements Gathering: Skill in gathering requirements and conducting user research.
  • Project Execution: Experience in prioritizing backlogs to deliver high-impact projects.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Foundation Models
job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team At the AI Automation Team, we develop comprehensive automated ML/AI solutions designed to tackle complex challenges within Grab's marketplace. Our focus areas include experiments, embeddings, recommendations, and large-scale marketplace optimizations. Get to Know the Role This is an applied research role aimed at developing foundation model solutions for Grab. You will report into the Senior Machine Learning Engineering Manager and work onsite at Grab One North Singapore office. You will also participate in on-call rotations, troubleshooting and resolving issues. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will design and implement training pipelines for foundation models and multimodal models and scalability. You will develop and optimize model architectures tailored to specific business uses and ensure deployment. You will create and apply model compression techniques such as quantization, pruning, and distillation to enhance model performance. You will establish evaluation frameworks to assess and ensure model quality, aligning them with team goals. You will stay up to date with the latest machine learning research, translating these insights into practical solutions for Grab's challenges. You will collaborate with different teams to understand their needs and incorporate foundation models into applications. You will contribute to code and design reviews to maintain high-quality engineering practices and standards. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need A Degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related fields with at least 5 years of experience in machine learning, with focus on deep learning and transformer architectures Proficiency in using PyTorch or TensorFlow for training large-scale models. Expertise in natural language processing or computer vision applications. Knowledge of distributed training frameworks like Ray and Deepspeed to facilitate scalable ML solutions. Experience with ML deployment platforms and MLOps to refine application processes. Apply foundational models and transformers to unique challenges beyond basic fine-tuning. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

At the AI Automation Team, we develop comprehensive automated ML/AI solutions designed to tackle complex challenges within Grab's marketplace. Our focus areas include experiments, embeddings, recommendations, and large-scale marketplace optimizations.

Get to Know the Role

This is an applied research role aimed at developing foundation model solutions for Grab. You will report into the Senior Machine Learning Engineering Manager and work onsite at Grab One North Singapore office. You will also participate in on-call rotations, troubleshooting and resolving issues.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will design and implement training pipelines for foundation models and multimodal models and scalability.
  • You will develop and optimize model architectures tailored to specific business uses and ensure deployment.
  • You will create and apply model compression techniques such as quantization, pruning, and distillation to enhance model performance.
  • You will establish evaluation frameworks to assess and ensure model quality, aligning them with team goals.
  • You will stay up to date with the latest machine learning research, translating these insights into practical solutions for Grab's challenges.
  • You will collaborate with different teams to understand their needs and incorporate foundation models into applications.
  • You will contribute to code and design reviews to maintain high-quality engineering practices and standards.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • A Degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related fields with at least 5 years of experience in machine learning, with focus on deep learning and transformer architectures
  • Proficiency in using PyTorch or TensorFlow for training large-scale models.
  • Expertise in natural language processing or computer vision applications.
  • Knowledge of distributed training frameworks like Ray and Deepspeed to facilitate scalable ML solutions.
  • Experience with ML deployment platforms and MLOps to refine application processes.
  • Apply foundational models and transformers to unique challenges beyond basic fine-tuning.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grab's Demand team (in which the Campaigns/Demand Ops sits) is the heartbeat of our organization to catalyze the company's consistent growth. We draw strength from our profound understanding of our customers' needs, and utilize this knowledge to tailor consumer journeys, promotions and services that cater incredibly well to them.From recommending delectable dishes tailored to our consumers' unique preferences, to offering promotions that are beneficial for our merchants, our team charts the growth path. Being a data-driven unit, we masterfully leverage information to yield actionable insights. Coupled with innovative marketing solutions, we aim to not only meet but anticipate and surpass our customers' expectations.

Get to Know the Role

This role provides an opportunity to drive significant impact. Primarily based at Grab's Jakarta Office, the successful candidate will assume a pivotal role in leading and executing improvements to the end-to-end processes of Demand initiatives throughout Indonesia. Responsibilities for this role extend beyond mere execution, encompassing the assurance of seamless and efficient end-to-end implementation and continuous refinement for enhanced overall promotional experiences. You will be reporting to Senior Manager, Demand Operations and based in Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Identify and implement process improvements to enhance operations efficiency and Merchant experience
  • Maintain, monitor and analyze campaigns participation data
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Regional and Country) in daily and project basis
  • Identify and escalate improvements needed related to Products
  • Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and develop action plans to address gaps
  • Operational excellence - drive continuous improvement initiatives within the demand ops function

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 2+ years of experience in campaign operations or project management
  • Excellent project management
  • Proficient to use tools like SQL, and PowerBI
  • Demonstrates a strong desire for continuous improvement
  • Strong strategic thinking skills with a focus on driving operational excellence

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favorite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Guided by The Grab Way and our four core values of Heart, Hunger, Honor, and Humility, we make a lasting difference for Southeast Asia by creating economic empowerment for everyone.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a Quality Assurance engineer to contribute to our internal tooling products used for our agents to serve Passengers, Drivers and Merchants. You will have opportunities to work on multiple backend service clusters as well as main frontend stacks. These services are the top entry points for Grab support with millions of visitors every day across seven countries in total. You will be based in HCMC office

You will report to the Head of Engineering

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Provide functional and regression level testing for iOS, Android, API, and Web Applications.
  • Build manual and automated functional and regression test cases as well as maintain automated Test Scripts.
  • Work with developers, product owners, test lead, engineers, and team members to identify areas and methods to help improve testing efficiencies and expand test coverage and increase product reliability.
  • Provide test estimates, record, report defects to depict the status of the sprint and system stability.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 3+ years experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer.
  • Understand testing methodologies and practices.
  • Develop Gherkin Syntax to build user scenarios.
  • Develop go/ Ruby / Javascripts/ Java Methods to automate Gherkin Syntax identified
  • Hands-on experience with Behavior Driven Frameworks (BDD), Selenium cucumber, Jbehave Serenity, Postman, testing Mobile apps, Web applications, APIs and UIs.
  • Maintain Page Object Model Framework for all products supported
  • Refactors Methods and Page Object Models to lead further testing efficiencies.
  • Familiar with Agile/Scrum

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Your Team

Come join the team that literally serves Grab - Grab's Sentry team. The systems we oversee process billions of network messages for Grab's consumers every day, without fail. We work closely with the infrastructure, security, and product teams, and are seeking talented engineers to join our platform team!

Your Role

You specialize in building, operating and maintaining leading edge solutions that Just Work™. Built on world-class technology stacks, the software you develop brings our unique on-demand services experience to South-East Asia every day — be it transport, payments, food, or "the awesome things to come". Millions of people depend on the stability and efficiency your solutions provide, which is demanding in terms of design and quality but also incredibly rewarding.

You will

  • build and own Grab's gateway systems, connecting millions of consumer devices with hundreds of backend services via Grab's service mesh.
  • You will report to Engineering Manager and work onsite at Grab's Viet Nam office in Ho Chi Minh City
  • be at home in a HA cloud environment and build scalable, zero-downtime network traffic routing and analytics solutions for Grab's "public edge", serving billions of daily requests from millions of Grab consumers and partners every day

Your Daily Routine

  • Independently drive projects across teams end to end, from inception to rollout
  • Find and troubleshoot issues in Grab's entire infrastructure and code base
  • Develop, maintain, and operate control- and data-plane components, and resolve production incidents
  • Implement quality solutions using Kubernetes, Go and C/C++, and maintain the high bar of standards for code reviews and deployment processes. You mentor peers and promote development and operational excellence best practices while achieving excellent user experience

Qualifications

  • have a very good understanding of TCP/IP, HTTP and the internet
  • 3.5+ year experience in at least one of Assembly, C, C#, C++, Go, Java, Pascal
  • know how to build highly-available distributed systems
  • Front-end experience is the plus.
  • are fluent in Bash, Python, and JavaScript, and have an understanding of common patterns and algorithms to confidently navigate 3rd-party code bases for debugging and troubleshooting

Your Advantage

  • HTTP/2. QUIC, and gRPC expertise
  • Dealing with massive concurrency and designing resilient algorithms
  • Experience with building monitoring and alerting systems
  • Hands-on experience with Terraform and large scale Docker / Kubernetes deployments
  • Experience with Consul and/or Envoy (envoyproxy.io), their code base, and their community
  • Experience in a startup
  • Familiarity with fullstack development, including frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js)
  • Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, etc.)
  • Experience with a relational database such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description Get to Know the Team The Retail Center of Excellence (COE) is a regional team driving GrabMart's growth. To help supermarket partners grow and support local teams with best practices and tools to succeed in their markets. The team meaningfully contributes in Grab's long-term success. Get to Know the Role As the Manager for Operational Excellence & Fulfillment, you are the "Get the Basics Perfect" expert. Your mission is to create a reliable, efficient, and trustworthy fulfillment engine for our partners. You will oversee all programs related to improving our core operational metrics, from ensuring real-time inventory accuracy to perfecting the in-store picking process. Your work is the foundation upon which our entire partnership strategy is built, directly improving customer satisfaction and trust. You will report to the Head of Retail COE and work onsite at Petaling Jaya office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Improve Fulfillment Reliability: You will lead regional programs to significantly improve key operational metrics, including Order Fulfilment Rate (OFR) and Item Fill Rate (IFR) with our partners. Scale Inventory Solutions: You will own the playbook for integrating partner systems with Grab to ensure real-time inventory accuracy, minimizing order cancellations. Optimize In-Store Operations: You will develop and deploy best-in-class Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for in-store picking, packing, and hand-off, leveraging our Picker App to drive efficiency. Lead Partner Enablement: You will create and deliver training programs and materials to enable country teams and partners to adopt new operational processes and technologies effectively. Analyze & Improve: You will deep dive into operational data to identify the root causes of fulfillment issues and design scalable solutions to address them. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need You have 6+ years experience in e-commerce operations, retail supply chain, or logistics, with a strong focus on process improvement and operational excellence. You have demonstrated ability to develop and implement SOPs, playbooks, or operational frameworks across multiple locations or teams. You have experience working with operational technologies such as Warehouse Management Systems (WMS), POS systems, or picker applications. You are able use data analytics to objectively diagnose problems and measure the impact of your initiatives. You have excellent project management skills and the ability to manage complex, cross-functional initiatives from ideation to execution. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best.   • The Retail Center of Excellence (COE) is a regional team driving GrabMart's growth.
  • To help supermarket partners grow and support local teams with best practices and tools to succeed in their markets.
  • The team meaningfully contributes in Grab's long-term success.

Get to Know the Role

  • As the Manager for Operational Excellence & Fulfillment, you are the "Get the Basics Perfect" expert.
  • Your mission is to create a reliable, efficient, and trustworthy fulfillment engine for our partners.
  • You will oversee all programs related to improving our core operational metrics, from ensuring real-time inventory accuracy to perfecting the in-store picking process.
  • Your work is the foundation upon which our entire partnership strategy is built, directly improving customer satisfaction and trust.

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

You will be part of the Strategy & Planning team, responsible for driving Grab's mobility and deliveries business in Balikpapan. We use data to create strategy to best serve our drivers, merchants and consumers. Our Strategy & Planning team is made up of Grabbers of different backgrounds – business, statistics, computer science, and engineering – allowing us to have multiple perspectives towards business issues. If you are looking for an environment where you are empowered to solve business issues and lead high impact projects, then you should join our team!

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for Assistant Manager to be accountable for Grab's OKR in Balikpapan. You will oversee short- and medium-term strategy formulation, leads and ensures success of various projects by collaborating with cross-functional teams, and serves as an internal advisor for city teams. We believe a successful candidate has willingness to strive beyond the BAU (not fixated on "Business as Usual" activities) and strong team member management skills. If you believe you have what it takes then we'd love to hear from you! Reporting to Strategy & Planning Manager. You will be based onsite in Grab Balikpapan.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Create insights through data analysis, and provide recommendations to improve Grab's business performance accordingly
  • Monitor cities' performance regularly, identify potential issues and propose action plans
  • Lead different projects at once from end to end (initiate, plan, get team members' support, ensure timely and successful execution, evaluate results and iterate) - often self-sourced rather than directed
  • Explore and find improvement opportunities across business processes
  • Management reporting

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's / Master's degree from reputable universities
  • Minimum 2 years of work experience in data analysis, business strategy, project management and/or consultancy. Experience in digital business is preferable.
  • Excellent in Microsoft excel (can maintain complex spreadsheets), Microsoft PowerPoint (to create cohesive presentation), and Microsoft Word. Knowledge in tools like SQL, R, Python, Tableau, Power BI
  • Proven experience in convincing and getting team members' support for new ideas
  • Pays attention to small details to ensure quality is in place
  • Experience overseeing projects with different team members
  • Explain communication to deliver a clear, concise and consistent message to audiences of various backgrounds

Additional Information

Life at Grab

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team You will be part of the Demand Planning and GrabGifts team, reporting directly to the Senior Manager. The team works with team members across Grab Commercial Support teams- Sales, Marketing, and Finance. Together, the team deliver regional strategic execution to bring improvement across Grab's B2B ecosystem. Get to Know the Role We are looking for someone to lead our B2B expansion through two critical projects. You will play an important part in shaping growth, driving execution, and ensuring long-term success of Grab's B2B projects across the region. You will report to Senior Manager, GFB Demand Planning and GrabGifts and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

You will be part of the Demand Planning and GrabGifts team, reporting directly to the Senior Manager. The team works with team members across Grab Commercial Support teams- Sales, Marketing, and Finance. Together, the team deliver regional strategic execution to bring improvement across Grab's B2B ecosystem.

Get to Know the Role

  • We are looking for someone to lead our B2B expansion through two critical projects.
  • You will play an important part in shaping growth, driving execution, and ensuring long-term success of Grab's B2B projects across the region.
  • You will report to Senior Manager, GFB Demand Planning and GrabGifts and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will lead the China Client project
    • Develop the end-to-end go-to-market (GTM) strategy to launch and scale Grab for Business to the Chinese clients.
    • Cultivate a network of strategic partners, channel resellers, and important industry players to accelerate growth and market reach.
  • You will secure High-Value Strategic Partnerships
    • Identify, pursue, negotiate and secure large-scale, strategic partnerships that create Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) and align with our long-term vision.
    • Build data-driven, compelling business cases by combining market intelligence and internal capabilities to secure support and resource allocation for important projects.
Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have business fluency in both English and Mandarin Chinese
  • You have 7+ years of experience in strategic partnerships, business development, or a senior commercial role.
  • High-Stakes Negotiation: Experience leading complex negotiations and structuring high-value, win-win deals.
  • You have the ability to combine vast amounts of information (market data, competitive intelligence, internal dynamics) into strategy.
  • Commercial Experience & P&L Ownership: Experience managing a P&L or being directly accountable for revenue targets.
  • Mindset: Takes ownership and solves complex problems.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

More than 6 in 10 Southeast Asians are unbanked or underbanked today. GrabFin aims to change that by empowering everyone with simple, transparent, and flexible financial products. Some of our products & services include eWallet, lending, insurance, payments backbone & infrastructure, risk & compliance, rewards points & loyalty program.

Get to Know the Role

As the Software Engineer, Fullstack you will have opportunities to work on multiple backend micro-service clusters. It is very important that our team members to identify problems, and have the right mindset and skill sets to solve them. You will report to the Engineering Manager. This position will be onsite at Grab office Jakarta.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will design and develop solutions using Go language to enhance the availability, scalability, and efficiency of Grab's services.
  • You will collaborate with the engineering team to improve design and architecture focused on scale and performance.
  • You will conduct code and design reviews to maintain high development standards.
  • You will contribute to service capacity planning and optimize software performance.
  • You will work with product and experience teams to define and prototype feature specifications.
  • You will team up with the infrastructure department to build and scale backend services and investigate root causes of issues.
  • You will design, build, analyze, and troubleshoot large-scale systems.
  • You will debug and resolve production incidents during on-call shifts.
  • You will participate in interview processes to help recruit top industry talent.
  • You will provide technical guidance and mentorship to peers.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Backend Skills
    • 2+ years experience in software engineering with full stack web and distributed systems experience.
    • Good understanding in Golang, including core syntax, concurrency, and optimization techniques.
    • Strong grasp of algorithms, data structures, and system design.
    • Experience with distributed systems, streaming services, and queuing models.
    • Experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (DynamoDB, ScyllaDB).
    • Experience with site reliability including monitoring, capacity planning, and overseeing large-scale web services.
    • Familiar with networking protocols and system internals.
  • Frontend Skills (Bonus)
    • 1-2+ years of experience
    • Experience in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript.
    • Knowledge in frameworks like React, Vue.js, and Svelte.
    • Understanding of state management (e.g., Redux), progressive web apps, responsive design, and accessibility.
  • Full Stack & DevOps
    • Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and real-time data exchanges.
    • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
About Our Technology Stack

Our main services use Golang, integrated with Redis, MySQL, DynamoDB, Kafka, and Elasticsearch for data management. Services are orchestrated using Kubernetes and run on AWS cloud infrastructure. Our mobile apps support both iOS and Android platforms with a focus on native languages like Swift and Kotlin, while frontend technologies include Rails, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. GitLab and complementary tools like Jenkins and DataDog support our release pipeline.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description Get to Know the Team At Grab, the Market Insights team drives impactful data-driven decisions by uncovering insights about the region's users, merchants, and driver partners. By analysing vast datasets across transactional and behavioural activities, we bridge the gap between raw data science capabilities and actionable business strategies. Our work is pivotal in driving growth and enhancing the on-demand industry, always innovating through AI/ML integration for practical business applications. Get to Know the Role As a Lead Data Scientist (Analytics), your role involves implementing advanced machine learning systems to improve user engagement, merchant operations, and driver strategies. You'll be a technical leader and problem solver, able to deploy data models into production and guiding team members in the best practices for AI and machine learning applications. Your expertise will directly influence product decisions and shape Grab's competitive edge in the on-demand economy. You'll be part of an enthusiastic and collaborative team, reporting to the Head of Analytics - User & Market Insights at our One North Singapore office. The Critical Tasks You will Perform You Will Collaborate with engineers, product managers, marketing teams, and regional country teams to convert business challenges into machine learning solutions. Lead AI initiatives to enhance internal productivity, streamline workflows, and automate tasks within the User & Market Insights team. Analyze and interpret complex datasets of transactional, behavioural, and user interactions to uncover trends and actionable insights that inform growth strategies. Develop and productionise scalable machine learning models, ensuring solutions can handle large datasets while being adaptable to changing business requirements. Fine-tune and implement LLM-based use cases, customising pre-trained large language models for Grab-specific applications. Optimise ML frameworks and statistical methods, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and causal inference for robust modelling needs. Manage MLOps Lifecycles, automating processes from data preparation, evaluation, training, and serving models in production environments. Mentor team members, providing technical guidance and sharing knowledge to elevate the team's capabilities. Qualifications What Essential Skills You will Need You have a Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or other related fields. You have at least 7 years of experience in large-scale Machine Learning systems and at least 3 years in a senior or lead data scientist role. You are proficient in machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch) to implement and optimize predictive models and neural networks for ML tasks. You have experience designing and deploying fine-tuned LLMs to leverage large language models for tailored applications in enterprise scenarios. You have programming skills in Python and knowledge of MLOps lifecycle management to automate workflows and deploying models when working with large-scale datasets. You have big data processing expertise in Spark (or equivalent frameworks) You have statistical knowledge in causal inference or advanced methods You have end-to-end project management abilities from data collection to model deployment, including stakeholder alignment to bridge expectations with technical deliverables. As a Lead Data Scientist (Analytics), your role involves implementing advanced machine learning systems to improve user engagement, merchant operations, and driver strategies. You'll be a technical leader and problem solver, able to deploy data models into production and guiding team members in the best practices for AI and machine learning applications. Your expertise will directly influence product decisions and shape Grab's competitive edge in the on-demand economy. You'll be part of an enthusiastic and collaborative team, reporting to the Head of Analytics - User & Market Insights at our One North Singapore office.

The Critical Tasks You will Perform

You Will

  • Collaborate with engineers, product managers, marketing teams, and regional country teams to convert business challenges into machine learning solutions.
  • Lead AI initiatives to enhance internal productivity, streamline workflows, and automate tasks within the User & Market Insights team.
  • Analyze and interpret complex datasets of transactional, behavioural, and user interactions to uncover trends and actionable insights that inform growth strategies.
  • Develop and productionise scalable machine learning models, ensuring solutions can handle large datasets while being adaptable to changing business requirements.
  • Fine-tune and implement LLM-based use cases, customising pre-trained large language models for Grab-specific applications.
  • Optimise ML frameworks and statistical methods, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and causal inference for robust modelling needs.
  • Manage MLOps Lifecycles, automating processes from data preparation, evaluation, training, and serving models in production environments.

What Essential Skills You will Need

  • You are proficient in machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch) to implement and optimize predictive models and neural networks for ML tasks.
  • You have experience designing and deploying fine-tuned LLMs to leverage large language models for tailored applications in enterprise scenarios.
  • You have programming skills in Python and knowledge of MLOps lifecycle management to automate workflows and deploying models when working with large-scale datasets.
  • You have big data processing expertise in Spark (or equivalent frameworks)
  • You have statistical knowledge in causal inference or advanced methods
  • You have end-to-end project management abilities from data collection to model deployment, including stakeholder alignment to bridge expectations with technical deliverables.

Country Team Liaison: Act as a key point of contact for country teams, helping to address their inquiries and connect them with the right resources within the COE. You have excellent attention to detail, especially when managing documentation and preparing materials for executive-level stakeholders. You have experience using tools like Google Sheets or Excel (can perform complex functions) to analyze data and generate reports. You have prior experience in project management, business analysis, or operations support, which would be a strong advantage.
