  • As the Senior Associate for Partner & Program Support, your mission is to ensure the smooth execution of our strategic initiatives by supporting the COE managers and country teams.
  • You will be instrumental in managing our central repository of knowledge, coordinating key projects, and preparing materials for high-stakes partner meetings.
  • You are part of the organizational backbone that allows the entire COE to operate efficiently and scale its impact across the region.
  • You will report to the Head of Retail and work onsite at Petaling Jaya office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

You Will

  • Project Coordination: Support the planning and execution of key COE projects, tracking timelines, milestones, and dependencies across multiple workstreams.
  • Knowledge Management: Own and maintain the COE's central repository of playbooks, case studies, and training materials, ensuring they are up-to-date and easily accessible to country teams.
  • Partner Onboarding Support: Assist in the partner onboarding process by coordinating meetings, preparing materials, and tracking the completion of key launch tasks.
  • Performance Reporting: Help prepare regular performance reports and presentations for Joint Business Plan (JBP) meetings with our strategic partners.
  • Country Team Liaison: Act as a key point of contact for country teams, helping to address their inquiries and connect them with the right resources within the COE.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have a Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Engineering, or a related field, with at least 4 years of relevant experience.
  • You have excellent attention to detail, especially when managing documentation and preparing materials for executive-level stakeholders.
  • You have experience using tools like Google Sheets or Excel (can perform complex functions) to analyze data and generate reports.
  • You have prior experience in project management, business analysis, or operations support, which would be a strong advantage.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The GrabFood Cities team is looking for a new member to join us on our exciting journey to empower merchants and create economic opportunities while making life easier for all Thais. We are focused on consumer satisfaction and operates with great care. As a member of the team, you will help shape the future of GrabFood.

Get to Know the Role

As a member of the GrabFood Cities growth team, you will focus on enhancing GrabFood's demand growth by leading different projects. Your responsibilities will include collaborating with the merchant strategy, demand planning, marketing, marketplace, and operations teams to develop a cohesive go-to-market strategy. You will report to Head, Cities and will work on site in Bangkok Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Analytics: Extract live data to uncover insights and identify opportunities for business growth. Share findings with the manager.
  • Strategy: Provide valuable business insights, vision, and recommendations for business teams to implement.
  • Execution: Develop projects in collaboration with both internal and regional teams to create a significant impact and improve Grabfood to the next level.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 2 or more years of experience at management consultancy firm, tech, strategy or project management.
  • Able to ask structured questions to solve complicated problems. Turn questions into insightful answers and working plans.
  • Experience on project management or PMO skills.
  • Outstanding partner management, communications, and presenting.
  • Data analytics: Able to extract main insights from raw data and build recommendations for the team.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

As the Commercial Team Lead (Food), you will be required to:

  • Lead, develop, and inspire a high-performing account management team to drive deep engagement with existing and potential new F&B merchants.
  • Work with the team to achieve team performance as measured by deliveries, GMV and revenue, as well as forming stronger relationships with partners through collaboration in other Grab verticals such as GrabPay, GrabAds and GrabExpress.
  • Serve as a cross-functional leader and collaborate with different teams to deliver solutions and initiatives tailored to merchants’ pain points and growth objectives.

This role will report to the Head, Commercial, Managed Accounts (Food), and report onsite to Grab One North office.

The Day-to-day Activities

  • Work with the Head of Commercial (Food) on business development strategy.
  • Identify gaps and unlock opportunities with our F&B merchants to drive market share and revenue growth.
  • Motivate the team to meet or exceed targets specific to GMV, revenue and successfully execute cross-functional initiatives.
  • Support the development of strategic merchant relationships to ensure the partner is engaged and growing on the platform.
  • Strategize, identify areas of improvement and grow the portfolio based on data, analytics and best practices.
  • Continuously engage our F&B merchants and listen to their needs, collect and address feedback/ concerns put forward.
  • Monitor and report team performance and impact to leadership on a regular basis.
  • Develop, coach and mentor the team to enable them to excel and grow within their roles.
  • Build strong cross-functional working relationships with our Business, Operations and Marketing teams to ensure a best in class merchant experience.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business / Management or equivalent.
  • Passionate about people leadership with proven experience leading/hiring/building high performing teams.
  • Minimum 5-7 years of experience in account management, business development, partnerships or equivalent role, and with at least 2 years leading a team.
  • Experience in holding a target and being accountable for team attainment. Able to lead and mentor both high and low performers.
  • Able to manage conversations with C-level positions and senior stakeholders
  • Experience in F&B industry is a plus.
  • Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English. Strong proficiency in Mandarin is a plus.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to develop and maintain relationships with a wide range of personalities and teams.
  • Strong organizational and project management skills with the keen ability to multitask.
  • Demonstrated ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations.
  • Comfortable with managing data and able to perform analysis (e.g. to solve business problems).
  • Have a competitive edge and thrive in a team environment.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We are on a mission to transform the recruitment landscape, promoting strategic growth, transparency, and diversity. Our goal is to discover and onboard talent that resonates with our culture, are ready for today's challenges, and are equipped to help build tomorrow's innovations while providing unprecedented experiences for candidates, hiring managers and the talent acquisition team.

If this resonates with you, we invite you to join us and be a part of this dynamic change!

Get to Know the Role

As the Head of Talent Acquisition and People Experience Programs, you will shape and implement our talent acquisition and people experience strategies. You'll develop innovative programs, refine sourcing processes, and enhance our employer brand that attract, engage, and retain top talent. Collaborating with internal partners, you'll refine our sourcing processes, elevate our employer brand, and lead operational efficiency within the people function. You will . Reporting to our Head of People Experience & Talent Acquisition, you will lead a team to deliver outstanding outcomes and support for our growth. You will be based onsite in Grab's Petaling Jaya's office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Operations, Efficiency and Effectiveness

  • Support the short and long-term plans for the TA Operations team global operational systems, tools and processes across the organization including background checks, interview scheduling, screening and recruitment compliance.
  • Drive the implementation and optimization of recruitment technology and systems to refine workflows and improve overall recruiting performance.
  • Drive cohesive project planning and execution across the People Experience and Talent Acquisition teams.
  • Develop a cohesive content management strategy and maintenance for all knowledge articles on our intranet.
  • Develop and report on main performance metrics across the people organization, providing insights with recommendations to senior leadership.
  • Enhance recruiting processes and workflows to improve efficiency, reduce time-to-hire, and improve the candidate experience.
  • Establish and maintain best practices and standard operating procedures for recruiting, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements.

Talent Acquisition Strategy & Program Leadership

  • Lead the development of comprehensive talent acquisition programs and execution that align with our growth goals, talent needs, and organizational culture.
  • Drive a data-driven approach to talent acquisition by applying analytics and metrics to refine and improve sourcing strategies, candidate experience, and recruitment effectiveness.
  • Partner with senior leadership and hiring managers to understand hiring needs and ensure that recruitment programs are aligned with our goals.

Channel Strategy & Sourcing Optimization

  • Oversee the design, implementation, and optimization of multi-channel sourcing strategies to attract top-tier talent, including job boards, social media, referral programs, talent pipelines, and third-party partnerships.
  • Use technology and sourcing tools (ATS, CRM, AI) to enhance candidate engagement, improve processes, and build a sustainable pipeline of candidates.
  • Ensure the best sourcing strategies and meet hiring targets in the Talent Acquisition team.

Employer Branding & Talent Attraction

  • Collaborate with HR, Marketing, and Communications teams to refine and implement Grab's employer brand and talent marketing strategies, ensuring we are recognized as an employer of choice within the tech industry.
  • Manage the creation and distribution of content (social media, blogs, videos) to communicate our culture, values, and mission to attract top talent.
  • Develop partnerships with universities, industry organizations, and diversity groups and manage them to increase brand awareness and build diverse talent pipelines.

Team Leadership & Development

  • Lead members within the talent acquisition team, ensuring understanding of our goals and promoting a culture of continuous improvement.
  • Provide coaching and support to the team to enhance their skills, knowledge, and effectiveness.
  • Build a culture of collaboration, transparency, and results within the talent acquisition function.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 15+ years of experience in talent acquisition or recruitment, with at least 3 years in a leadership role. You have experience in sourcing, employer branding, HR operations, and managing multiple recruiting channels.
  • Experience leading end-to-end talent acquisition programs in a dynamic tech landscape.
  • Knowledge of recruitment technology, ATS, CRM tools, and social media platforms.
  • Experience using and analysing metrics to improve recruitment performance and make decisions to meet our goals.
  • Experience managing recruitment budgets and vendor relationships.
  • Experience in organisational and project management skills.
  • You have experience building teams to achieve best performance, guiding, inspiring and influence members to achieving organisation goals by promoting collaboration and facilitate cross interactions.
  • You have experience influencing and partner with senior leaders, hiring managers, and cross teams.
  • You have in-depth understanding of diversity, equity, and inclusion principles and how they apply to talent acquisition.
  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field. Advanced degree.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

You take an active role in your projects as a team member involved in product design to rollout, taking ownership of your work and constantly focusing on moving these projects forward. Get to Know the Team

Automation and Platform Excellence (APEX) aim to Deliver Joy and Excellence to Grab engineers by enabling a frictionless ecosystem, allowing focus on value-adding features for users in a fast and safe manner. Some folks and companies would recognize this as a "Platform Engineering Team", and that is what we do.

Get to Know the Role

When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on millions of lives on a daily basis. Grab Engineering is empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve millions of passengers, driving partners, and fellow Grabbers. Reporting to Senior Software Engineering Manager. Working from Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You are a significant and autonomous contributor to your team who is trusted with designing, creating, delivering, and operating your team's software systems in a consistently high quality manner.
  • You will be working on the systems within your team's domain, you take into account the appropriate architectural patterns, code design, and infrastructure options, ensuring that you deliver a system that is secure, reliable, maintainable, extensible and very well tested.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 8+ years of software development experience, delivering large scale engineering products & services
  • 3+ years of engineering management experience (preferably supporting teams of 5 or more software engineers)
  • Strong experience developing cloud infrastructure; familiarity with build systems for managing large code bases (e.g., Bazel, Buck) and knowledge of Kubernetes or similar orchestration technologies is also beneficial.
  • understanding of computer science fundamentals such as data structures, algorithms, and multithreading; knowledge of web application frameworks and both relational and NoSQL databases; and familiarity with microservices architecture, build, and deployment concepts.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The FP&A and forecasting team is responsible for the Business Vertical's forecast and budget, including identifying for implementing scenarios, risk and opportunities.

Get to Know the Role

Oversee the forecasting process, including coordinating input from multiple divisions and departments, and building financial models and templates. You will ensure the delivery of the final budget and forecast, confirmed with all relevant partners. Additionally, it involves managing reporting and performing follow-up analysis to track budget and forecast performance. An important aspect of you will be driving company profitability and growth by analyzing revenues, costs, and evaluating new programs and business cases.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will report to Head of FP&A.
  • Knowledgeable to communicate financial and operational impact of any changes in Business logic and vice versa.
  • Support Business Partnering to Vertical/Function Leaders.
  • Collaborate with multiple teams to create / maintain automated data pipeline to ensure and accurate reports to Partners.
  • Consolidate several Reports in internal FP&A with dateline
  • Collaborate with vertical/territory FPAs by producing reports and analysis that could improve better understanding of our performance and trend.
  • Be the champion to improving FP&A team workflows (weekly to yearly reporting, budgeting and forecast) and all related tools to ensure working condition for teams.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Analytical skills with the ability to find relevant insights from complex data.
  • Proficiency in SQL, PowerBI, R, Python, Tableau, or similar tools would be an advantage
  • Passionate about learning and exploring new trends in business and finance.
  • Ability to present insights to relevant stakeholders effectively.
  • Experience in multinational companies, tech consulting, or startups preferred, with a minimum of 6+ years in relevant roles.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Join Grab's Integrity team, where we're at the forefront of building a secure and trusted platform. Our Risk Strategy team is on a mission to conquer fraud, managing end-to-end risk across every single Grab business vertical. We're a dynamic group, tackling challenges head-on to keep our ecosystem safe and sound.

Get to Know the Role

As a Senior Risk Strategy Analyst, you'll drive Grab's success by overseeing fraud loss and important risk metrics across regional business verticals. Collaborate with senior stakeholders to lead impactful initiatives ensuring seamless and trusted interactions for Drivers, Passengers, and Merchants.

You'll develop strategies, manage resources, and align department-level OKRs with teams like Data Science, Analytics, Engineering, and Product. Be a trusted leader in fraud risk across SEA, fostering a risk culture throughout the organisation.

You will report to the Senior Manager, Risk Strategy.

You will be onsite at Grab One-north office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Understand the business environment and work with stakeholders to assess risks and build fraud protection for new product features.
  • Analyse data reports to gain insights into user behaviours and potential risk trends.
  • Translate these insights into risk strategies and roadmaps, ensuring delivery and execution by stakeholders.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Engineering, Data Science, Marketing, Policy Strategy, Product Management, and Customer Experience to build fraud detection engines, improve risk system functionalities, and optimize processes and workflows.
  • Provide regular updates to senior management on team progress and highlight any bottlenecks.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree or professional qualification in any discipline.
  • Risk management expertise, in 1st or 2nd line of defence functions.
  • 4+ years in relevant industry experience.
  • Experienced managing senior leadership and cross-functional stakeholders.
  • Empathy for end-user experience and a focus on delivering customer satisfaction.
  • Deep dive into details while maintaining a high-level strategic perspective.
  • Familiarity with setting up reporting metrics ie. Excel, SQL, or Tableau, etc.

Get to Know the Team

Welcome to Dev-AI at Grab, where you'll transform developer productivity with AI tools. We are dedicated to enhancing the daily work of Grab engineers by implementing cutting-edge technology. We create in-house solutions and integrate third-party technologies to improve application development, testing, and automation. Our goal is to accelerate and improve the productivity of engineers across Grab.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Head of Engineering, you will collaborate with diverse teams to create AI Assisted and Agentic Product Development that refine the engineering process. Get to Know the Team

Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS) strives to be a technology leader providing predictive and seamless experiences to all Grab employees (Grabbers). Our diverse team of technology practitioners is dedicated to delivering personalized IT experiences. We are looking for individuals who share our customer-centric and innovative values to join our growing team.

Get to Know the Role

You will be the primary IT contact within the country, responsible for IT-related support encompassing operational, application, office builds, service delivery, and escalations. This is an onsite role based in Jakarta. You will be reporting to the Senior Manager, Country IT.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Plan, organize, control, and evaluate IT operations: ensuring compliance with internal service level agreements (SLAs).
  • Design and implement systems and policies: Collaborate with other teams to develop and coordinate systems, services and procedures.

  • Vendor assessment and management: Evaluate vendor capabilities, monitor performance, and provide recommendations.
  • Manage corporate device lifecycle: Ensure inventory accuracy and oversee device management.
  • Participate in budget planning and management: Support Country IT budget planning and control.
  • Embody Grab's V.M.P (Vision. Mission. Principles): Lead changes by bringing clarity, energy, and delivering success.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • IT Operations Management Experience: Minimum 5 years in an IT Operations manager role.
  • Project Management: Experience in managing IT infrastructure projects such as network upgrades, office expansions, and relocations.
  • Technical Knowledge: Expertise in technical management, information analysis, and computer hardware/software systems.
  • Team Management: Proven team and resource management experience.
  • End User Computing: Experience in an MNC-level End User Computing function.
  • Operating Systems Support: Proficiency in multiple operating systems (Mac, Windows, Linux, Android, iOS).
  • Vendor and Budget Management: Hands-on experience in procurement, vendor management, and budget control.

  • Data Analytics: Skills in data analytics and dashboard implementation is strongly desired.
  • ITIL Certification: Preferred but not mandatory.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Coban team, part of the Data Tech Family, is the superstar data streaming team at Grab. We are architecting and operating large-scale, mission-critical data streaming platforms that serve engineers from all of Grab's verticals, processing low latency, multi-TB/hour workloads with 99.99% uptime. Our multicultural team is made up of brilliant and passionate Infrastructure Engineers and Data Engineers. If you are looking for an opportunity that allows you to design and manage a large-scale data infrastructure in a highly stimulating environment, look no further! Get to Know the Role We are looking for a Junior Infrastructure Engineer who would be thrilled at architecting and operating one of the biggest data platforms in Southeast Asia, with a passion for automation and a strong sense of customer service. An engineer in this role would build on inflight data that is of terabyte-scale and distributed systems that routinely serve tens of thousands of queries every second with tight SLAs. In this role, you would get the opportunity to be part of a team that designs and operates the mission-critical infrastructure that processes every piece of data generated or consumed by Grab's systems. The role will be based in either Hanoi or HCMC office The Day-to-Day Activities Designing, deploying, and operating large-scale data streaming infrastructure in the public cloud (AWS). Consistently finding opportunities to improve and optimize the workloads for reliability, performance, and cost. Creating intelligent GitOps solutions and Gitlab CI pipelines for next-level cloud infrastructure and resource provisioning (Kafka topics, streaming pipelines). Investigating, mitigating, and resolving incidents such as production outages performance degradation, or data loss, in particular around Kafka and Kubernetes. Authoring post-mortems, identifying and implementing longer-run corrective actions. Taking turns in providing on-call support for Coban in autonomy. Running upgrades (EKS, Operating System) as well as routine maintenance operations at night. Identifying opportunities to reduce the toil by building automation. Finding opportunities to collaborate with our main stakeholders such as the Cloud Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, and Compliance teams, as well as the other data teams of Data Tech (data lake, machine learning, segmentation). Ensuring that their requirements are built into automated guardrails in our platforms and products. Supporting our users in their needs of more real-time data, always with a view to self-service and automation where possible. Experimenting and rolling out new cross-cutting technologies - container clusters and service mesh, Kubernetes operators, modern stream processing platforms, secrets management, monitoring and logging solutions, and more. Qualifications The Must-Haves: Excellent communication in written and spoken English. Real passion for cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and automation: you enjoy exploring new products and trying them out. Ability to easily pick up new technologies: you are keen to learn and to expand your knowledge. Customer centricity: you always go above and beyond to deliver a first-class service to your users. Proficient with Linux Systems Administration and network fundamentals (IPv4, DNS, HTTP, TLS). Some experience with AWS (ideally VPC, EC2, IAM, S3, EKS). Some experience with Docker/containers and Kubernetes. Some experience with Terraform. The Nice-to-Haves Some experience as a DevOps or Infrastructure Engineer. Proficient with Helm, bash scripting, Python, and Golang. Some experience with GitLab CI, Microsoft Azure, Apache Kafka, Strimzi, Ansible, Hashicorp Vault, Hashicorp Consul, Datadog (UI, agent) Experience with Apache Airflow and Apache Spark. Open-source contributions or public blogs. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Coban team, part of the Data Tech Family, is the superstar data streaming team at Grab. We are architecting and operating large-scale, mission-critical data streaming platforms that serve engineers from all of Grab's verticals, processing low latency, multi-TB/hour workloads with 99.99% uptime.

Our multicultural team is made up of brilliant and passionate Infrastructure Engineers and Data Engineers. If you are looking for an opportunity that allows you to design and manage a large-scale data infrastructure in a highly stimulating environment, look no further!

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a Junior Infrastructure Engineer who would be thrilled at architecting and operating one of the biggest data platforms in Southeast Asia, with a passion for automation and a strong sense of customer service. An engineer in this role would build on inflight data that is of terabyte-scale and distributed systems that routinely serve tens of thousands of queries every second with tight SLAs.

In this role, you would get the opportunity to be part of a team that designs and operates the mission-critical infrastructure that processes every piece of data generated or consumed by Grab's systems.

The role will be based in either Hanoi or HCMC office

The Day-to-Day Activities

  • Designing, deploying, and operating large-scale data streaming infrastructure in the public cloud (AWS). Consistently finding opportunities to improve and optimize the workloads for reliability, performance, and cost.
  • Creating intelligent GitOps solutions and Gitlab CI pipelines for next-level cloud infrastructure and resource provisioning (Kafka topics, streaming pipelines).
  • Investigating, mitigating, and resolving incidents such as production outages performance degradation, or data loss, in particular around Kafka and Kubernetes. Authoring post-mortems, identifying and implementing longer-run corrective actions. Taking turns in providing on-call support for Coban in autonomy.
  • Running upgrades (EKS, Operating System…) as well as routine maintenance operations at night. Identifying opportunities to reduce the toil by building automation.
  • Finding opportunities to collaborate with our main stakeholders such as the Cloud Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, and Compliance teams, as well as the other data teams of Data Tech (data lake, machine learning, segmentation…). Ensuring that their requirements are built into automated guardrails in our platforms and products.
  • Supporting our users in their needs of more real-time data, always with a view to self-service and automation where possible.
  • Experimenting and rolling out new cross-cutting technologies - container clusters and service mesh, Kubernetes operators, modern stream processing platforms, secrets management, monitoring and logging solutions, and more.

Qualifications

The Must-Haves:

  • Excellent communication in written and spoken English.
  • Real passion for cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and automation: you enjoy exploring new products and trying them out.
  • Ability to easily pick up new technologies: you are keen to learn and to expand your knowledge.
  • Customer centricity: you always go above and beyond to deliver a first-class service to your users.
  • Proficient with Linux Systems Administration and network fundamentals (IPv4, DNS, HTTP, TLS…).
  • Some experience with AWS (ideally VPC, EC2, IAM, S3, EKS).
  • Some experience with Docker/containers and Kubernetes.
  • Some experience with Terraform.

The Nice-to-Haves

  • Some experience as a DevOps or Infrastructure Engineer.
  • Proficient with Helm, bash scripting, Python, and Golang.
  • Some experience with GitLab CI, Microsoft Azure, Apache Kafka, Strimzi, Ansible, Hashicorp Vault, Hashicorp Consul, Datadog (UI, agent)
  • Experience with Apache Airflow and Apache Spark.
  • Open-source contributions or public blogs.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Our Developer Experience team builds frameworks, libraries and primitives for fellow engineers, so that they product features more quickly. We aim to bring joy, delight and excellence into the daily work of thousands of Grab engineers.

Get to Know the Role

As an intern in our team, you will help develop high-performance, scalable backend systems that power our the latest applications. You will report to the Software Engineer Manager. This is a paid internship role and is based onsite in Petaling Jaya.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will build product and services that are frameworks, libraries and primitives that allow product engineers to build their services
  • You will build foundational tools so that engineers don't have to reinvent the wheel
  • You will design and implement efficient, scalable, and maintainable backend services using Go programming language
  • You will debug and fix existing and challenging software issues in production environments
  • You will support the design and deployment of backend infrastructure components, including APIs, microservices, and data storage systems.
  • You will contribute to the development of automation scripts and tools to improve infrastructure efficiency and reliability.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Only for candidates who are available to start in July 2025
  • You majored in Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology/Science.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the benefits we offer our Interns:

  • Attractive Monthly Allowance!
  • EPF (Employees Provident Fund) or SOCSO (Social Security Organization) where applicable.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will design and develop solutions using Go language to enhance the availability, scalability, and efficiency of Grab's services. You will collaborate with the engineering team to innovate on design and architecture focused on scale and performance. You will conduct code and design reviews to maintain high development standards. You will engage in service capacity planning and optimize software performance. You will team up with the infrastructure department to build and scale backend services and investigate root causes of issues. You will design, build, analyze, and troubleshoot large-scale systems. You will debug and resolve production incidents during on-call shifts. You will participate in interview processes to help recruit top industry talent. You will provide technical guidance and mentorship to peers. Experience with site reliability including monitoring, capacity planning, and overseeing large-scale web services. Familiar with networking protocols and system internals. Frontend Skills (Bonus) 1-2+ years of experience Experience in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript. Knowledge in frameworks like React, Vue.js, and Svelte. Understanding of state management (e.g., Redux), progressive web apps, responsive design, and accessibility. Full Stack & DevOps Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and real-time data exchanges. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. About Our Technology Stack Our core services use Golang, integrated with Redis, MySQL, DynamoDB, Kafka, and Elasticsearch for data management. Our mobile apps support both iOS and Android platforms with a focus on native languages like Swift and Kotlin, while frontend technologies include Rails, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Join the Consumer Experience (CX) Engineering team at Grab. We're focused on enhancing consumer interaction by working on essential elements like the user experience, content discovery, and user lifecycle including growth, engagement, and loyalty. Our mission is to connect consumers to Grab's marketplace, helping them discover and access services and partners.

Get to Know the Role

Your main responsibility will be to deliver high-quality services that support user journeys in the Grab app, starting from the login screen to key app interfaces. Our services are prime entry points with millions of visitors daily in 8 countries.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will design and develop solutions using Go language to enhance the availability, scalability, and efficiency of Grab's services.
  • You will collaborate with the engineering team to innovate on design and architecture focused on scale and performance.
  • You will conduct code and design reviews to maintain high development standards.
  • You will engage in service capacity planning and optimize software performance.
  • You will work with product and experience teams to define and prototype feature specifications.
  • You will team up with the infrastructure department to build and scale backend services and investigate root causes of issues.
  • You will design, build, analyze, and troubleshoot large-scale systems.
  • You will debug and resolve production incidents during on-call shifts.
  • You will participate in interview processes to help recruit top industry talent.
  • You will provide technical guidance and mentorship to peers.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Backend Skills
    • 2+ years experience in software engineering with full stack web and distributed systems experience.
    • Good understanding in Golang, including core syntax, concurrency, and optimization techniques.
    • Strong grasp of algorithms, data structures, and system design.
    • Experience with distributed systems, streaming services, and queuing models.
    • Solid understanding of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (DynamoDB, ScyllaDB).
    • Experience with site reliability including monitoring, capacity planning, and overseeing large-scale web services.
    • Familiar with networking protocols and system internals.
  • Frontend Skills (Bonus)
    • 1-2+ years of experience
    • Experience in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript.
    • Knowledge in frameworks like React, Vue.js, and Svelte.
    • Understanding of state management (e.g., Redux), progressive web apps, responsive design, and accessibility.
  • Full Stack & DevOps
    • Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and real-time data exchanges.
    • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
About Our Technology Stack

Our core services use Golang, integrated with Redis, MySQL, DynamoDB, Kafka, and Elasticsearch for data management. Services are orchestrated using Kubernetes and run on AWS cloud infrastructure. Our mobile apps support both iOS and Android platforms with a focus on native languages like Swift and Kotlin, while frontend technologies include Rails, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. GitLab and complementary tools like Jenkins and DataDog support our release pipeline.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team Welcome to Dev-AI at Grab, where you'll transform developer productivity with AI tools. We are dedicated to enhancing the daily work of Grab engineers by implementing cutting-edge technology. We create in-house solutions and integrate third-party technologies to improve application development, testing, and automation. Our goal is to accelerate and improve the productivity of engineers across Grab. Get to Know the Role Reporting to the Head of Engineering, you will collaborate with diverse teams to create AI Assisted and Agentic Product Development that refine the engineering process. You will identify areas within the Software Development Lifecycle that can be optimized with AI assistance. You will be focused on implementing technical solutions for AI-assisted workflows for our engineers. Once launched you will also lead improvements, maintenance and operations of such solutions. You will work onsite at Grab Singapore's office located at One-north. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will identify and implement AI-driven solutions to reduce workload and improve efficiency for Grab engineers. You will manage the planning and execution of complex AI projects, ensuring understanding of company goals. You will write code and execute plans that integrate AI tools into existing workflows to enhance productivity. You will coordinate efforts across teams to deploy scalable AI solutions. You will mentor and guide less experienced engineers, promoting a culture of learning and engineering excellence. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Welcome to Dev-AI at Grab, where you'll transform developer productivity with AI tools. We are dedicated to enhancing the daily work of Grab engineers by implementing cutting-edge technology. We create in-house solutions and integrate third-party technologies to improve application development, testing, and automation. Our goal is to accelerate and improve the productivity of engineers across Grab.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Head of Engineering, you will collaborate with diverse teams to create AI Assisted and Agentic Product Development that refine the engineering process. You will identify areas within the Software Development Lifecycle that can be optimized with AI assistance. You will be focused on implementing technical solutions for AI-assisted workflows for our engineers. Once launched you will also lead improvements, maintenance and operations of such solutions.

You will work onsite at Grab Singapore's office located at One-north.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will identify and implement AI-driven solutions to reduce workload and improve efficiency for Grab engineers.
  • You will manage the planning and execution of complex AI projects, ensuring understanding of company goals.
  • You will write code and execute plans that integrate AI tools into existing workflows to enhance productivity.
  • You will coordinate efforts across teams to deploy scalable AI solutions.
  • You will mentor and guide less experienced engineers, promoting a culture of learning and engineering excellence.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have over 5 years of software development experience and a history of delivering successful solutions across teams.
  • Experience with server-side programming languages like Go.
  • You possess practical experience with cloud providers (AWS, GCP, Azure), compute technologies (e.g., Kubernetes), and CI/CD pipelines
  • You have the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and drive projects from start to finish across teams.
  • You balance technical tasks with leadership duties, providing mentorship while writing code and planning executions.
  • You have strong communication skills and can manage stakeholders effectively across different teams.
  • You thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, prioritizing high-quality outcomes.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Our mission is to protect our organisation against the ever-evolving landscape of cyber threats, maintaining the integrity, confidentiality, and availability of our data. We collaborate across departments, harnessing cutting-edge technologies and innovative strategies to stay ahead of emerging threats. Our team excels in a dynamic and fast-paced environment where continuous learning and professional development are encouraged. Get To Know The Role We are looking for a visionary Head of CyberSecurity to join our leadership team. You will set the strategic direction for cybersecurity across our global operations. You will collaborate with leadership to create comprehensive security programmes that not only protect our business from security threats and cyber-attacks, but also promote innovation and thought leadership within the industry. You will be based onsite in the Singapore's one-north office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Strategic Leadership: Define and implement a forward-thinking cybersecurity strategy that aligns with our goals and addresses evolving threats across our global operations. Lead efforts to advance the company's expertise in cybersecurity, setting a vision that inspires innovation and excellence. Team Management: Lead and inspire a large team of security professionals, including Cyber Defence, Cyber Assurance, and Application Security teams, promoting continuous improvement. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Serve as an advisor to the Executive, Board Audit, and Risk Committee, influencing decisions across departments such as Legal, Finance, Engineering, and Business Operations to ensure ecosystem security. Risk Management & Compliance (GRC): Develop and implement strategies to mitigate risks, ensuring compliance with regulations and industry standards such as PDPA, and PCI-DSS across regions we operate in. Incident Response: Oversee rapid and effective incident response efforts, maintaining disaster preparedness plans and conducting regular tests to enhance security processes. Cloud & Infrastructure Security: Secure cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerized environments, implementing Zero Trust architectures and securing APIs. Network & Application Security: Design secure network architectures and oversee mobile and web application security, including secure coding practices and penetration testing. DevSecOps & Automation: Integrate security into CI/CD pipelines, using automation tools (SIEM, SOAR) to enhance threat detection and response. Threat Intelligence & Cyber Defence: Manage threat modelling, digital forensics, and run blue team/red team exercises. Penetration Testing & Application Security: Oversee comprehensive penetration testing efforts to identify and remediate vulnerabilities, ensuring robust application security. Emerging Technologies & Innovation: Lead the charge in leveraging AI/ML and advanced analytics in the area of cybersecurity. Drive thought leadership in adopting cutting-edge technologies, ensuring Grab remains at the forefront of cybersecurity innovation. Implement latest technologies that promote our security capabilities. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need: At least 15 years in risk management, cyber security, and technology, with 5+ years in senior leadership that demonstrate strategic vision and thought leadership. Proven track record of building and leading inclusive security organisations, with a focus on driving innovation and influencing industry standards. Expertise in cloud, network, and application security. Experience with risk assessment methodologies and experience implementing enterprise-wide risk management programmes, including cyber security policy, risk and control management, vendor security and employee awareness. Knowledge of cybersecurity regulations and standards relevant to the tech industry. Ability to convey complex security issues to diverse audiences. What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team Grab For Business is Grab's B2B SaaS platform, streamlining transport, food, and delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Our services include business transport, food delivery, express deliveries, and mart services, supporting functions like Human Resources, Sales and Marketing, and Finance and Operations to improve employee morale, run campaigns, and simplify business expenses. Get to Know the Role As a Lead Product Manager, you will lead the product strategy for the problem space and use data to make informed decisions, measure product performance, communicate impact, and secure support from senior executives. You will report to Head of Product of Grab For Business based in Singapore and work onsite with Commercial, Sales, Marketing, Analytics, and Engineering teams in Grab South Jakarta Office (Jakarta, Indonesia). The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Oversee product concepts, roadmap, and strategies, ensuring agreement on goals and market trends. Conduct market analysis, user research, and focus groups to validate product concepts and prototypes, developing business cases for new programs. Collaborate with the design team to create compelling user experiences and clear user stories for engineering teams. Coordinate with partners across the organization to plan and implement product strategies, manage dependencies, oversee product roll-outs, and gather customer feedback. Lead product meetings with clients, partners and diverse team members to foster understanding and lead decision-making based on market insights and competitive landscape analysis. Expected to create high-velocity impact with sequential wins that add meaningful value, iterating rapidly. Build products that our clients love and engage ensuring that we can achieve high client satisfaction and usage of Grab for their needs. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, Business, or a related field. At least 5 years of direct experience in product management at a tech company in either platform or user-centric products. Experience managing the product lifecycle, including initial concept, market research, defining product requirements, working with teams, and ongoing product management. Experience applying qualitative sense-making with quantitative, data-driven insights, ensuring that all decisions are grounded in analysis and practical understanding. Experience conveying complex concepts and strategies to team members. This includes distilling technical details for non-technical leadership, translating strategic goals for engineering teams, and providing applicable guidance for operations. Comfort in using AI tools for personal productivity (e.g., generating draft PRDs, summarizing research, synthesizing meeting notes). Apply AI for data analysis, insight extraction, and discovery acceleration (e.g., using AI to explore usage patterns, clustering qualitative feedback, market scan). Use prototyping AI tools (e.g., low-code/vibe-coding platforms) to create mockups for validation and to test/iterate multiple solution variations quickly. Use AI as a partner in technical exploration such as stress-testing scalability, running performance scenarios, and simulating throughput or workflow (e.g., using GPT or LLMs as a thought partner to test and validate hypotheses, understand platform technology, expand permutations of possible scenarios, and explore alternative solutions). Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grab For Business is Grab's B2B SaaS platform, streamlining transport, food, and delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Our services include business transport, food delivery, express deliveries, and mart services, supporting functions like Human Resources, Sales and Marketing, and Finance and Operations to improve employee morale, run campaigns, and simplify business expenses.

Get to Know the Role

As a Lead Product Manager, you will lead the product strategy for the problem space and use data to make informed decisions, measure product performance, communicate impact, and secure support from senior executives.

You will report to Head of Product of Grab For Business based in Singapore and work onsite with Commercial, Sales, Marketing, Analytics, and Engineering teams in Grab South Jakarta Office (Jakarta, Indonesia).

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Oversee product concepts, roadmap, and strategies, ensuring agreement on goals and market trends.
  • Conduct market analysis, user research, and focus groups to validate product concepts and prototypes, developing business cases for new programs.
  • Collaborate with the design team to create compelling user experiences and clear user stories for engineering teams.
  • Coordinate with partners across the organization to plan and implement product strategies, manage dependencies, oversee product roll-outs, and gather customer feedback.
  • Lead product meetings with clients, partners and diverse team members to foster understanding and lead decision-making based on market insights and competitive landscape analysis.
  • Expected to create high-velocity impact with sequential wins that add meaningful value, iterating rapidly.
  • Build products that our clients love and engage ensuring that we can achieve high client satisfaction and usage of Grab for their needs.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, Business, or a related field.
  • At least 5 years of direct experience in product management at a tech company in either platform or user-centric products.
  • Experience managing the product lifecycle, including initial concept, market research, defining product requirements, working with teams, and ongoing product management.
  • Experience applying qualitative sense-making with quantitative, data-driven insights, ensuring that all decisions are grounded in analysis and practical understanding.
  • Experience conveying complex concepts and strategies to team members. This includes distilling technical details for non-technical leadership, translating strategic goals for engineering teams, and providing applicable guidance for operations.
  • Comfort in using AI tools for personal productivity (e.g., generating draft PRDs, summarizing research, synthesizing meeting notes).
  • Apply AI for data analysis, insight extraction, and discovery acceleration (e.g., using AI to explore usage patterns, clustering qualitative feedback, market scan).
  • Use prototyping AI tools (e.g., low-code/vibe-coding platforms) to create mockups for validation and to test/iterate multiple solution variations quickly.
  • Use AI as a partner in technical exploration such as stress-testing scalability, running performance scenarios, and simulating throughput or workflow (e.g., using GPT or LLMs as a thought partner to test and validate hypotheses, understand platform technology, expand permutations of possible scenarios, and explore alternative solutions).

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

We develop and execute go-to-market strategies with the goal of serving our community while creating mutually beneficial collaborations with merchants. Our mission is to help enhance their business offerings and positively impact the lives of their customers through the Grab platform.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a Senior Manager for Account Management to lead a high performing team of account leads and managers. You will drive business growth, establishing business relationships with our merchant partners, and navigating strategic initiatives. Your role will involve creative planning, excellent execution, and strong team communication to maximize value in partnership negotiations and implementations. Essentially, we are looking for a seasoned sales leader with ambition and drive, able to build partnerships to support a variety of high-priority F&B, Mart, and FMCG programs.

You will report directly to the Head of Merchants. This is an onsite role, where you will need to travel to our Ortigas office.

The Critical Tasks You will Perform

You Will

  • Oversee Go-to-Market Activities: Manage the go-to-market strategies for merchants, taking on commercial and revenue responsibilities.
  • Set and Achieve Sales Targets: Define sales targets, drive monetization, and ensure the team is equipped with the necessary initiatives to meet their targets.
  • Strategic Direction: Provide strategic guidance in developing Grab strategies that align with merchant partners' objectives.
  • Build Business Relationships: Build business relationships with merchant partners through regular engagements.
  • Collaborate Across Departments: Work with other departments to ensure excellent end-to-end merchant service and responsiveness to market trends and needs.
  • Mentor: Lead and mentor teams of account leads and managers, promoting their development and success.

Qualifications

What Skills You will Need

  • Sales and Account Management Experience: At least 10 years of experience in sales and account management, preferably within the FMCG and e-Commerce industry.
  • Excellent interpersonal, communication, and strong internal and external selling and negotiation skills.
  • Leadership: Strong personal, business, and team leadership. Team player and self motivated.
  • Team Collaboration: Act as a team player and passionate leader who is able to collaborate effectively in a multifunctional environment.
  • Strong organizational abilities and analytical skills to drive strategic initiatives and achieve business objectives.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Our Omnicommerce team in Thailand is dedicated to growing and optimizing our business operations, ensuring our strategies align with Grab's overall objectives. We foster a culture of data-driven decision-making and continuous improvement.

Get to Know the Role

As the Lead for Omni commerce Strategy, you will oversee the growth of our Omni commerce business in Thailand. You will develop business plans, track performance, and collaborate with multiple partners to ensure our strategies are and aligned with market opportunities and customer insights. You will report to Head, Omnicommerce.

This role is based onsite in our Bangkok Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Lead the growth of the Omni commerce business in Thailand, ensuring the execution of business plans and achievement of financial targets.
  • Present regular reports on our performance, using data to lead decisions and communicate with team members.
  • Develop strategic plans for Grab's Omnicommerce operations in Thailand, aligning with our overall goals.
  • Analyze our performance, user behavior, and the competitive landscape to create applicable insights.
  • Foster relationships with all partners to ensure understanding on goals and deliverables.
  • Collaborate with the Regional team to enhance our omnichannel solutions, ensuring they meet local customer needs and expectations.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in management consultancy or e-commerce, with specific experience in merchant omnicommerce operations being.
  • Strong academic track record with a bachelor's degree.
  • Experience leading business growth and building strategic plans.
  • Proficiency in preparing data-driven reports & insights
  • Identify market opportunities and align strategies with our goals.
  • Team member management skills to foster relationships and collaborations
  • Experience in product development in collaboration with regional teams.
  • To switch between and tactical execution.
  • Proficiency in SQL or Python

Additional Information

Life at Grab

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave

As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
