job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Market Insights Team helps shape strategic and operational decisions in the company by providing compelling insights into industry developments, market movements and competitive dynamics in the businesses that Grab operates - namely transport, food, payments, and platform services. Our value proposition comes from the diverse lenses through which we evaluate the landscape, made possible by many offbeat techniques used to complement traditional research.

Get to know the Role

Reporting to the Lead Data Scientist and you will be based onsite in the Grab Singapore office. Our team comprises individuals from varied backgrounds, each bringing a unique set of experiences and skills to the table. Someone who excels at teamwork, and can navigate through uncertainties would succeed in this role. In this role, you will be building and evaluating models and data sources to enable decision making across Southeast Asia.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will define metrics as well as develop and improve models to understand the competitive landscape across multiple segments of Grab's business.
  • You will evaluate the validity and usefulness of a wide range of data of varying sources and types.
  • You will continuously ensure the integrity of the data you use and produce, identifying anomalies and their root causes, and work with stakeholders to address these anomalies where they exist.
  • You will develop pipelines for the work you do, including pipelines for the models you build.
  • You will understand how Grab's products and businesses relate to your data, metrics, and models, and take actions or make recommendations using this knowledge.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have an undergraduate degree in a quantitative discipline, including but not limited to Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Analytics, Economics, Mathematics and Statistics.
  • You are fluent with SQL, Python, R or other scripting/programming languages, and have hands-on experience using at least one of them.
  • You have experience using generative AI in some capacity, and are passionate about expanding on this.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balance personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The GrabMerchant AI Assistant team is dedicated to supporting our merchant partners, helping them grow their businesses by teaching best practices and offering comprehensive merchant support. This team plays a crucial role in enhancing the capabilities of our merchants through AI-driven solutions.Get to Know the Role

As a Lead Product Manager for the GrabMerchant AI Assistant, you will collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to innovate and develop products that address challenges related to merchant growth and support.

You will report to the Senior Product Management Leader and be based onsite at Grab's OneNorth Office in Singapore.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will contribute to the product strategy for the GrabMerchant AI Assistant, collaborating closely with Engineers, Data Scientists, and Analysts.
  • You will see through ideas from the problem statement, to implementation, and finally to rollout.
  • You will define goals and success metrics to guide and measure the impact of your work.
  • You will execute a clear roadmap addressing identified merchant needs.
  • You will engage in user discovery to generate new product ideas that enable merchant growth and support.
  • You will collaborate across product teams and business stakeholders to drive go-to-market execution and oversee product launches.
  • You will present experiment results, OKRs, and learnings to senior Grab leadership.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Product Management: Minimum 5 years of experience in product management at a tech company, ideally with platform or user-facing products.
  • Customer-Centricity: Demonstrated ability to maintain a customer-first mindset through all stages of product development.
  • Data Acumen: Proficient in data-driven decision-making and insights to inform product development.
  • Software Development Practices: Strong understanding of modern development practices and tools.
  • Cross-functional Communication: Communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring the team's work is well-understood and well-supported.

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Technical Infrastructure team at Grab is a collective of product managers, software engineers, and program managers focused on enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of Grab's Technology and Data platforms, serving millions of users daily. These platforms encompass Experimentation, Data Discovery and Catalog layers, Metrics Engine, Customer Data Platform, Streaming Platforms, and Machine Learning Platform. Our mission is to build and maintain a suite of tools and platforms that enable Grabbers to work smarter, faster, and more collaboratively.

Get to Know the Role

We're looking for a Lead Product Manager to join our Technical Infrastructure team, specifically focusing on Data Platforms. In this role, you'll collaborate with engineering, data science, analytics, and product teams to pinpoint areas for improvement and develop impactful solutions. Data is crucial for high-quality, reliable decision-making & business-operations at Grab, and a necessary pre-requisite for any ML/AI applications. You'll work with cross-functional leaders across the company to drive organization-wide changes.

You will report to the Head of Product, Data Tech, and be based onsite at Grab's OneNorth Office in Singapore.

  • Define and execute the product strategy for one or more data platforms
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for improvement and develop tailored solutions.

  • Drive the adoption and onboarding of internal tools and data platforms, ensuring user engagement and success.
  • Oversee product launches and go-to-market activities for internal tools and data platforms.
  • Communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring the team's work is well-understood and well-supported.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Product Management: At least 6 years of experience, with at least 3 years in managing internal tools or data platforms.
  • Software Development Practices: Strong understanding of modern development practices and tools.
  • Analytical and Problem-Solving: Proficient in data-driven decision-making.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Ability to effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Technical Discussions: Comfortable engaging in high-level technical discussions and explaining topics to a non-technical audience.
  • User Research and Requirements Gathering: Skill in gathering requirements and conducting user research.

  • Diligently follow up and close sales opportunities
  • Build a lasting relationship with restaurant decision makers to maintain the possibility of future sales
  • Consult and recommend our products and services to restaurant decision makers while communicating the value of joining the Grab network
  • Collate press materials to ensure that a restaurant is ready to go live on the various Grab distribution channels
  • Work closely with the Operations and Marketing team to facilitate successful product adoption and partnerships by new clients
  • Spearhead sales projects and initiate tactical strategies to improve team efficiency and capabilities, and drive incremental sales output

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 4 years of experience in B2B sales, particularly products or services
  • Experience in direct selling products or services

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Lending Risk team is a team that is responsible for managing credit risk of country lending products, we are serving our passengers, drivers and merchants with various lending offers and opportunities. We are made up of people that work well together and care about one another. If you enjoy working as part of a team and are searching for a place to grow together, we invite you to join our team!

Get to Know the Role

Leads the end-to-end management of merchant lending products from a credit risk perspective, ensuring potential risks are proactively identified, assessed, and effectively mitigated. Responsibilities include conducting comprehensive credit risk assessments for new products and features, and implementing mitigation strategies to protect both users and the business. Drives continuous improvements in key credit risk metrics through close collaboration with cross-functional teams. Prepares and presents clear, concise, and data-driven reports to senior and executive management to support strategic decision-making. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Independently design data-driven and analytical strategy, solutions for business problems with acceptable risk. That covers whitelist, underwriting and lending limit management
  • Manage and track effectively lending portfolio, also advise on the action that need to be taken to keep portfolio metrics on healthy level
  • Close collaboration & coordination with various teams - business, engineer, credit decision engine, data science, operations, legal, finance, & regional teams

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Minimum 3 years of experience in credit risk, consumer lending, or retail/SME sectors, including at least 1 year dedicated to credit risk roles for consumer lending, with a track record of delivering data-driven business results
  • Analytical, covering business modeling (Excel (can maintain complex spreadsheets)) and data analysis using SQL or Python
  • Understanding of compliance, customer due diligence, and Indonesia's financial services landscape
  • Ability to collaborate and managing relationship with stakeholders across diverse functions and regional teams
  • Flexibility, motivated, and inclusive team player who thrives in fast-changing, complex, and VUCA.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Job Description

Get to know our Team:

The Singapore Operations team oversees, shapes and grows the business in Grab Singapore.

We contribute towards Grab’s vision of being Southeast Asia’s superapp by providing everyday services that matter most to consumers in Singapore. We develop and execute business strategies that help us achieve our vision in serving our community.

As part of the Singapore Operations team, the Strategy team is responsible for the overall Singapore Country Strategy and works on top agenda, high impact projects spanning across all the business lines in Singapore (e.g. GrabPay, GrabFood, GrabCar, GrabMart).

This role sits in the Strategy & Strategic Projects team within the Strategy & Partnerships functional team.

Get To Know The Role

This role will be supporting the Strategy & Strategic Projects Head and Team in conducting and presenting studies on strategic topics for Grab Singapore and coordinating cross functional strategic initiatives, with the opportunity to interact with senior executives for strategy brainstorming.

  • Ensure a well-coordinated Country Strategy for Singapore, by coordinating with other Grab teams (both local & regional) and facilitating cross-team collaboration
  • Support planning & analysis of high impact strategic initiatives. This includes:
    • Conducting research and data analysis
    • Structuring and helping with issue identification and solutioning
    • Advising on the practicalities of implementation, and providing executional / project management support
  • Support strategic discussions with external partners
  • Support updates to senior management across multiple business lines
Qualifications

The must haves:

  • Strong academic track record, with a degree in Finance / Business / Economics / Management
  • 1-3 years of relevant working experience - for example, Analytics, Business Intelligence, Management Consulting, Strategy roles (especially in tech companies)
  • Proficiency in SQL
  • Intellectually curious self-starter who takes the initiative to challenge the status quo
  • Highly analytical and able to problem solve, think & debate strategically
  • Strong communicator (written and verbal), with the ability to influence and collaborate with stakeholders across functions at all levels of experience
  • Able to work independently in a fast-paced and fluid environment

Good To Have

  • Working understanding of Python / R
  • A big-picture thinker who is detail-oriented
  • Creativity and comfortable with ‘blank sheet of paper’ assignments

Additional Information

Our Commitment

We are committed to building diverse teams and creating an inclusive workplace that enables all Grabbers to perform at their best, regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity or sexual orientation and other attributes that make each Grabber unique.

About Grab

Grab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries.

Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and our workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles—the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility—we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

Job Description

Get to know the Team

You will be part of the pioneer marketing team in a new & rapidly expanding market, to witness first-hand and actively contribute to the exciting growth of Grab, in making everyday essential services more accessible to the masses, safely & securely. Marketing team is a highly motivated team responsible for building the Grab brand through brand and promotional campaigns that persuade, excite and build brand loyalty among users and identifying and strengthening strategic opportunities with cross-departmental teams and external partnerships.

Get to know the Role

In your role as ‘Marketing Supervisor’, you will be responsible for leading Cambodia and Myanmar's Country GrabFood Marketing team and Creative team in designing and directing communications deliverables that include partnerships, ATL/BTL advertisements, marketing creative campaigns, activation ideas, customer experience design, and end to end process of consumer-first promotions. Your job scope also covers collaboration with various business and operations leads in identifying growth opportunities for the company.

Key Responsibilities

Marketing planning:

  • In-line with the overall business strategy, support the Marketing Head in developing the Marketing strategy and campaigns
  • Understand business performance in terms of trends in demand and supply and provide appropriate recommendations in the Marketing strategy
  • Study and give ideas and directions on marketing campaigns based on successful international marketing campaigns

Campaign Management

  • Develop marketing briefs with clear communication objectives and timelines, and based on key insights
  • Collaborate with the Creative Team to identify out-of-the-box, memorable campaign ideas
  • Identify appropriate target audiences and channels such as In-App, Social Media, Email, Web, and key opinion leaders (KOLs) pages.
  • Track and optimize campaign performance in terms of reach, engagement and conversion across all channels.
  • Articulate performance of communications in marketing campaigns and provide insights on the local market, industry trends, and competitor activities to recommend and develop strategies that meet the constantly evolving business landscape

Marketing Operations

  • Collaborate with internal teams such as Mobility, Mex/Deliveries, Operations, and Customer Experience to ensure marketing campaigns are executed efficiently, accurately, and effectively. (if required, will also have to be in charge of internal and external stakeholders for assigned projects.)
  • Monitor, plan and execute consumer in-app communications, promotions and rewards using Grab's internal tools and systems, in collaboration with the Marketplace team.
  • Monitor, plan and execute house ads/paid ads inside of the Grab app with the regional GrabAds team.
  • Organize and coordinate company or partnership events, on-ground activations and digital events.
  • Work with vendors for delivery of marketing materials and assets for consumers and partners.
  • Assist with localization and reviewing regional content
  • Track and analyze the effectiveness of promotions to provide insights in order to improve offers and to drive business results.

Qualifications

Requirements:

  • Energetic and enthusiastic; embracing opportunities to thrive in a dynamic & fast-paced environment.
  • Insanely creative, open minded, daring and hungry to create campaigns that are memorable
  • Able to work independently. Can multi-task comfortably to deliver on agreed deadlines.
  • Highly detail-oriented to ensure quality of marketing messages across all communications channels.
  • Great interpersonal skills to communicate well with stakeholders. Strong oral and written communication skills in both English and Burmese local language.
  • Bachelor degree preferably with a focus on Marketing, Advertising, Communications, Public Relations and/or Business Administration.
  • 3-4 years of relevant marketing experience with a track record in planning integrated marketing strategies and executing campaigns.
  • Working knowledge of reporting software and office/presentation tools (Google Slides, Excel & Google Sheets, Word).

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab:

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive.
  • Embrace the magic of new life and create lasting memories with your family through Maternity and Paternity Leave.
  • Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
  • Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We’ve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

We deliver the greatest impact and ideas when we bring together diverse perspectives. It is what enables us to spread opportunities to Grabbers and our partners. It’s not a box-ticking exercise; it’s who we are.

Job Description Get to Know the Team The Retail Center of Excellence (COE) is a dynamic regional team at the heart of GrabMart's strategy. Our mission is to enhance our customers' daily shopping experience and build a sustainable business model for the future. We design and build solutions that strengthen our supermarket partners and unlock new growth opportunities. As a regional COE, we create globally-optimized playbooks and provide hands-on support to country teams, empowering them to win in their local markets. You'll be joining a team that has a direct impact on Grab's long-term growth and sustainability. Get to Know the Role As the Head, Retail Center of Excellence, you will lead the strategy and execution of key initiatives that elevate our supermarket partners and optimize core supply-side operations on our Mart business. This role is a unique blend of commercial strategy, operational excellence, and cross-functional leadership. You will drive the development and adoption of best practices, collaborate with product and tech teams to build scalable solutions, and work closely with country teams to ensure consistent, high-quality execution across the region. You will report to the Head of Retail and work onsite at Petaling Jaya office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Drive Strategic Execution: You will lead the implementation of high-priority initiatives designed to deepen supermarket partnerships and enhance core supply-side operational processes. Develop & Scale Best Practices: You will spearhead the creation of operational playbooks, commercial frameworks, and best-practice guides for our supermarket partners, ensuring successful regional adoption. Enable Country Teams: You will provide direct, hands-on support to country teams and lead the team to launch new initiatives, then empower their long-term success through structured frameworks and knowledge sharing. Lead Product Collaboration: You will serve as the key business partner for Product and Tech teams, translating operational needs into product requirements for our supermarket partners. Manage Strategic Partnerships: You will own and cultivate the relationships with key regional supermarket partners, acting as a trusted advisor to drive mutual growth. Support New Initiatives: You will lend your expertise to support country-led pilots of new operational models, ensuring learnings are captured and shared across the region. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need You have 8 years of extensive experience in retail operations, e-commerce supply chain, or a related field with a focus on operational excellence. You have proven ability to develop and scale operational playbooks, commercial frameworks, or standard operating procedures across multiple markets. You have demonstrated experience working collaboratively with product and technology teams to deliver new features and system improvements. You have a strong stakeholder management and relationship-building skills, with a track record of managing strategic partners or clients. You have experience leading complex, cross-functional projects from strategy to execution. You have a hands-on, entrepreneurial mindset with comfort operating in ambiguity and building from the ground up. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

  • The Retail Center of Excellence (COE) is a dynamic regional team at the heart of GrabMart's strategy. Our mission is to enhance our customers' daily shopping experience and build a sustainable business model for the future.
  • We design and build solutions that strengthen our supermarket partners and unlock new growth opportunities.
  • As a regional COE, we create globally-optimized playbooks and provide hands-on support to country teams, empowering them to win in their local markets.
  • You'll be joining a team that has a direct impact on Grab's long-term growth and sustainability.

Get to Know the Role

  • As the Head, Retail Center of Excellence, you will lead the strategy and execution of key initiatives that elevate our supermarket partners and optimize core supply-side operations on our Mart business.
  • This role is a unique blend of commercial strategy, operational excellence, and cross-functional leadership.
  • You will drive the development and adoption of best practices, collaborate with product and tech teams to build scalable solutions, and work closely with country teams to ensure consistent, high-quality execution across the region.
  • You will report to the Head of Retail and work onsite at Petaling Jaya office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Drive Strategic Execution: You will lead the implementation of high-priority initiatives designed to deepen supermarket partnerships and enhance core supply-side operational processes.
  • Develop & Scale Best Practices: You will spearhead the creation of operational playbooks, commercial frameworks, and best-practice guides for our supermarket partners, ensuring successful regional adoption.
  • Enable Country Teams: You will provide direct, hands-on support to country teams and lead the team to launch new initiatives, then empower their long-term success through structured frameworks and knowledge sharing.
  • Lead Product Collaboration: You will serve as the key business partner for Product and Tech teams, translating operational needs into product requirements for our supermarket partners.
  • Manage Strategic Partnerships: You will own and cultivate the relationships with key regional supermarket partners, acting as a trusted advisor to drive mutual growth.
  • Support New Initiatives: You will lend your expertise to support country-led pilots of new operational models, ensuring learnings are captured and shared across the region.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have 8 years of extensive experience in retail operations, e-commerce supply chain, or a related field with a focus on operational excellence.
  • You have proven ability to develop and scale operational playbooks, commercial frameworks, or standard operating procedures across multiple markets.
  • You have demonstrated experience working collaboratively with product and technology teams to deliver new features and system improvements.
  • You have a strong stakeholder management and relationship-building skills, with a track record of managing strategic partners or clients.
  • You have experience leading complex, cross-functional projects from strategy to execution.
  • You have a hands-on, entrepreneurial mindset with comfort operating in ambiguity and building from the ground up.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description Get to Know the Team You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business. Get to Know the Role As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles. You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts. You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows. You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures. You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems. You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field. Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area. Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data. Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation. Exposure in ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage. Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Regional Deliveries Strategy team drives key decisions that shape the future of Grab's Food and Mart businesses across Southeast Asia. We work with country teams, product, commercial, operations, and marketing to solve complex problems, launch strategic initiatives, and unlock growth across our markets.

Get to Know the Role

We're hiring a Strategy Manager focused on category strategy for GrabMart, our on-demand groceries and essentials marketplace. This is not a category manager role — you won't be managing SKUs or daily P&Ls. Instead, you'll drive the strategy behind our category growth: What should we build? Where do we have gaps? How do we unlock the next phase of category expansion?

You'll work regionally, across markets, to identify strategic opportunities, shape priorities, and partner with cross-functional teams to scale high-impact initiatives.

You will report to the Head of Online Deliveries Strategy, and this role is based onsite in the Grab Bangkok office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Develop and evolve GrabMart's category strategy — identifying where and how we win across key missions (e.g. fresh, snacks, health, home).
  • Conduct deep dives into performance data, customer needs, and competitor dynamics to shape recommendations.
  • Design region-level strategies that are scalable, and collaborate with local teams to localize and execute them.
  • Align with product, marketing, and commercial teams to drive cross-functional go-to-market plans for priority categories.
  • Track impact and iterate on what works — bringing a test-and-learn mindset to category growth.

Qualifications

Who We Are Looking For

  • You're curious about customers, markets, numbers, competitors, and how everything fits together.
  • You love connecting the dots across multiple problems, teams, and data sources — and you don't stop at obvious answers.
  • You think in first principles, ask great questions, and get energy from navigating ambiguity.
  • You turn ideas into action — not just crafting smart plans, but driving them through to impact.

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • A minimum of a bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Economics, Marketing, or a related field is required.
  • 5+ years of experience in strategy-related roles — consulting, ecommerce, FMCG, retailing or similar.
  • Experience turning insight into execution, particularly around category or customer segment strategies.
  • Familiarity with eCommerce, retail, or marketplace models is a strong plus.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Our team drives Grab's growth by optimizing media spend, aligning resources, and building high-impact campaigns. As a strategic partner, we collaborate across Marketing, Operations, media partners, and agencies to ensure seamless execution and successful product launches. With expertise in performance marketing, we maximize campaign efficiency and ROI through data-driven insights. Our end-to-end campaign management ensures every media touchpoint aligns with Grab's goals. Through cross-channel integration, we create a cohesive presence across digital, OOH, TV, and radio, directly impacting Daily Transacting Users (DTUs) and brand awareness.

Get to Know the Role

As a dynamic and visionary Regional Head of Performance Marketing, you will lead Grab's digital performance marketing strategy. In this leadership role, you will own and optimize user acquisition, retention, and engagement across all digital channels while ensuring seamless alignment with CRM, brand, and local marketing efforts. Your strategic expertise will be key in driving a customer-centric approach that maximizes ROI and enhances Grab's market leadership.

You will report to the Regional Head of Growth Capabilities (Performance Marketing & Media). This role is based onsite at Grab One North office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

New User Acquisition & Churn Reactivation

  • Develop and execute digital performance marketing strategies across paid channels to drive business growth.
  • Leverage data-driven insights from internal and external sources to optimize media planning and buying.
  • Establish best-in-class digital media tools, KPIs, and attribution models to improve campaign effectiveness.
  • Partner with Country Marketing Heads to localize and enhance digital strategies.
  • Manage relationships with media agencies and vendors.

Retention & Engagement

  • Innovate and refine customer engagement strategies through continuous testing and optimization.
  • Expand retargeting capabilities using the latest technology and media solutions.

Cross-Sell & Growth

  • Drive adoption of Grab's expanding service verticals through targeted performance campaigns.
  • Define and track ROAS metrics to optimize spend and maximize impact.

Brand & CRM Collaboration

  • Align performance marketing with brand-building initiatives to strengthen top-of-mind awareness.
  • Partner with CRM teams to integrate owned and paid channels for a unified customer experience.

Leadership & Team Development

  • Lead and grow a regional marketing team.
  • Champion digital marketing best practices and foster collaboration across functions.
  • Enhance processes and capabilities to boost efficiency and ROI.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 10+ years of experience in digital performance marketing
  • Experience leading teams, with the ability to inspire and mentor a diverse team.
  • Expertise in digital advertising technologies, attribution modeling, and data-driven decision-making.
  • Experience building and maintaining relationships with a diverse range of cross functional stakeholders
  • Ability to maintain performance and focus while adapting to changing environments

Get to Know the Team

The Record-to-Report (RTR) team is dedicated to ensuring accurate financial reporting and compliance, playing a crucial role in the financial health of the organization. We collaborate to streamline processes and deliver insights that drive informed decision-making.

You will be reporting to Finance Manager and you will support all General Ledger and Reporting related activities. The main accountabilities includes ensuring service delivery in accordance to SLAs / KPIs and quality review, providing clear direction to the team following Finance Ops Support and Services strategy.

Functional

  • -You will support the Manager in identifying areas for process optimization and conducting quality reviews to ensure adherence to defined policies and procedures.

  • You will maintain strong working relationships with stakeholders, providing professional and consistent service in resolving inquiries related to fixed assets and intercompany activities.

  • Bachelor's degree in finance/accounting or professional qualification (ACCA/CIMA/CPA)

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Come join the team that literally serves Grab - Grab's Sentry team. The systems we oversee process billions of network messages for Grab's consumers every day, without fail. We work closely with the infrastructure, security, and product teams, and are seeking talented engineers to join our platform team!

Get to Know the Role

You specialize in building, operating and maintaining leading edge solutions that Just Work™. Built on world-class technology stacks, the software you develop brings our unique on-demand services experience to South-East Asia every day — be it transport, payments, food, or "the awesome things to come". Millions of people depend on the stability and efficiency your solutions provide, which is demanding in terms of design and quality but also incredibly rewarding. You will work onsite at Grab office, CMC Creative Space, D7, HCMC and report to the Engineering Manager.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • build and own Grab's gateway systems, connecting millions of consumer devices with hundreds of backend services with Grab's service mesh..
  • work at Grab's Viet Nam headquarters in Ho Chi Minh City, integrated with software engineering and product teams to help build rock-solid and secure solutions with the right interface, technology and practices.
  • be at home in a HA cloud environment and build scalable, zero-downtime network traffic routing and analytics solutions for Grab's "public edge", serving billions of daily requests from millions of Grab consumers and partners every day
  • Drive projects across teams end to end, from launch to rollout
  • Find and troubleshoot issues in Grab's entire infrastructure and codebase
  • Develop, and operate control- and data-plane components, and resolve production incidents
  • Implement quality solutions using Kubernetes, Go and C/C++, and maintain the high bar of standards for code reviews and deployment processes. You mentor peers and promote development and operational excellence best practices while achieving excellent user experience

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • at least 4 years of experience with one of those languages Assembly, C, C#, C++, Go, Java, or Pascal
  • know how to build highly-available distributed systems
  • are fluent in Bash, Python, and JavaScript, and understand common patterns and algorithms to navigate 3rd-party code bases for debugging and troubleshootingYour Advantage
  • HTTP/2. QUIC, and gRPC expertise
  • Dealing with massive concurrency and designing resilient algorithms
  • Experience with building monitoring and alerting systems
  • Full stack or Front-end experience is the plus.
  • Hands-on experience with Terraform and large-scale Docker / Kubernetes deployments
  • Experience with Consul and/or Envoy (envoyproxy.io), their codebase, and their community
  • Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, etc.), database (MySQL, SQL,..)

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

We are looking for individuals who share our customer-centric and values to join our growing team. You will report to the Support Manager. You will work onsite and office location will be based in Vietnam Get to Know the Role You will be part of the EUC department focused on network support but require a broad technical capacity to support IT Services. You will lead efforts to ensure reliable network performance, comprehensive incident resolution, and support across several IT environments. You will encompass handling complex technical issues, overseeing health checks, managing technology updates, major incident handling, disaster recovery planning, and delivering periodic status reports. Additionally, we ask that you are capable to act as a deputy for the IT Country Manager during extended absences, serving as a backup and fulfilling a secondary leadership function to ensure continuity of IT operations. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Incident Handling And Resolution Apply solutions to restore IT services and minimize impact on end-users. Perform advanced troubleshooting and manage end-to-end incident. Performance Monitoring Monitor network and IT system performance, including system availability, throughput, and resource use. Address system alerts, analyze trends, and report findings to relevant partners with recommendations for improvement. Health Check Conduct and lead technical assessments to ensure IT services performance, security, and capacity meet operational standards. Develop and implement health check procedures and countermeasures based on findings. Technology Refresh Evaluate and apply software/firmware updates for IT systems according to technical and business changes. Conduct testing, oversee change management, and deploy updates with minimal change to operations. Major Incident / Disaster Recovery Support Lead major incident or disaster recovery projects, update recovery processes, and participate in solution deployment and drills for network and IT systems. Support recovery activities during actual events and maintain updated disaster recovery documentation. Periodic Status Reporting Collect and analyze statistics to track incident trends and resources. Prepare comprehensive periodic reports on system performance, maintenance, and incidents for partners. CMDB, Asset Audit, And Inventory Conduct onsite CMDB updates and ensure data accuracy. Perform comprehensive asset audits and manage inventory records. Lead efforts in storeroom clean-up, organizing IT assets for accessibility. End-user Computing (EUC) Support Responsibilities, Manage user accounts and access permissions. Troubleshoot hardware and software issues for end-users. Be a backup for the Country IT Manager during their absence, ensuring continuity of IT operations. Participate in IT projects. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. At least 5 years of experience in network support, with expertise in Level 2 support. Have at least one professional network certification issued by an industry-recognized vendor, demonstrating advanced knowledge in networking concepts, protocols, and technologies. Advanced understanding and proficiency in network troubleshooting, performance tuning, and incident management. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS) strives to be a technology leader providing predictive and seamless experiences to all Grab employees (Grabbers). We are looking for individuals who share our customer-centric and values to join our growing team.

You will report to the Support Manager.

You will work onsite and office location will be based in Vietnam

Get to Know the Role

You will be part of the EUC department focused on network support but require a broad technical capacity to support IT Services. You will lead efforts to ensure reliable network performance, comprehensive incident resolution, and support across several IT environments.

You will encompass handling complex technical issues, overseeing health checks, managing technology updates, major incident handling, disaster recovery planning, and delivering periodic status reports. Additionally, we ask that you are capable to act as a deputy for the IT Country Manager during extended absences, serving as a backup and fulfilling a secondary leadership function to ensure continuity of IT operations.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Incident Handling And Resolution

  • Apply solutions to restore IT services and minimize impact on end-users.
  • Perform advanced troubleshooting and manage end-to-end incident.

Performance Monitoring

  • Monitor network and IT system performance, including system availability, throughput, and resource use.
  • Address system alerts, analyze trends, and report findings to relevant partners with recommendations for improvement.

Health Check

  • Conduct and lead technical assessments to ensure IT services performance, security, and capacity meet operational standards.
  • Develop and implement health check procedures and countermeasures based on findings.

Technology Refresh

  • Evaluate and apply software/firmware updates for IT systems according to technical and business changes.
  • Conduct testing, oversee change management, and deploy updates with minimal change to operations.

Major Incident / Disaster Recovery Support

  • Lead major incident or disaster recovery projects, update recovery processes, and participate in solution deployment and drills for network and IT systems.
  • Support recovery activities during actual events and maintain updated disaster recovery documentation.

Periodic Status Reporting

  • Collect and analyze statistics to track incident trends and resources.
  • Prepare comprehensive periodic reports on system performance, maintenance, and incidents for partners.

CMDB, Asset Audit, And Inventory

  • Conduct onsite CMDB updates and ensure data accuracy.
  • Perform comprehensive asset audits and manage inventory records.
  • Lead efforts in storeroom clean-up, organizing IT assets for accessibility.

End-user Computing (EUC) Support Responsibilities,

  • Manage user accounts and access permissions.
  • Troubleshoot hardware and software issues for end-users.
  • Be a backup for the Country IT Manager during their absence, ensuring continuity of IT operations.
  • Participate in IT projects.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • At least 5 years of experience in network support, with expertise in Level 2 support.
  • Have at least one professional network certification issued by an industry-recognized vendor, demonstrating advanced knowledge in networking concepts, protocols, and technologies.
  • Advanced understanding and proficiency in network troubleshooting, performance tuning, and incident management.
  • Experience in troubleshooting and, with the ability to address complex technical challenges

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We're the small-but-mighty creative squad behind GrabExpress and Grab Transport—two of the fastest-moving departments at Grab. Think of us as the visual storytellers who turn goals into bold, and scroll-stopping creative.

We work fast, collaborate tight, and always aim high. From major campaigns to everyday tactical promos, our team excels at solving problems with smart ideas and elegant visuals. You won't just join a team—you'll join a crew that cares about the craft, the impact, and each other.

Get to Know the Role

How do creatives fit into Grab?

A creative at Grab will humanize technology for the very people it serves, creating work that adds meaningful value to both the community and the business. We will build a brand that is enduring, endearing, and proudly made in Southeast Asia. That's how creatives fit into a place like Grab.

How do you fit into the Art Director role?

If you're an Art Director with 5+ years of experience and zero chill for mediocre ideas, we want you.

If “what's the idea?” is your love language, and Photoshop is just how you flirt, we want you.

If you can turn “hmm” into “what if” then “ohh, that's brilliant,” we want you.

If you dream in colors and think in gold, we want you.

If you have the taste, grit, and grid, we want you.

If you have a great, idea-led portfolio across digital, OOH, and social media, we want you.

If you don't (yet), make one, and we still want you.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Turn Grab Transport and GrabExpress briefs into compelling creative communication across all channels.
  • Design compelling layouts and visuals to bring those ideas to life
  • Give clear visual direction to the designers
  • Collaborate with writers, designers, marketers, and business teams
  • Ensure every output is aligned with brand guidelines
  • Report to the Creative lead

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Minimum Bachelor's degree from relevant majors
  • Eye for design: layout, color, typography, and composition
  • English proficiency both verbal and written
  • Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator)
  • Capability to turn briefs into clear, impactful visuals
  • Familiar with digital and print formats (social, in-app, OOH)
  • Understand branding and visual consistency

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Join the dynamic GrabAds Singapore team, where we're looking for an ad-tech professional to help drive advertising sales growth. Our team works collaboratively to build strong partnerships with leading global brands and media agencies, delivering impactful and effective advertising solutions.

Get to Know the Role

As a member of the Grab Commercial Singapore team, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth by managing a portfolio of clients and maintaining a strong sales pipeline aligned with quarterly targets. You'll work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver effective OneGrab solutions and ensure campaign success.

This role will report onsite at Singapore Grab office and will report into the Manager, Client Partner.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Serve as a product expert for all GrabAds advertising placements.
  • Identify, pitch, and acquire new clients through compelling presentations and strategic outreach.
  • Manage end-to-end campaign execution for clients in your portfolio, including campaign activation, performance reporting, and ongoing optimization.
  • Drive retention and growth of existing accounts by analyzing performance data, maintaining strong client engagement, and identifying creative opportunities to maximize revenue.
  • Demonstrate strategic thinking, adaptability, negotiation skills, and a solution-oriented mindset in all client interactions.
  • Maintain a strong understanding of the advertising landscape in Singapore and Southeast Asia across various industries.
  • Utilize strong pipeline management and sales forecasting skills to deliver accurate reports aligned with business KPIs.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers within media agencies and direct client organizations.
  • Collaborate effectively with internal teams to develop and present integrated solutions across Grab’s suite of products and services that meet client objectives.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Background in digital media or advertising sales
  • Proven 3 to 4 years of experience in a sales role with a track record of meeting or exceeding quotas
  • Strong understanding of the end-to-end sales cycle, including prospecting, pitching, negotiating, closing, and campaign execution
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and high volumes of work efficiently

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Integrity team is dedicated to safeguarding our users on Grab. We use our datasets to address multiple challenges, from ensuring safety to preventing fraud. We are involved in the entire data lifecycle, including analyzing user behavior, identifying anomalies, and developing detection and prevention modules for suspicious activities. If you're enthusiastic about solving complex problems that have a direct, real-world impact, we'd love to have you on board!

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Senior Analytics Manager in the Integrity team (Trust, Identity & Safety), you will help analyze data to understand user behaviors and identify potential risks on our platform. Your insights will guide strategies to safeguard our diverse user base from multiple types of fraud and risk.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will analyze user and transaction data to uncover patterns, trends, and issues, aiding in the creation of inclusive and effective abuse prevention policies.
  • You will enhance detection by swiftly identifying latest trends and developing data-driven rules and strategies to address potential risks.
  • You will conduct statistical analyses to ensure detection systems align with industry standards, refining policies, strategies, and controls.
  • You will build and maintain dashboards for all stakeholders to provide visibility of key metrics, patterns and detection efficiency
  • You will collaborate across teams to address risks associated with Grab's products, processes, and payment methods, serving as a strategic partner in risk management decisions.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 2 years of experience as a hands-on analyst in a high-tech company
  • A technical degree in Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Data Sciences, Maths or related fields.
  • Experience in handling large-scale unstructured data. Experience in SQL or other data handling tools.
  • Business intelligence experience using tools such as PowerBI or Tableau.
  • Experience with any of the data analysis tools such as R or Python.
  • Experience with the application of experimentation and statistical techniques (such as hypothesis testing, probability distributions, regression, decision trees).
  • Understanding of the risk management space in digital ecosystems.
  • Proficiency in Gen AI/LLM's.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

As an account Management Lead, you will be responsible in establishing and managing strong business relationships with existing and potential relationship to drive growth for Grab. You will lead all elements of business identification, strategy, partnerships, account management, and execution strategy. You will help co-create the business development plan and roadmap to ensure that it is synchronised with the overall Grab strategic direction and will be the key owner of various business development initiatives and ensure it have a successful delivery.   • Be a business consultant for AM & hard dealing merchant supposedly if AM can't handle the merchant & think of better sollution that can be given at the moment

Experience on managing a team

Experience establishing communication and engagement with prospects your ideas and suggestions in a clear and succinct way

Fluent in both Bahasa & English

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team Team who provide you the environment to grow and better career. Get to Know the Role Manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue. You will be responsible for existing relationships with merchants to increase growth for GrabFood. You will lead elements of business identification, partnerships, account management, and execution strategy. You will report into the Merchant Growth Lead and and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue. You will collaborate with merchants for merchant-funded promo programs, merchant commission schemes, new products/features, etc. You will identify bottlenecks and potential issues related to merchant operations and the content management process, and provide solutions to these issues. You will evaluate strategic and partnership opportunities, performing a broad range of quantitative and qualitative analyses. You will analyze data and develop plans to increase revenues/profitability for your portfolio, and make decisions that build strong operational performance for your accounts. You will build key accounts, measured by deliveries and GMV. You will work across departments to tailor merchant-specific needs (e.g. customized reporting, marketing support, integrations). You will deliver business improvement projects to create value for both merchants and GrabFood. You will improve operational excellence by working with the merchants and operations teams. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need You hold a Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Business, Management, or a related field. You bring over 1 year of experience in sales, business development, partnerships, or a similar role, specifically for an account manager position. You have experience in the F&B industry. You have written and verbal communication skills in both English and Bahasa Malaysia. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Team who provide you the environment to grow and better career.

Get to Know the Role

  • Manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue.
  • You will be responsible for existing relationships with merchants to increase growth for GrabFood.
  • You will lead elements of business identification, partnerships, account management, and execution strategy.
  • You will report into the Merchant Growth Lead and and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue.
  • You will collaborate with merchants for merchant-funded promo programs, merchant commission schemes, new products/features, etc.
  • You will identify bottlenecks and potential issues related to merchant operations and the content management process, and provide solutions to these issues.
  • You will evaluate strategic and partnership opportunities, performing a broad range of quantitative and qualitative analyses.
  • You will analyze data and develop plans to increase revenues/profitability for your portfolio, and make decisions that build strong operational performance for your accounts.
  • You will build key accounts, measured by deliveries and GMV.
  • You will work across departments to tailor merchant-specific needs (e.g. customized reporting, marketing support, integrations).
  • You will deliver business improvement projects to create value for both merchants and GrabFood.
  • You will improve operational excellence by working with the merchants and operations teams.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You hold a Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Business, Management, or a related field.
  • You bring over 1 year of experience in sales, business development, partnerships, or a similar role, specifically for an account manager position.
  • You have experience in the F&B industry.
  • You have written and verbal communication skills in both English and Bahasa Malaysia.
  • You excel in experience establishing communication and engagement with prospects, with the capability to offer comprehensive solutions for diverse customer needs.
  • You can integrate business, strategy, finance, and legal concepts to manage complex, multi-faceted deals.
  • You have the ability to collaborate with both internal and external teams.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique
