job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team:

  • Assist Grab Partners, including drivers, passengers, and merchants, in utilizing our products.
  • Handle service inquiries and resolve disputes from our drivers, passengers, and merchants.
  • Deliver exceptional customer service to our clientele.
  • Foster positive relationships and engage in community-building initiatives with drivers, passengers, and merchants.

The Day-to-day Activities

  • Create positive user experiences through voice and non-voice channels (livechat and email).
  • Lead Grab Support Operation in managing smooth operations across diverse systems and platforms. Monitor the overall contact center operations in real-time to ensure the team consistently meets departmental targets.
  • Effectively and clearly communicate company and departmental strategies, as well as all product and feature launches, current procedures, campaigns, and any ad-hoc events that may arise across Grab Support agents.
  • Oversee, mentor, and develop Grab Support Agents to enhance productivity and maintain high quality, promoting outstanding user experiences. Conduct agent performance evaluations and feedback sessions.
  • Manages the quality audit and monitoring process. Works closely with the quality assurance specialist ensuring written and verbal performance feedback to grab support agents. Makes recommendations for areas of operational improvement to improve user experience and increase efficiency in the grab support operations.
  • Empowered to authorize cancellations, refunds, and reimbursements within predetermined financial limits.
  • Collaborate with internal and external teams and departments to ensure solutions are delivered in a timely manner and exceed user expectations for satisfaction.
  • Initiate manager call-backs as needed for escalated cases, and promptly identify and elevate issues to the relevant departments, minimizing any adverse effects on user satisfaction.
  • Address disciplinary issues, collaborating with HR and agency personnel for fair and timely resolution.
  • Prepare and submit monthly reports covering team productivity, quality, feedback, or any other required reports for continuous improvement.
  • Identify operational gaps, express concerns, collaborate with the manager and relevant teams to actively improve processes, implement solutions, and contribute to performance improvement projects for an excellent user experience.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent, with a minimum of 4 years of supervisory/managerial experience in a call center environment or the service industry (e.g., telecommunications, banking, technology, airline, tourism, hospitality).
  • Able to work in rotating shifts and weekends
  • Fluent in both spoken and written English.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and motivate a team.
  • Adaptability and flexibility in a dynamic work environment, with the capability to seamlessly transition into new roles based on operational requirements.
  • Proficient in handling disciplinary matters and conducting performance management.

Additional Information

Our Commitment

We recognize that with these individual attributes come different workplace challenges, and we will work with Grabbers to address them in our journey towards creating inclusion at Grab for all Grabbers.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The communication team builds high-throughput solutions for sending out messages (push notifications, emails, SMS) to millions of users and running marketing campaigns by building a very scalable IFTTT engine. We take pride in building distributed systems that have a real impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population.

Get to Know the Role

You will be responsible for building, growing, and leading a team of engineers focused on delivering high quality deliverables. You will have opportunities to develop backend and mobile components. Not only will you get to collaborate with the engineers, product, business, and program management teams to be on top of your deliverables, but you will also serve as a mentor to your teammates to help them grow. You will work onsite at CMC Creative Space, district 7, HCMC and report to the Manager, who is based in Singapore.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Lead a team of engineers across different tech stacks. You'll participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards.
  • Partner with cross functional leaders across product, design, analytics to build the product roadmap, set customer-focused metrics and experiment designs.
  • Lead the quarterly planning and build a smooth execution plan with the team for securing the delivery of product and engineering roadmap.
  • Set the engineering strategy and engineering key result targets for the team, consistently improve across testability, availability, security and code quality for your systems and modules.
  • Attract and retain senior engineering talent, actively mentor and develop engineering talent in the team and across Grab.
  • Keep your team staffing aligned with business needs and quickly pivot to changing needs.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 5+ years of engineering experience on backend technologies.
  • At least 2+ year experience as a successful software engineer manager.
  • Demonstrated experience attracting and retaining main talent. Experience mentoring engineers is critical for this role.
  • A cultural role model with a strong sense of humility and empathy, ready to roll up one's sleeves to help the team achieve engineering excellence.
  • Proficiency in CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, etc.)
  • Experience with database architect, MySQL, PosgreSQL
  • Experience deploying code in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud environments

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business. Get to know the Role As a Senior Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Petaling Jaya office. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles. You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts. You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows. You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures. You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems. You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field. Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area. Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data. Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation. Exposure in VBA, ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage. Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

GrabRentals (GR) aims to provide sustainable access to high quality vehicles for our hirer-partners. Providing them income opportunities within the Grab platform without the need to personally own a vehicle. GR also plays a crucial role in securing vehicular supply for the Grab marketplace.

Get to Know the Role

In this position, you will play a vital role within the Fleet Team. Your duties will encompass supporting the planning process, conducting research, and assisting in the execution of fleet operations for GrabRentals Singapore. The ideal candidate should have strong critical thinking abilities and excellent interpersonal skills, which will aid the Manager in overseeing, planning, and executing operational activities. You will also be tasked with organizing assignments, identifying challenges, developing solutions, and presenting these to leadership.

This role will report to the Head, Fleet, reporting onsite to Singapore Grab office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Plan & coordinate vehicle handovers to vendors, partners, or hirers for check-out, Pre-delivery Inspection, and repairs.
  • Resolve escalated issues and disputes collaboratively, ensuring customer satisfaction while maintaining professionalism.
  • Maintain accurate inventory records to optimize vehicle utilization and planning.
  • Design solutions and initiatives, track timelines, and assess impact of operational changes on the ground.
  • Present findings and make data-driven recommendations to stakeholders & Managers.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams within GR and other stakeholders within Grab Singapore to develop and implement strategic initiatives to optimise processes, improve efficiency, and achieve cost savings
  • Actively engage in fleet operations, collaborating closely with teammates to drive improvements and productivity.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Degree / Diploma holders (preferably in business administration, economics, supply chain or engineering)
  • Ability to use a data-driven approach to identify problems and implement solutions.
  • Excellent communication & interpersonal skills.
  • Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and efficiency.
  • Proven ability to solve problems and to influence decision making.
  • Initiate and maintain strong relationships with with customers, partners and vendors
  • Ability to work in diverse environments and deal effectively with complex, changing and ambiguous landscapes and adhere to the highest ethical standards.
  • Passionate about identifying user pain points, process bottlenecks, or inefficiencies and designing solutions to resolve them
  • Strong desire to work on and take ownership of product-related projects to drive platform improvements and enhance end-user experience
  • Ability to coordinate tasks across various stakeholders, manage project progress and achieve goals in a timely manner

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

From detangling complicated use cases to delighting our customers, the Grab Support (GS) team provides customer support and solutions to in-country business units for multiple verticals. We aim to out-serve our users and turn their not-so-good experience into a memorable and delightful one.

Get to Know the Role

As the Regional Workforce Management Assistant Manager, you will report into the Senior Manager, Regional Workforce and Business Analytics and work onsite in the Grab Pasig City office.

You will play a vital role in a dynamic team dedicated to inspiring excellence in workforce planning and financial management. Your primary responsibilities will include creating Power BI reports that provide valuable insights into workforce performance. You will enhance overall performance through trend analysis, project management, and the implementation of inclusive engagement frameworks and accurate data management.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will create Power BI reports that deliver valuable insights into workforce performance, using data analytics to identify trends and support informed decision-making.
  • Your role will also involve maintaining accurate headcount and system records, ensuring data integrity.
  • As the administrator of the Workforce Management (WFM) NICE scheduling system, you will troubleshoot any issues that arise to ensure seamless operation.
  • You will lead workforce management projects and collaborate on initiatives for process improvement.
  • You will help provide workforce financial projections and monitoring operational costs to improve efficiency.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • We are looking for a Bachelor's Degree holder with at least 4 years of experience in workforce management report and analytics.
  • You are proficient in Tableau, Power BI, Advanced Excel (VBA)
  • You have knowledge of data programming (Python, R), and SQL on AWS/ Azure

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Financial Engineering team builds safe, secure and high throughput payments primitives. We oversee a range of platform primitive components such as Wallet, Reconciliation Engine and API Gateway. We take pride in building distributed systems that have a impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population.

Get to Know the Role

You will have opportunities to design backend services. Not only will you get to collaborate with the product, business, and program management teams to be on top of your deliverables, you will also serve as a mentor to your teammates to help meet the teams' deliverables and goals. This role is based in Vietnam and onsite. You will report directly to the Vietnamese Engineering Manager.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Design and develop robust, scalable, and high-performance software applications using GoLang.
  • Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the software development life cycle.
  • Automate tasks through appropriate tools and scripting.
  • Collaborate with a cross-functional team to define, design, and ship new features and functionalities.
  • Lead the architecture and coding standards efforts, ensuring clean & efficient code.
  • Implement modern best practices and patterns in software development.
  • Mentor junior software engineers, providing guidance and support to foster their growth and development.
  • Conduct code reviews, ensuring coding standards, best practices, and security guidelines are adhered to.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in software development to continuously improve our products and processes.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4+ years experience in backend development with clear architecture mindset
  • Solid understanding of programming principles, financial transaction consistency, and Git version control.
  • Experience with software development life cycle and agile methodologies.
  • Proven experience in designing scalable and maintainable architectures.
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
  • A passion for mentoring and guiding junior team members.
  • A continuous learner, open to embracing new technologies and development practices.
  • Aspirations to be/become a Team Lead is a pre.
  • Experience with a relational database such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle
  • Experience deploying code in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud environments

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We are on a mission to transform the recruitment landscape, promoting strategic growth, transparency, and diversity. Our goal is to discover and onboard talents who resonate with our culture, are ready for today's challenges, and are equipped to help build tomorrow's innovations. We aim to create a work environment where every task our Talent Advisors do is meaningful, contributes to Grab's success, and empowers them to make a positive impact.

If this resonates with you, we invite you to join us and be a part of this dynamic change!

Get to Know the Role

This is an exciting role within the Talent Acquisition function to attract and hire top talent to fuel Grab's growth. You will be based onsite in our vibrant Manila office with flexible work arrangements, reporting to the Country Head of People Operations, Philippines.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Partner with Local and Regional TA Leads and functional TA partners to build recruitment plans, and manage end-to-end recruitment process and hiring reporting.
  • You will partner with collaborator teams, such as the employer branding and recruitment marketing and talent Sourcing teams, to enable hiring strategy and plan and achieve functional hiring goals.
  • Provide talent advisory to hiring managers and hiring teams, manage expectations, and provide advisory and solutions to hiring teams in different circumstances.
  • Manage the top of the funnel recruitment process (talent sourcing, resume reviews, screening, scheduling) to guarantee a continued pipeline of qualified candidates.
  • Provide advisory on job descriptions and competency-based interview questions that reflect each position's requirements and take accountability in interview evaluation feedback.
  • Plan and implement Employer's Branding plans, including and not limited to Internship program and Campus recruitment and engagement programs.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 6+ years of in-house Talent Acquisition experience with full-cycle recruiting to project manage,ment from sourcing candidates to the interview and hiring processes including offer management.
  • Experience interpreting complex data, identifying patterns, providing insights, and formulating solutions to solve bottlenecks in the recruitment process with data.
  • Knowledge of recruitment tools and systems such as ATS and CRM with experience using new technologies such as Generative AI.
  • Build relations, interpret needs, and engage with the hiring team across all levels of the organisation.
  • Proficiency in spoken and written English.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Collaborate with supporting functions (Creative, PR, Media, Social Media, Ops) to prepare content for campaign requirements and improve user experience.
  • Manage communication calendar with Marketing support team to ensure that communications are spaced out and sent out.
  • Provide regular insights around campaign and content performance.
  • Conduct report of performance and campaign evaluation

Qualifications

  • Minimum a Bachelor's degree in any major
  • At least 2 years of working experience in a related field such as Marketing/ Communications
  • Experiences in marketing campaigns execution within relevant industries (FMCG, retail, or e-commerce).
  • Capability to work with people at all levels, to motivate and empower whenever necessary
  • Proficiency in English, both verbal and written

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS) aims to be a technology leader that provides predictive and seamless experiences to all Grab employees (Grabbers). We are a diverse team of technology practitioners looking to outserve Grabbers with positive, personalized IT experiences, and we are looking for individuals with similar customer-centric and innovative values to join our growing team.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Senior Systems Analyst, Finance Systems (TMS), this role will primarily focus on supporting our Treasury system. In addition, the successful candidate will provide expertise and collaborate with other groups to support the assessment and delivery of enhancements, projects, and ongoing support. Candidates should possess experience in managing system support and change request enhancements within Kyriba system landscapes.

This role will be based on-site in Grab Jakarta office.

The following Treasury processes should be covered, but are not limited to:

  • Bank Account Management
  • Cash Forecasting and Management
  • Cash Investments
  • Debt Covenant Monitoring
  • Internal and External Funding Management
  • Foreign Exchange (FX) Execution (FX Spot, Forward, Swap, Option, and NDF)
  • Inhouse banking
  • Payments

The Day-to-Day Activities

  • Support users in their day-to-day system issues and work within our agreed SLA
  • Document SOP processes based on ticket resolution and RCA
  • Support in testing activities, including integration testing, end-to-end (business process) testing and UAT.
  • Participate in the delivery, support and testing of the Treasury System enhancements, upgrades and projects
  • Identify gaps in processes and make sound recommendations to stakeholders.
  • Identify and support auditing needs e.g. reporting and making sense out of logs.
  • Make recommendations of configurations and deployments lifecycles to ensure project's success.
  • Be a driver of change for Finance, Treasury & GTS to continuously improve our ability to serve Grabbers; includes identifying gaps in processes, data lifecycle or new relevant releases in platform offerings.
  • Experience working within a finance environment, delivering with quality but in a high pace environment.

Qualifications

The Must-Haves

  • A minimum of 3 years of functional experience with Kyriba or similar treasury management systems (TMS)
  • Demonstrated commitment to developing a comprehensive understanding of Kyriba modules and capabilities
  • Proficiency in key treasury processes, including:
    • Cash Management and Forecasting
    • Payment Processing
    • Cash Accounting
    • General Ledger Reconciliation
    • Financial Transactions, Deal Capture, and Position Keeping
    • Risk Assessment and Valuation
    • Financial and Cash Accounting
    • Bank Account Management
    • Business Intelligence and Reporting
  • Ability to engage in high-level discussions with financial and IT professionals at various organizational levels
  • In-depth knowledge of support and change/enhancement request lifecycles, including configuration/development, system integration/user acceptance testing (SIT/UAT), and release packaging/management within the Financial ERP space
  • Understanding of issue prioritization, enhancement considerations, and service level agreements (SLAs) to effectively mitigate risks and impacts
  • Strong relationship-building skills, with the ability to establish trust and rapport with mid-senior leaders and stakeholders across multiple departments
  • Excellent presentation, interpersonal, and communication skills, enabling collaboration with internal and external clients, as well as the ability to create and deliver impactful reports and maintain relationships
Nice-to-Haves

  • Experience in supporting or developing integration between Treasury and ERP Finance systems
  • Experience in implementing SOX compliance & audit controls for financial and planning systems (e.g. Change Management, Release Management)
  • Experience in managing internal and external auditors asks for relevant finance processes and governance requirements.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Lending team builds safe, secure and versatile loan products for all user segments. We manage a range of platform primitive components such as Loan Management System, Repayments Engine and Product Flow Orchestator to name a few. We take pride in building distributed systems that have an impact on the lives of millions of users in our endeavour to out-serve the underserved population. Theories like Idempotency, CAP theorem, Distributed Agreement are more than just theoretical terms for us and have bearings on the systems we build.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for passionate developers who not only have the necessary skills but also offer more, to become part of our team. You will collaborate with the product, business, and program management teams to ensure delivery of your work. You will directly report to the Engineering Manager and the role will be full on-site at our Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Develop applications using GoLang, ensuring clean and efficient code.
  • Identify main tasks, manage them throughout the software development life cycle, and automate tasks.
  • Work with multiple teams to define requirements, design new features, and deliver them.
  • Lead coding standards efforts, conduct code reviews, troubleshoot, debug, and update existing software.
  • Stay updated with the latest technologies to improve products and processes, and mentor junior engineers to support their growth..

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Need:

  • Bachelor in Computer Science or equivalent.
  • Experience shipping products (like web applications or backend services, etc.) to production.
  • You can be a good coder in any language, but willing to work on Golang
  • Ability to communicate in Bahasa Indonseia and English
  • Experience automating tasks using appropriate tools and scripting, and experienced in conducting code reviews to ensure high coding standards.
  • Collaborate with multiple teams and staying updated with new technologies and security practices.

Additional Information

We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

At Grab, we're committed to enhancing the consumer experience across Southeast Asia. Our Consumer Experience Team focuses on spurring user growth, retention, and engagement through strategies backed by data insights. We're looking for a Senior Data Scientist (Analytics) to join our team at our office in Jakarta, Indonesia, driving improvements in user experience through product experimentation, A/B testing, and in-depth research.

Get to Know the Role

In this role, you will work closely with product managers to define hypotheses, design experiments, and deeply understand user needs, pain points, and business goals. You will act as a strategic partner throughout the product development lifecycle—offering analytical support from ideation to execution—and help prioritize features through data-driven insights. You will report to Senior Analytics Manager.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Design and run A/B tests and quasi-experiments to evaluate the impact of product changes on key metrics like engagement, retention, and conversion.
  • Analyze experiment results and generate actionable insights to guide product improvements.
  • Conduct deep-dive user behavior analyses using statistical techniques and machine learning to uncover trends and root causes.
  • Translate complex data into clear, strategic recommendations for product enhancements.
  • Build and maintain intuitive dashboards to track product and feature performance in real time.
  • Visualize data effectively to highlight trends, anomalies, and opportunities, enabling data-driven decisions across teams.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • We are looking for someone with at least 3 years of experience in the product analytics space.
  • You have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Data related fields
  • You are proficient in SQL, Python, and R for handling large datasets.
  • You have experience creating dashboards using tools like PowerBI for informed decision-making.
  • You have advanced knowledge in statistical methodologies and machine learning to uncover insights. You can also apply these techniques to large datasets.
  • You have experience designing and implementing A/B tests and other experiment frameworks. You ca analyse results to derive actionable insights.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Get to Know the Team

The Fulfillment tech family is one of the pillars allowing Grab to out-serve our customers and partners in different businesses and marketplaces across Southeast Asia. You will be reporting to Senior Software Engineering Manager. We are working on high throughput, real-time distributed systems that use advanced software engineering techniques to solve hundreds of millions of requests per day. We are a distributed team in 4 different locations: Singapore, Beijing, Indonesia, and Malaysia. Our communication is in English, both in spoken and written form.

Our mission is to offer the best products and experiences to our driver partners as to increase adoption and engagement of our services. Improve driver partner opportunities and efficiency to fulfill customer orders without fail and to create efficient marketplaces by determining an price that is both sustainable and loved by our partners and customers.

Job Description

Get to Know the Role

  • Develop and maintain the back-end system of the million-user-scale supply search platform, ensuring stable operation and efficient response of the platform.
  • Conduct in-depth analysis of data related to driver choice, explore influencing factors, and improve drivers' decision-making paths and order matching strategies through technical means.
  • Participate in system architecture design and performance optimization, and solve technical challenges in high-concurrency and large-data-volume scenarios.

This role is onsite based in our Petaling Jaya, Malaysia office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable backend services using Golang within a microservices architecture.
  • You will collaborate with teams, including front-end developers, product managers, and QA engineers, to understand project requirements and provide high-quality software solutions.
  • You will implement best practices and coding standards to ensure the reliability, performance, and security of our backend systems.
  • You will write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, and conduct thorough code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to software development best practices.
  • You will troubleshoot and resolve complex backend issues and system failures, ensuring resolution to minimize impact on production environments.
  • You will collaborate with DevOps teams to automate deployment, monitoring, and scaling of backend services on AWS.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 3+ years of experience as a software engineer writing production code
  • Solid software engineering and coding skills. Experience in at least one backend language like Go, Scala, Java, C++, or others is required. You can be a good coder in any language but must be willing to work on Golang
  • Proficiency in building microservices architecture and understanding of distributed systems, RESTful APIs, and message queuing systems.
  • Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., DynamoDB).
  • Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control (Git), unit testing, and CI/CD pipelines.

The Nice-to-Haves

  • Familiar with open source search engine, familiar with Lucene, Elasticsearch
  • Hands-on experience with performance profiling, optimization, and debugging of backend systems.
  • Hands-on experience working with AWS infrastructure

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Digital Goods B2B team is part of GrabKios, established initially as Kudo, and is responsible for managing Digital Goods supply and demand/sales at GrabKios. Kios plays a vital role within the Grab Indonesia ecosystem, in Digital Goods, supporting various vertical activities and directly engaging consumers. Our team is made up of enthusiastic individuals with a desire for progress and development.

Get to Know the Role

We are seeking an Account Manager to join our Digital Goods Business team in Indonesia. This critical role entails managing and expanding key client accounts, driving sales growth, and ensuring optimal customer satisfaction within the rapidly evolving digital goods industry. This role is important to our success, as we are looking for you to manage these responsibilities. In return, you will grow with us and make a significant impact. You will report to Head, Digital Goods B2B & Business Development. You will be based onsite in the Grab Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities through the acquisition of new partners and billers
  • Establish and cultivate relationships with assigned existing clients, serving as their primary point of contact and trusted advisor
  • Identify and capitalize on new business opportunities within existing accounts to drive revenue growth through cross-selling and up-selling initiatives
  • Orchestrate collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional services that align with client needs and expectation
  • Execute negotiations for contracts and agreements to secure favorable terms for the organization
  • Conduct formal client meetings and deliver professional presentations to showcase new products and services performance
  • Maintain a comprehensive understanding of industry trends, competitor activities, and digital goods market dynamics through continuous research and analysis
  • Actively contribute to the development and implementation of best practices and process improvements within the account management team, fostering a and innovation

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
  • -Minimum 5 years of experience in account management in the digital goods or related industry
  • -Strong understanding of digital goods market trends
  • -Excellent client relationship management and negotiation skills
  • -Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
  • -Proficiency in data analysis and reporting

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Demand Experiences team's mission is to help consumers enjoy maximum value through engaging and relevant offers, while driving sustainable growth for merchant partners, Grab, and multiple business products. We engineer platforms used by all business verticals in Grab to use our vast reward and promo capabilities. Our products are enjoyed by millions of consumers and our systems are among the most used in Grab, being involved in every transaction made. Our team members are in Indonesia and Singapore.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager II to join our engineering team in Jakarta, Indonesia. You will lead a team of engineers while driving innovation in our demand solution. You will report to the Head of Engineering, and work on-site in our Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Oversee the development of Demand team's services to enhance availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency
  • Lead and foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement within the engineering team
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align engineering efforts with organizational objectives
  • Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources while implementing best practices in software development
  • Conduct performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback to team members
  • Design, build, and analyze large-scale systems, collaborating with the infrastructure team for scaling and root cause analysis
  • Stay updated on industry trends, participate in strategic planning, and ensure compliance with regulations and company policies.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Min. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field; MBA or Master's degree would be an added value.
  • Solid foundation in computer science, with expertise in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
  • Min. 7 years of professional experience in software engineering, with hands-on coding skills and an understanding of scalable architectures, microservices, and mobile technology.
  • Experienced in using Golang with Redis, MySQL, DynamoDB, and Elasticsearch data stores.
  • We use GitLab for our code repository and we follow the basic Continuous Delivery tenets using a host of tools to support our release pipeline and code quality. These include GitLab CI, DataDog, Kibana.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

At GrabFin, we empower the people of Southeast Asia, from consumers and drivers to everyday entrepreneurs, by enabling financial inclusion for the underserved. The team is building innovative solutions by enabling commerce through payment services (checkout, payments platform, grab pay products, rewards), empowering through Lending(driver & merchants), empowering through agents (Kios) & protecting users through Insurance(scenario insurance). All product managers in GrabFin are regional product managers across Grab's Southeast Asian markets

Get to Know the Role

You will manage the product strategy, roadmap & execution of digital goods for Grab's merchants especially in the Indonesian digital goods market. You will be reporting to Senior Product Management Leader and based onsite in Grab Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Define and own the vision, strategy, goals, and roadmap
  • Dive deep into our data to identify the biggest opportunities to optimize our systems to benefit Users and Grab.
  • Own project delivery, feature development, and experimentation end-to-end, including creating detailed product & business requirements, driving cross-functional execution, sharing insights and learnings across the org, and ensuring stakeholder visibility
  • Collaborate with engineering, design, analytics, and data science to define an product strategy, develop and maintain a prioritized product backlog, and execute on delivering great experiences for users. Collaborate with Product Marketing, other Product teams, and regional/country teams on go-to-market strategies and execution.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 8+ years experience in product management at a tech software company, with demonstrable success in formulating product strategy & launching new products/features with clear impact
  • Bachelors in computer science, software engineering, information technology, business, finance, economics, or related fields.
  • Demonstrated success in payments or financial services at scale.
  • Experience working with distributed teams.
  • Empathy for users and a drive to discover and resolve their pain points.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Strategy & Ops team oversees and grows the Singapore Mobility business (JustGrab, GrabCar, GrabCar Premium etc.). This includes implementing strategy around demand (passengers), supply (driver-partners), pricing & marketplace, while also undertaking product rollouts and special projects.

Projects managed by the team often involve creative problem-solving, analysis using large data sets and deriving insights to create high-impact solutions.

Get to Know the Role

This job reports onsite at Singapore Grab Office and reports into the Manager of Strategy & Ops, Mobility. You will be working onsite at the Grab One North Office

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Use both strategic and analytics toolkits to deliver data-driven business insights and recommendations to senior management to act upon (e.g. customer segmentation and strategy, demand / supply strategy, channel strategy)
  • Perform analysis of marketplace issues (e.g. demand, supply, pricing) to improve for business objectives (e.g. revenue / profit growth, service health)
  • Support on special projects end-to-end involving skills such as problem structuring, analysis, project management, communication & stakeholder management
  • Work in a team to solve business-critical issues through rigorous analysis, big picture thinking with consideration for operational detail
  • Execute on initiatives with meticulous attention to cross-functional requirements including operations, marketing / comms, driver-partner relations, regulatory compliance etc.
  • Collaborate with teams across multiple functionalities including Product, Regional strategy, Partner Operations and marketing to execute on high-impact initiatives

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • A bachelor’s degree in Economics / Statistics / Business / Information Science / Engineering or a related field
  • 0 or more years of experience - for example, Consulting, Strategy, Analytics, Business Intelligence roles (especially in tech companies)
  • Proficiency in Excel and data analysis; vivid storytelling skills with Powerpoint
  • Strong business acumen - ability to articulate complex analyses and translate these to actionable business insights
  • Effective communication and collaboration skills
  • Willingness to pick up SQL (Python is a bonus)
  • Problem solving & can do attitude - Willing to learn and understand the root cause of problems; able to work with a multidisciplinary team to propose creative solutions
  • Attention to detail

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

  • As a member of our GrabFamily, not only will your skillsets be capitalized but you will also develop your untapped potential and be inspired with some of the most amazing minds in the industry.
  • Our team consists of young but experienced individuals who are tenacious and energized by the fact that we exist to make a change - a change that has made a societal impact in Southeast Asia.

Get to Know the Role

  • As a Training & Quality Assurance Manager, you will partner with teams to promote quality assurance and quality improvement projects through audit management, data-based insights, training implementations and performance metrics management.
  • You will report to the Head of Grab Support, Malaysia & Singapore and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will manage all quality assurance initiatives across Grab Support operations (including BPO vendors) in Malaysia & Singapore.
  • You will ensure quality performance metrics are aligned with business expectations and that quality metrics are met.
  • You will develop and implement training programs focused on enhancing soft skills, customer handling, and overall service quality.
  • You will lead the analysis of data related to training and quality to provide relevant recommendations to guide continuous improvements in customer service.
  • You will partner with GS Operations Managers to develop strategies that address issues related to customer satisfaction.
  • You will manage a team of training and quality analysts to lead the performance metrics and improvement goals.
  • You will explore and incorporate recommendations that use Artificial Intelligence (AI) to improve service delivery and quality.
  • You will engage with consumers to understand their issues, offer solutions, and work with country business teams to improve SOPs and address root causes using industry best practices.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have 6+ years of experience in the Quality Assurance space.
  • You have experience in a contact center environment and the customer service/customer experience industry.
  • You have expertise in implementing training and quality strategies.
  • You have a understanding of Quality Management Systems and Learning Management Systems.
  • You have proficiency in data analysis, including tools like Power BI, with the ability to develop and implement strategies based on data insights.
  • You have COPC knowledge/certification, which is advantageous but not mandatory.

This role is required because we are supporting the critical path and continually growing business. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Fulfillment tech family is one of the pillars enabling Grab to out-serve our customers and partners in different businesses and marketplaces across Southeast Asia. We are working on high throughput, real-time distributed systems that use advanced software engineering techniques to solve hundreds of millions of requests per day. We are a distributed team in 4 different locations: Singapore, Beijing, Indonesia, and Malaysia. Our communication is in English, both in spoken and written form.

Our mission is to offer the best-in-class products and experiences to our driver partners as to increase the adoption and engagement of our services. Improve driver partner opportunities and efficiency in order to fulfill customer orders without fail, rain or shine. And to create efficient marketplaces by determining an optimal price that is both sustainable and loved by our partners and customers.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for an Automation Engineer for test automation. We believe a successful candidate has 2+ years’ experience as a Quality Engineer / Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer and is familiar with one of the test scripts Python/Golang/Java experiment for product automation, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. As an Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and enhancing automation tests for both backend services and mobile applications. This role is required because we are supporting the critical path and continually growing business. In return, you will get an opportunity to work with a creative team and help Southeast Asia people have a better life.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Design, develop, and execute automated test scripts using industry-standard test automation frameworks and tools for both backend services and mobile applications.
  • Lead team to define test plans, test specifications, test suites, test cases as well as proposed tools for functional, security, and performance testing in a programmatic manner
  • Enable the team to create and maintain test cases, test scenarios, and test data to ensure maximum test coverage and effectiveness.
  • Enable the team to perform functional, regression, and performance testing of backend services and mobile applications to identify defects and ensure product quality.
  • Understand the product/business/feature in-depth from the end-user's point of view and the underlying implementation. Collaborate with developers to analyze and troubleshoot issues, and provide detailed bug reports with clear steps to reproduce.
  • Work closely with the Product Manager, Frontend, and Backend developers to understand the context and the implementation to develop new automated tests and tools.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • A degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology or related fields
  • 2+ years of experience as QA Engineer/Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer
  • Solid understanding of test methodologies, test planning, and test case design
  • Have hands-on coding experience with test automation (Mobile app and API automation), including script languages (Python) or other languages (Javascript, Go etc.)
  • Proficiency in basic Linux commands and shell scripting
  • Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience using build and release pipeline tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD or equivalent

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

You will be reporting to SOX Senior Manager, and you will bring expertise in Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), audit, and risk advisory, with experience in Technology, FinTech, or E-commerce and excel in a collaborative environment. You will drive SOX and internal control initiatives for Grab's Order-to-Cash (OTC) revenue processesensuring compliance, scalable control design, and strong cross-functional alignment. This includes overseeing Internal Controls over Financial Reporting (ICFRs) and IT Application Controls (ITACs). You willl plan and lead the execution of the SOX Program for the Order-to-Cash (OTC) process, including process walkthroughs, risk assessment, control design evaluation, and testing for operational effectiveness. You will serve as a subject matter expert for OTC processes across Grab's various business verticals (e.g., Mobility, Deliveries, Ads), with a deep understanding of end-to-end revenue operations, data processing and financial reporting. You will partner with Business Units, Finance, Product, and Operations teams to document, evaluate, and influence product and operational flows impacting revenue recognition and SOX compliance. You will evaluate identified control deficiencies, coordinate with stakeholders to formulate remediation plans, and validate the effectiveness of corrective actions. You will provide advisory on risk and control design for new projects, system implementations, and business changes impacting revenue and financial reporting. You will deliver training and awareness sessions to strengthen control knowledge and promote accountability across functions. Experience performing granular financial reporting risk assessments, including the identification of specific risks and the design/evaluation of controls (manual, IT-dependent manual, ITACs, and IPE/key reports) for complex, automated revenue streams. job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team GrabShop is Grab's strategic initiative aimed at targeting social commerce. It is a unique product that enables social sellers to manage and grow their businesses in a seamless and integrated manner with their existing transaction flow. This is achieved by leveraging Grab's core capabilities in online cataloging, order management, payment, and fulfilment. Get to Know the Role You will report to the Senior Product Management Leader, Online Delivery Reliability, and you will drive the entire roadmap for a 0-1 product. You will have to work with senior stakeholders and translate Grab's grand vision about the product into prioritized and actionable steps and products that eventually meet the outcome. This role is based in Petaling Jaya and onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Oversee product concepts, roadmap, and strategies, ensuring agreement on goals and market trends. Promote market analysis, user research, and focus groups to validate product concepts and prototypes, developing business cases for new programmes. Collaborate with the design team to create compelling user experiences, and clear user stories for engineering teams. Coordinate with partners across the organisation to plan and implement product strategies, manage dependencies, oversee product roll-outs, and gather customer feedback. Lead product meetings with diverse team members to foster understanding and lead decision-making based on market insights and competitive landscape analysis. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

GrabShop is Grab's strategic initiative aimed at targeting social commerce. It is a unique product that enables social sellers to manage and grow their businesses in a seamless and integrated manner with their existing transaction flow. This is achieved by leveraging Grab's core capabilities in online cataloging, order management, payment, and fulfilment.

Get to Know the Role

You will report to the Senior Product Management Leader, Online Delivery Reliability, and you will drive the entire roadmap for a 0-1 product. You will have to work with senior stakeholders and translate Grab's grand vision about the product into prioritized and actionable steps and products that eventually meet the outcome.

This role is based in Petaling Jaya and onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Oversee product concepts, roadmap, and strategies, ensuring agreement on goals and market trends.
  • Promote market analysis, user research, and focus groups to validate product concepts and prototypes, developing business cases for new programmes.
  • Collaborate with the design team to create compelling user experiences, and clear user stories for engineering teams.
  • Coordinate with partners across the organisation to plan and implement product strategies, manage dependencies, oversee product roll-outs, and gather customer feedback.
  • Lead product meetings with diverse team members to foster understanding and lead decision-making based on market insights and competitive landscape analysis.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You will have at least 5 years of direct experience in product management at a tech company in either platform or user-centric products.
  • You will need to showcase your experience managing the product lifecycle including initial concept, market research, defining product requirements, working with teams and ongoing product management
  • You will have experience applying qualitative sense-making with quantitative, data-driven insights, ensuring that all decisions are grounded in analysis and practical understanding.
  • You will have experience conveying complex concepts and strategies to team members. This includes distilling technical details for non-technical leadership, translating strategic goals for engineering teams, and providing applicable guidance for operations.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. The Group Marketplace team manages Grab's marketplaces across Southeast Asia. You will work with stakeholders across multiple departments to drive business improvements via marketplace levers such as pricing, incentives, and allocation. The team also generates business insights and proposes data-driven strategic plans to grow the business across both transport and deliveries.
