  • As a Marketplace Analyst for Grab's transport business in Malaysia, you will use data-driven insights to create a sustainable, reliable, and efficient marketplace.
  • You will collaborate with different teams, including Product and Country Operations, and work with large datasets in piecing data together to form insights.
  • You will report into the Strategy & Projects Manager and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will lead projects involving cross-functional teams to improve metrics on all sides of the marketplace.
  • You will propose new experiments and manage the end-to-end experimentation process, including design, rollout, and analysis of results.
  • You will monitor marketplace metrics, investigate anomalies, and troubleshoot with the product team when needed.
  • You will develop both tactical solutions and longer-term strategic plans to improve marketplace dynamics.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 4 year of working experience in a related field and must be comfortable analysing complex datasets to draw insights.
  • You will manage projects involving multiple teams, ensuring that all milestones are met.
  • You can break down complex problems into actionable solutions based on data insights.
  • You seek to understand the marketplace economics and impactful opportunities.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Our team drives Grab's growth by optimizing media spend, aligning resources, and building high-impact campaigns. As a strategic partner, we collaborate across Marketing, Operations, media partners, and agencies to ensure seamless execution and successful product launches. With expertise in performance marketing, we maximize campaign efficiency and ROI through data-driven insights. Our end-to-end campaign management ensures every media touchpoint aligns with Grab's goals. Through cross-channel integration, we create a cohesive presence across digital, OOH, TV, and radio, directly impacting Daily Transacting Users (DTUs) and brand awareness.

Get to Know the Role

As a dynamic and visionary Regional Head of Performance Marketing, you will lead Grab's digital performance marketing strategy. In this leadership role, you will own and optimize user acquisition, retention, and engagement across all digital channels while ensuring seamless alignment with CRM, brand, and local marketing efforts. Your strategic expertise will be key in driving a customer-centric approach that maximizes ROI and enhances Grab's market leadership.

You will report to the Regional Head of Growth Capabilities (Performance Marketing & Media). This role is based onsite at Grab Petaling Jaya office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

New User Acquisition & Churn Reactivation

  • Develop and execute digital performance marketing strategies across paid channels to drive business growth.
  • Leverage data-driven insights from internal and external sources to optimize media planning and buying.
  • Establish best-in-class digital media tools, KPIs, and attribution models to improve campaign effectiveness.
  • Partner with Country Marketing Heads to localize and enhance digital strategies.
  • Manage relationships with media agencies and vendors.

Retention & Engagement

  • Innovate and refine customer engagement strategies through continuous testing and optimization.
  • Expand retargeting capabilities using the latest technology and media solutions.

Cross-Sell & Growth

  • Drive adoption of Grab's expanding service verticals through targeted performance campaigns.
  • Define and track ROAS metrics to optimize spend and maximize impact.

Brand & CRM Collaboration

  • Align performance marketing with brand-building initiatives to strengthen top-of-mind awareness.
  • Partner with CRM teams to integrate owned and paid channels for a unified customer experience.

Leadership & Team Development

  • Lead and grow a regional marketing team.
  • Champion digital marketing best practices and foster collaboration across functions.
  • Enhance processes and capabilities to boost efficiency and ROI.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 10+ years of experience in digital performance marketing
  • Experience leading teams, with the ability to inspire and mentor a diverse team.
  • Expertise in digital advertising technologies, attribution modeling, and data-driven decision-making.
  • Experience building and maintaining relationships with a diverse range of cross functional stakeholders
  • Ability to maintain performance and focus while adapting to changing environments

Additional Information

  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

As a member of Grab for Business, you'll be part of a team that simplifies business transportation, corporate food & package deliveries, and related services for companies across Southeast Asia.

Grab for Business is the B2B SaaS team within Grab that engages with top companies and brands across Southeast Asia. We'd like to to grow our key account management and are looking for a Senior/Key Account Manager to grow an expanding portfolio of top Singapore enterprise clients.

Get to Know the Role

You'll manage a portfolio of Singapore companies, using data-backed insights to achieve revenue goals, and ensuring client satisfaction. You'll report to the Sales Manager, Grab for Business (Singapore).

This role will report onsite to Singapore Grab Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Grow relationships with Singapore based enterprise clients. Use client and industry insights to pitch and cross-sell our platform products to meet revenue targets.
  • Prospect for new business, create opportunities, and track performance against sales targets.
  • Work with partners to meet consumer needs and performance goals.
  • Maintain connections with clients and understand their needs to resolve issues and identify upselling opportunities.
  • Use Salesforce CRM to lead account-specific growth strategies and present data-driven insights to achieve revenue goals.
  • Create business plans that grow client performance and work on new projects and launches.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's Degree
  • You have at least 3 to 6 years of key account management experience in a B2B or SaaS environment, handling multinational clients.
  • Track record in achieving sales targets; build and sustain long-term client relationships.
  • Proficiency in using Salesforce CRM and conducting in-depth data analysis to inform business strategies.
  • Experience establishing communication and engagement with prospects to develop strategic approaches and solutions that address client needs.
  • Comfortable with data analysis tools

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know the Team

Procure-to-Pay (PTP) team is responsible for processing and managing outgoing payments for our company, ensuring payments are made promptly. We collaborate with different team to support seamless financial operations and contribute to successful month-end closing activities.

Get to know the Role

  • The position will be reporting to Finance Manager, PTP and shall be responsible in supporting all Accounts Payable related activities.
  • Key accountabilities includes ensuring service delivery in accordance to SLAs / KPIs and quality review.
  • Provides clear direction and leadership to the team in line with Finance Ops Support & Services strategy.

This role is based on-site in our Petaling Jaya office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will support the Manager in identifying areas for process optimization and perform quality reviews to ensure adherence to defined policies and procedures.
  • You will perform several tasks related to transaction processing, including investigation, resolution, and escalation of issues.
  • You will ensure input VAT/GST is accounted for accurately in accordance with the regulations of multiple SEA countries.
  • You will maintain internal documentation, SOPs, and metric controls.
  • You will perform periodical performance reporting to ensure adherence to Service Level Agreements and monitor Key Performance Indicators.
  • You will lead, develop, and appraise the Accounts Payable Team, and handle ad hoc assignments when needed.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's Degree in Finance/Accounting and/or Professional Qualification (ACCA/CIMA/CPA).
  • Knowledgeable on P2P and AP processes with hands-on experience and financial impact
  • Leadership qualities with a minimum of 3 years of lead role
  • Knowledge of AP process with in-depth knowledge of legal/regulatory requirements

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know our Team:

GrabAds allows Advertisers, Agencies, and Merchants to engage the Grab Audience via innovative online and offline advertising experiences. Through our unique ecosystem and transacting user base, our clients are able to reach their desired audiences at scale, while driving measurable business outcomes.

We would like You to join our journey to create value for our users, drivers, merchants, and advertising partners, while continuing to make everyday lives better across Southeast Asia.

Get To Know The Role

As part of the GrabAds Malaysia team, you will source & sell-through advertisers for campaigns with GrabAds across both offline & online. You will pitch leading advertisers directly & through their agencies. You will work with your team and maintain a pipeline tracking towards a quarterly quota under incentive scheme.

You'll work cross-functionally with Marketing, Rewards, Payments, Food, Enterprise & business development to package compelling solutions & identify new client opportunities. Your goal is multi-million dollar annual revenue generation and showing advertisers positive results.

You will report into the Head, GrabAds Malaysia and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will pitch and win clients for GrabAds campaigns.
  • You will build and maintain high-level media buying relationships.
  • You will manage the pipeline, handle sales forecasting, and generate key sales reports with business KPIs.
  • You will run local pitches and RFPs and develop Joint-Business Plans (JBPs) with key partners.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have 4 years of digital media sales experience in Malaysia, with experience working with and selling to senior marketing leaders on both the agency and brand sides.
  • You have experience establishing communication and engagement with prospects, with the ability to effectively engage with stakeholders at different levels.
  • You are experience researching and generating leads with a strong bias for data-based decisions.
  • You are a team player with the ability to work across a matrix environment in a setting.
  • You have experience maintaining clean records of sales outreach and contacts in a CRM with the ability to manage multiple accounts.
  • You have previous sales forecasting experience.
  • You have a proven track record of delivering against targets on a quarterly basis under an incentive scheme.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Service Management Platform team at Grab is a dynamic group of engineers dedicated to enhancing our Services' lifecycle management processes and deployment pipelines. We foster a collaborative environment where innovation thrives, and team members are encouraged to share ideas and solutions. Our diverse backgrounds and expertise allow us to solve complex challenges and drive impactful results.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer, Fullstack to join the Service Management Platform Team. You will be reporting to the Engineering Manager. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining robust service orchestration and deployment solutions that ensure the reliability and performance of our systems.

This is an onsite role based in First Avenue, Petaling Jaya.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will build service orchestration pipelines to handle service creation, lifecycle management, and deprecation of Microservices across Grab's systems.
  • You will define and implement Service definitions and standards, design robust and consistent orchestration flows to management the Service lifecycle.
  • You will work with other stakeholders to integrate Service and deployment best practices into team workflows.
  • You will be part of the platformization braintrust, contributing to best inter-platform communication practices by design robust API interactions.
  • You will contribute to on-call rotations and post-incident analyses.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
  • 5+ years of Fullstack software engineering experience, with proficiency in backend (Go, Kotlin, Python, Java) and frontend (React, Angular) languages.
  • Strong knowledge of distributed systems, microservices architecture, and cloud platforms (AWS), with ability to debug and scale complex systems.
  • Experience with CI/CD tools, Infrastructure-as-Code (e.g., Terraform), and orchestration languages (e.g., Ansible).
  • Familiarity with logging and monitoring frameworks (e.g., ELK stack, Datadog, Grafana, Splunk).
  • Experience in Platform Engineering or Site Reliability Engineering (SRE).

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS) strives to be a technology leader providing predictive and seamless experiences to all Grab employees (Grabbers). We are looking for individuals who share our customer-centric and values to join our growing team.

You will report to the Support Manager.

You will work onsite and office location will be based in Vietnam

Get to Know the Role

The Senior EUC L2 Support Engineer plays a critical role in ensuring the stability, performance, and security of network infrastructure while maintaining the support other IT services, including Cloud Server and Contact Center Telephony (Voice). Additionally, you will be a backup to the IT Country Manager during extended absences, ensuring continuity in IT operations

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Network & IT Services Support & Incident Resolution

  • Resolve complex network and IT service issues, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations.
  • Provide L2 support for network infrastructure, including switches, routers, firewalls, VPNs, and wireless systems.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve connectivity issues, including LAN/WAN performance problems, security concerns, and VoIP-related issues.
  • Support additional IT services such as Cloud Server management and Contact Center Telephony (Voice), assisting in troubleshooting, configuration, and performance optimization.
  • Coordinate with vendors, service providers, and our teams to escalate and resolve critical issues.
  • Apply workarounds and permanent solutions to restore IT services, ensuring compliance with IT service management (ITSM) best practices.
  • Maintain detailed records of incidents, resolutions, and cause analyses to improve problem management and service delivery.

Performance Monitoring & Optimization

  • Monitor network and IT system performance, including availability, throughput, and resource use.
  • Identify and address performance bottlenecks and security vulnerabilities.
  • Analyze trends and provide recommendations to improve system efficiency.

System Health Checks & Preventive Maintenance

  • Conduct regular assessments to verify system security, performance, and capacity compliance.
  • Develop proactive maintenance plans to reduce potential issues.
  • Implement countermeasures based on assessment findings to enhance system reliability.

Report & Documentation

  • Report on network and IT service performance, incidents, and resource use.
  • Create periodic reports for partners, outlining main insights and action plans.
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation for IT infrastructure and processes.

CMDB Compliance & Data Accuracy

  • Ensure accurate CMDB (Configuration Management Database) updates and compliance with data management standards.
  • Maintain up-to-date records of IT assets, configurations, and relationships.

Cross-Functional IT Support & Leadership

  • Provide support for End User Computing (EUC), including troubleshooting desktops, laptops, and mobile devices.
  • Manage user accounts, permissions, and security policies.
  • Be a backup for the IT Country Manager, ensuring a smooth IT operations during their absence.
  • Participate in IT projects, initiatives, and training programs to enhance team capabilities.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor degree in IT/Network major
  • At least 5 years of experience in network support and IT service management.
  • For diagnosing network and IT system issues.
  • Familiarity with cloud services, telephony solutions, and IT infrastructure.
  • Manage and document incidents, changes, and performance analytics.
  • Leadership capability to act as a secondary IT management.
  • Have at least one professional network certification issued by an industry-recognized vendor, demonstrating advanced skills in networking concepts, protocols, and technologies.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We are a mix of young and experienced individuals, all motivated to make a societal impact in Southeast Asia. Grab B2B, the B2B SaaS team within Grab, simplifies business transportation, corporate food & package deliveries, OVO payment, Grab Marketing Services, GrabGifts and Corporate utilities for companies across Southeast Asia. We engage with top companies and brands, focusing on successful key account management.

Get to Know the Role

You will manage Professional Services and Tech account portfolio, using client, industry, and data insights to upsell and cross-sell platform products, aiming to achieve revenue goals and exceed client expectations. Sales skills are necessary , as you will need to create prospects and maintain pipeline, while tracking performance against sales targets. Additionally, you will also collaborate with partners across departments to develop solutions that meet consumer needs and achieve performance goals. You will report to the Mid Market Leader. You will be based onsite in the Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will oversee a portfolio of leading Professional Services and Tech accounts, using insights to foster relationship within the broader client's organization to increase upselling and cross-sell opportunities
  • Encourage a pipeline of deals while monitoring performance against sales targets to reach revenue goals.
  • Gain a comprehensive understanding of Grab B2B products and business solutions.
  • Use data and draw insights to present account plans and perform data analysis using Salesforce CRM
  • Implement growth strategies tailored to specific accounts.
  • Set revenue targets and develop business plans.
  • Contribute to new programs and launches to strengthen Grab B2B's position as a market leader.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have a min. of Bachelor's Degree in business, management, or relevant field of study
  • You will have a min. 4+ years of experience working with or in Professional Services and Tech B2B Sales, Software IT, Saas, corporate environment (direct client-facing role)
  • Experience generating sales, clients success and key accounts performer in achieving and even exceeding sales targets.
  • Willing to self-improve and to learn about the Grab B2B platform, Grab's multiple products, processes and stakeholders.
  • Have a deep desire to excel and develop a career in a high-growth tech startup. Have demonstrated integrity and respect in the performance of their responsibilities.
  • Proficiency in using Salesforce CRM.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

A strong understanding and experience in the cybersecurity domain, along with relevant security certifications (such as AWS Security Specialty, CCSP, CEH, etc.), would be a significant advantage. Experience in Devsecops toolings like SAST and Dependency scanners is a plus. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

As an engineer at Grab, you are at the core of the company's mission and spirit. Our passion shines through the work we do, driving a meaningful impact on millions of lives every day. We take pride in building exceptional services and tools that support millions of passengers, driver-partners, and colleagues across the organization.

You will join a team dedicated to ensuring the security of our code and infrastructure, a responsibility that spans one of the largest deployments in the region.

Get to Know the Role

Join our dynamic Security Engineering Team as a Senior Security Engineer and steer the future of cloud security. If you have experience in cloud engineering, infrastructure automation, integration, and development, we are eager to see what you can bring to our team. We're expanding our regional security presence, offering you the chance to shape some of the most complex architectures and safeguard one of the largest cloud operations in the region.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • **Pioneering Projects**: Design and build a cutting-edge, secure infrastructure platform to deliver exceptional Grab Services.
  • **Innovative Environment**: Evolve and manage state-of-the-art security tools, including EDR, CNAPP, Vulnerability scanners, and Code Security Scanners.
  • **Scale with Technology**: Spearhead the creation of security automation solutions to boost efficiency and scalability.
  • **Collaborative Culture**: Work closely with cross-functional teams to embed security within the software development lifecycle and CI/CD pipelines.
  • **Impact and Growth**: Drive success by surpassing SLAs, optimizing Security Engineering KPIs, and elevating performance standards.
  • **Supportive Community**: Engage in on-call rotations, ensuring smooth infrastructure operations and leading incident management and troubleshooting efforts.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Proven experience in developing and maintaining production systems/applications on any public cloud services (AWS, Azure or GCP)
  • Programming skills in any languages
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.

The Nice-to-Haves

  • Ability to perform automation using Terraform/Ansible/Chef/Puppet, Docker/Kubernetes, and any one CI tools (e.g. Jenkins, Gitlab, Travis CI etc.)
  • Experienced in vulnerability management, patching automation, and understanding of VA/PT techniques
  • Demonstrated proficiency in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines, particularly in platforms such as GitLab and Jenkins.
  • A strong understanding and experience in the cybersecurity domain, along with relevant security certifications (such as AWS Security Specialty, CCSP, CEH, etc.), would be a significant advantage.
  • Experience in Devsecops toolings like SAST and Dependency scanners is a plus.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Life at Grab

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Guided by The Grab Way and our four core values of Heart, Hunger, Honour, and Humility, we make a lasting difference for Southeast Asia by creating economic empowerment for everyone.

Job Description

Get to know the team:

As part of the Singapore Operations team, the Grab Merchant team looks at how we can engage our Merchants and help partner them in growing their business on Grab.

Get To Know The Role

You will be responsible for driving increased engagement with the merchants, as measured by the increase in merchants visiting the centre and participating in our various initiatives.

You will report to the Lead of Grab Merchant Centre and reports on-site in Singapore office.

The Day-to-day Activities

  • Deliver excellent customer service to Merchants that come in through the Grab Merchant Centre and provide recommendations according to their requirements
  • Organise and deliver workshop sessions & events that educates Merchants on Grab’s offerings and drives adoption of them
  • Partner with cross-functional teams to develop and drive initiatives to grow the GMC
  • Provide data-driven recommendations to Merchants based on in-depth analysis of Merchants’ business performance on Grab
  • Structure OneGrab partnerships with unmanaged Merchants - including working with Marketing, Product and Business teams to ensure the success of the partnership
  • Identify ways to improve internal GMC processes to enhance operational efficiency

Qualifications

  • Bachelor (or above) degree in Business/ Management or equivalent
  • You have at least 1 year of experience in account management, sales, business development, partnerships, or equivalent role
  • Strong presentation skills to effectively deliver workshop sessions & events

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_title: Senior System Analyst, Finance Systems - P2P Lead
job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to know the team: At Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS), we revolutionise the technology experience for every Grabber. Our mission is to empower our team with seamless and innovative solutions that enhance their daily work. We are a diverse group of forward-thinkers committed to creating personalised IT experiences. If you're passionate about customer-centric innovation and eager to make a significant impact on technology at Grab, come join us and help shape the future of technology. Get to know the Role Reporting to Solutions Manager II, Finance Systems, you will be contributing to Grab's ERP enhancements and deployments. You will need relatively strong experience in managing and leading projects and enhancements within ERP landscapes covering Procure To Pay (P2P) processes; Order To Cash (O2C) and R2R (Record To Report) for this role. Experienced candidates who have played a part in Development, Maintenance and/or Transformation of Financial and Procurement Systems for global organizations should apply here! This role will be based in Jakarta and onsite. The Day-to-Day Activities Act as a Procure To Pay Solutions Lead by ensuring that solutions meet business needs and requirements. Identify gaps in processes and make sound recommendations to stakeholders. Make recommendations of configurations and deployments lifecycles to ensure projects' successes. Share your insights and solution plans to cross-functional and technical team members, management and stakeholders. Identify and support auditing needs e.g. reporting and making sense out of logs. Support in creating business & technology roadmaps with Finance, Procurement & GTS leadership, and manage resource allocated (budgets) to execute on vision. Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements. Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users. Be a driver of change for Finance and Procurement & GTS to continuously improve our ability to serve Grabbers; includes identifying gaps in processes, data lifecycle or new relevant releases in platform offerings. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need At least 5 years of experience Experience with configuring Oracle Procurement Cloud (Contracts, Requisitions, Purchase Orders, Supplier Management, BPM Approval Workflow), including integrations to external systems. Experience with configuring Oracle Financials Cloud Payables (Invoice, payment, BPM Approval Workflow, IDR), including integrations to external systems. Experience in AI, automations and integrations to external systems. Strong and deep knowledge in change/enhancement requests lifecycles e.g. config/development, SIT/UAT, release packaging/management within Financial ERP space. Ability to make sense and detect impacts e.g. if enhancements are made to a process, what other processes/data points are impacted in ERP. Understand prioritization of enhancements e.g. what should come first to avoid risks/impacts. Experienced in managing internal and external auditors asks for relevant finance processes and governance requirements. Experienced implementing SOX compliance & audit controls for financial and planning systems (e.g. Change Management, Release Management). The Nice-to-Haves Experience in Oracle SCM Cloud (i.e. Inventory Management, Supply Chain Planning, Order management) and Oracle Financials Cloud R2R. Knowledge on Order To Cash (O2C) and Record To Report (R2R) system and business processes. Basic Knowledge on SQL & Reporting tools (OTBI, BI) Knowledge of COSO & COBIT frameworks. Knowledge and direct experience with ERP, EPM and MDM. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know the team:

At Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS), we revolutionise the technology experience for every Grabber. Our mission is to empower our team with seamless and innovative solutions that enhance their daily work. We are a diverse group of forward-thinkers committed to creating personalised IT experiences. If you're passionate about customer-centric innovation and eager to make a significant impact on technology at Grab, come join us and help shape the future of technology.

Get to know the Role

Reporting to Solutions Manager II, Finance Systems, you will be contributing to Grab's ERP enhancements and deployments. You will need relatively strong experience in managing and leading projects and enhancements within ERP landscapes covering Procure To Pay (P2P) processes; Order To Cash (O2C) and R2R (Record To Report) for this role. Experienced candidates who have played a part in Development, Maintenance and/or Transformation of Financial and Procurement Systems for global organizations should apply here!

This role will be based in Jakarta and onsite.

The Day-to-Day Activities

  • Act as a Procure To Pay Solutions Lead by ensuring that solutions meet business needs and requirements.
  • Identify gaps in processes and make sound recommendations to stakeholders.
  • Make recommendations of configurations and deployments lifecycles to ensure projects' successes.
  • Share your insights and solution plans to cross-functional and technical team members, management and stakeholders.
  • Identify and support auditing needs e.g. reporting and making sense out of logs.
  • Support in creating business & technology roadmaps with Finance, Procurement & GTS leadership, and manage resource allocated (budgets) to execute on vision.
  • Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements.
  • Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users.
  • Be a driver of change for Finance and Procurement & GTS to continuously improve our ability to serve Grabbers; includes identifying gaps in processes, data lifecycle or new relevant releases in platform offerings.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 5 years of experience
  • Experience with configuring Oracle Procurement Cloud (Contracts, Requisitions, Purchase Orders, Supplier Management, BPM Approval Workflow), including integrations to external systems.
  • Experience with configuring Oracle Financials Cloud Payables (Invoice, payment, BPM Approval Workflow, IDR), including integrations to external systems.
  • Experience in AI, automations and integrations to external systems.
  • Strong and deep knowledge in change/enhancement requests lifecycles e.g. config/development, SIT/UAT, release packaging/management within Financial ERP space.
  • Ability to make sense and detect impacts e.g. if enhancements are made to a process, what other processes/data points are impacted in ERP.
  • Understand prioritization of enhancements e.g. what should come first to avoid risks/impacts.
  • Experienced in managing internal and external auditors asks for relevant finance processes and governance requirements.
  • Experienced implementing SOX compliance & audit controls for financial and planning systems (e.g. Change Management, Release Management).

The Nice-to-Haves

  • Experience in Oracle SCM Cloud (i.e. Inventory Management, Supply Chain Planning, Order management) and Oracle Financials Cloud R2R.
  • Knowledge on Order To Cash (O2C) and Record To Report (R2R) system and business processes.
  • Basic Knowledge on SQL & Reporting tools (OTBI, BI)
  • Knowledge of COSO & COBIT frameworks.
  • Knowledge and direct experience with ERP, EPM and MDM.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Marketing Partnership team at Grab conceptualizes and implements go-to-market activities with target partners to improve the lives and experience of our drivers and passengers alike.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Marketing Partnership Manager, you will work with the Business Development team, departments marketing, and other marketing support teams. You will drive strategic partnerships with partners from FMCG to manage and maximize Grab's assets and portfolio nationwide. You will work onsite in our Jakarta Head Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Work with partners to conceptualize Grab marketing partnership campaigns from start to finish (planning, execution, and reporting).
  • Build Grab's new user base by thinking of ways to maximise user's conversion from partners to Grab.
  • Identify and qualify potential partners for lead generation (new to Grab Apps users)
  • Work with different teams including Business Development, departments marketing, creative, and marketing channels (Social Media, Paid Ads, GrabAds, etc) to support marketing partnership activation.
  • Help the team to develop pitch decks to communicate ideas and partnership opportunities to target partners.
  • Analyse incoming partnership proposals and make suggestions for upper management review.
  • Review and maintain Grab's overall marketing asset valuations for use in barter calculation.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 5+ years of experience in a marketing partnership role, used to co-creating campaign strategy with partners
  • Bachelor's degree from reputable university
  • Comfortable in influencing partners through executive-level presentation delivery
  • Proficiency in English both verbal and written
  • Experience with marketing communication strategy, channel optimization and media rate card assessment.
  • Excellent project management skills, and used to work with larger groups across internal and external teams.
  • Experience in FMCG to bring industry insights.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

About Grab and Our Workplace:

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to know our Team

Our dynamic and dedicated team at Grab is responsible for providing exceptional support to our commercial merchants. We work collaboratively to ensure operational excellence and drive business growth in the competitive marketplace. Together, we aim to make a significant impact on our clients' success.

The Critical Task You Will Perform

  • Provide weekly performance updates and conduct deep dive analyses (desk research or insights from Key Account Managers) for all working verticals in the commercial team, including GrabFood, GrabMart, OVO, GrabExpress, and Grab for Business. Primary focus will be on GrabFood Omni, OVO, GrabExpress, and Grab for Business.
  • Offer strategy and planning support for Dine Out Deals, OVO, GrabExpress, and Grab for Business, shaping and execute market strategies.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align strategies and ensure seamless execution of initiatives.
  • Monitor industry trends and competitive landscape to identify opportunities and threats for the business.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of processes and tools to enhance team efficiency and effectiveness.

  • Have Heart, Hunger, Honour, and Humility.
  • Self-motivation and independent learner who takes ownership of tasks and shows initiative in challenging the status quo.

  • 3+ years of experience with SQL, along with proficiency in data management tools.

  • Able to work well with others from different backgrounds in fast-paced, changing environments.
  • Strong organizational skills with attention to detail and a focus on inclusivity.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and our workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles—the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility—we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

Job Description

Get to know the Role:

  • We are seeking a motivated and result-driven Assistant Manager - SEA Strategic Collections to lead and support our Order To Cash (OTC) Regional team in achieving monthly collection targets and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
  • As the Assistant Manager, you will play a vital role in maximizing the conversion of receivables into cash for the business while ensuring adherence to Grab's policies and processes.
  • As an Assistant Manager - SEA Strategic Collections, you will be part of an exciting journey across multiple ASEAN countries where Grab operates, contributing significantly to the success of our Order To Cash team.

The Day-to-Day Activities

Team Leadership And Supervision

  • Supervise and support the collections team, providing guidance and training.
  • Monitor team performance, set goals, and conduct regular performance reviews.
  • Ensure compliance with company policies and legal requirements.

Collections Strategy And Management

  • Develop and implement effective collection strategies and processes.
  • Monitor and analyze collection metrics to identify areas for improvement.
  • Work closely with the Collections Manager to set collection targets and objectives.

Customer Interaction And Issue Resolution

  • Handle escalated collection issues and disputes.
  • Maintain positive relationships with key customers, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
  • Negotiate payment plans and settlements with customers as necessary.

Reporting And Analysis

  • Prepare regular reports on collection activities, performance metrics, and outstanding receivables.
  • Analyze data to identify trends and recommend corrective actions.
  • Provide insights and recommendations to senior management based on analysis.

Process Improvement

  • Continuously evaluate and improve collection processes and systems.
  • Implement best practices and innovative solutions to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.

Collaboration And Communication

  • Work closely with other departments, such as the Sales and billing team, to resolve issues impacting collections.
  • Communicate effectively with team members and management regarding collection activities and performance.

Qualifications

Qualifications:

Background

  • Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in collections or credit management
  • Prior experience in supervisory role will be preferred.

Skills

  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Excellent communication and negotiation abilities.
  • Proficient in Excel
  • Experience with the Oracle Financials Cloud system would be beneficial
  • Experience in data visualization tool, such as PowerBI will be an added advantage.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.
  • Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.

Personal Attributes

  • Problem-solving aptitude and ability to handle difficult situations .
  • High level of integrity and professionalism.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering high-quality service.

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab:

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive.
  • Embrace the magic of new life and create lasting memories with your family through Maternity and Paternity Leave.
  • Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
  • Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We’ve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

We deliver the greatest impact and ideas when we bring together diverse perspectives. It is what enables us to spread opportunities to Grabbers and our partners. It’s not a box-ticking exercise; it’s who we are.

Job Description

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a visionary and experienced Senior City Manager to join our team in Jakarta, Indonesia. As the Senior City Manager, you will help own the growth, strategy, and operations in area of Tangerang, Bogor and Depok. You'll be the visionary on the ground, turning data into strategy and leading a team to build a more efficient and sustainable plan.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Craft and lead the strategic roadmap for sustainable development across your cities.
  • Dive into metrics to uncover insights, spot opportunities, and prove what works.
  • Manage your region P&L, manage the budget and overseeing the execution to completion, ensuring resource allocation.
  • Collaborate with government, department heads, and community leaders to build policies or programs.
  • Oversee projects and city-wide projects, also implementation of cross regional projects.
  • Lead, coach, and enhance a diverse team from Operations, Marketing, Partnerships, and Driver Engagement.
  • Manage crisis situations and develop emergency response strategies

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Minimum of 10 years of experience in Operational, area management or a related field.
  • Knowledge of local areas, local development, local government operations, and sustainable city projects
  • Strategic planning and demonstrated ability in budget management and fiscal responsibility
  • Proficiency in project management and public speaking
  • Prior leadership experience
  • Crisis management skills

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We contribute to Grab's vision of being Southeast Asia's super app by providing everyday services that matter to consumers in Indonesia. We implement business strategies that help us achieve our vision in serving our community.

We are made up of an established, longstanding team. If you are looking for part of the team to achieve growth for Grab, then you should join our team!

Get to Know the Role

You will be the responsible person to manage Payment Operation to ensure all processes are performed and comply with the regulatory requirements. You will work within the Merchant Operations team and across the relevant teams to take the experience to the next level. Reporting to the Head Level, you will be based onsite in our Jakarta Head Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Collaborate with Grab support team, business team and all related team about daily reconciliation and incoming inquiries, to ensure optimum satisfaction from merchants
  • Oversee end-to-end payment operations, ensuring all the transactions are processed
  • Ensure all payment or cash out to merchants are smoothly implemented
  • Maintain reimbursement to merchants conducted
  • Ensure daily operational processes are completed following agreed Service level agreement and addressing the bottlenecks
  • Manage all incoming inquiries related to payment, from merchants and all stakeholders, providing clear resolutions
  • Support projects and process improvements, including payment processing, risk management, compliance, automation on contributing to the scalable & efficient operational workflow

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor Degree in Economic/ Accounting or all related with Finance
  • 2+ years of experience in Payment Operations, transaction processing, and reconciliations
  • Have knowledge about PPh 23 and PPh 22 and PB1
  • Experience in operations and workflow
  • Capability to converse in English (both written and verbal)
  • Familiarity with risk monitoring, compliance and fraud detection will be additional points
  • Ability in SQL will be additional points

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.

Get to Know the Role

As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
  • You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
  • You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
  • You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
  • You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
  • You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field.
  • Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area.
  • Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data.
  • Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation.
  • Exposure in ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage.
  • Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Get to Know the Team

Grab for Business is the B2B SaaS team within Grab that helps to simplify business transportation, corporate food & package deliveries and related services for companies across Southeast Asia. We actively engage with top companies and top brands and we must drive successful key account management in our organisation.

Get to Know the Role

As part of the Enterprise team at Grab For Business , you'll focus on farming existing and also acquiring new enterprise corporate clients, building relationships with partners, and using data-driven insights to increase growth. You will report to Manager, Grab for Business and work on site in Jakarta Office.

Present deal reviews and pipeline forecasts based on data-driven insights to provide a healthy pipeline and align with our goals.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We are a forward-looking team shaping the future of technology and society in Southeast Asia. Grab's Public Affairs team builds partnerships with the public sector to support national policy agendas, engages constructively with governments and other stakeholders on public policy discussions, and drives initiatives to harness the potential of technology to create impactful change.

Get to Know the Role

As a member of Public Affairs team, you will build lasting relationship, develop meaningful engagement, and strengthen advocacy with key government stakeholders and community organizations. You will report to the Director, National Public Affairs and provide strategic and implementation guidance and driving efforts on public policy topics.

This role is based onsite in our Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will build and nurture partnership programs with key stakeholders, including government entities and community organizations.
  • You will conduct in-depth analysis of relevant policies to identify opportunities, risks, and areas for strategic alignment for Grab in supporting nation's building.
  • You will draft and deliver communication materials and educational resources that articulate the business model and policy priorities, focusing on areas such as urban mobility, gig economy, and digital technology transformation for stakeholders.
  • You will design and streamline engagement strategies to ensure impactful and efficient collaboration with stakeholders.
  • You will partner with internal teams to align strategies, resolve challenges, and strengthen and align the advocacy.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • 7+ years of experience in public affairs, government relations, strategic project management, or partnerships development
  • A strong network with government entities, NGOs, academic institutions, and other relevant stakeholders across Indonesia.
  • Proven track record of developing and implementing successful public affairs strategies and campaigns
  • Strong understanding of government relations, policy development, and regulatory environments
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively across different stakeholders
  • Experience managing budgets and resources for large-scale projects and initiatives
  • Familiarity with industry trends, best practices, and emerging issues in public affairs and partnerships development

Additional Information

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Manage the employee lifecycle operations for the Malaysia Grab office, ensuring on-time delivery of services.
  • Track and use data to ensure process effectiveness and improvements
  • Support the Regional Benefits team in the launch of new benefit programmes locally
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance employee experience and ensure data integrity in HR systems.
  • Build operational rigour, identify scalable process improvements, and ensure compliance and governance around data in our systems and in HR processes.
  • Be an advisor to stakeholders, offering creative yet simple solutions for HR processes and addressing complex challenges for Malaysia Grabbers

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 3 years of HR operations experience, with familiarity in labour regulations across Southeast Asia.
  • Strong data analysis skills to identify trends and improve processes.
  • Proven ability to execute with a customer-centric mindset and navigate ambiguity effectively.
  • Experience in process excellence (e.g. six sigma) and change management.
  • Ability to multitask, manage projects independently, and deliver engaging presentations.
  • Willingness to travel occasionally.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
