job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We believe in developing mutually beneficial collaborations with corporate partners to enhance their business offerings and impact the lives of customers.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Managing Director, Group Business Development & Capital Markets, you will serve as a key member of the Grab Group Business Development team to develop commercial strategy for the assigned overall portfolio/ industry sector(s) via strategic partnerships

  • Take the lead to define key segments to target, drive projects/deals end-to-end from commercial negotiation to closure, to project management and execution and maintain key relationships at senior levels of large corporate institutions.
  • Drive and create new partnerships as well as harvest existing partnerships to accelerate growth for Grab overall, specific to the assigned portfolio(s)/ industries by working closely with multiple internal regional and local business and product/ ops/ engineering teams.
  • Support various group business development initiatives to ensure it meets company's objectives.

This is a hybrid role based in Singapore.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will define opportunities and strategies to form OneGrab strategic regional partnerships with leading global and regional partners in Southeast Asia.
  • You will develop, maintain, and leverage senior relationships across Asia, focusing on Northeast Asia.
  • You will execute Grab's strategic partnership priorities, collaborating across Grab's Mobility, Deliveries, Fintech, and B2B enterprise teams.
  • You will engage and communicate with prospects and partners to develop a compelling Grab value proposition tailored to their needs.
  • You will identify and create new leads, improving user, driver, and partner experiences while driving revenue.
  • You will lead business development initiatives, ensuring timely and targeted execution.
  • You will deliver regular business reviews to Grab management, outlining progress, challenges, and strategies for increasing adoption.
  • You will support a high-performing team culture and share best practices with regional business development teams.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have 6 or more years of experience in regional strategic partnerships.
  • Experience working with Japanese or Korean markets; and understand the cultural nuances important for strategic partnerships.
  • You blend business, strategy, finance, and legal concepts to lead complex, multi-faceted deals.
  • You have experience establishing and maintaining C-level relationships across Southeast Asia.
  • You have a strong track record in project management and stakeholder management.
  • You communicate effectively in writing and verbally, shaping clear messages and initiatives.
  • You have experience with tools such as Google Suite and PowerPoint.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

  • Our team is focused on driving sustainable business growth. You will work closely with regional commercial managers and functional managers. We are looking for a business expert who can collaborate with these teams to lead growth projects and support our expansion goals.

Get to Know the Role

  • You'll take ownership of identifying, refining and driving business growth projects. You'll collaborate with multiple team members to improve performance, refine operations, and support regional expansion. Your success requires an understanding of market dynamics and the ability to turn data into actionable strategies that fuel sustainable growth.
  • You will report into the Head, Commercial (Outer Cities) and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Growth & Ops Development

  • You will analyze market trends and regional dynamics in Malaysia to identify growth opportunities, using both internal and external data and insights.
  • You will synthesize localized insights and on-the-ground observations with data-driven findings to ensure strategy formulations are underpinned by quantitative metrics and qualitative local intelligence.
  • You will develop customized growth strategies aligned with corporate objectives, considering consumer behavior, competition, and economic conditions.

Operations Management

  • You will oversee and enhance daily operations to ensure compliance with corporate standards and resolve regional operational challenges.
  • You will establish key metrics and produce periodic reports to evaluate the efficacy of growth strategies, budget, timeline and operational enhancements.

Cross Function Collaboration & Problem Solving

  • You will participate in close collaboration with regional, marketing, and business solutions and regional teams to ensure synchronized strategic implementation.
  • You will facilitate interdepartmental sync ups, workshops and collaboration to foster unified efforts aimed at growth and optimization.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Strategic Management, or a related discipline.
  • You have at least 4+ or more years in strategy / project management / growth related roles.
  • You have experience within diverse regions of Malaysia and entrepreneurial experience.
  • You have demonstrated expertise in strategic planning, process optimization, and operational management and the ability to improvise them.
  • You have strong analytical skills with the ability to find actionable insights from complex data.
  • You have strong project management capabilities especially in communicating and prioritizing goals / action items with your stakeholders.
  • You are able to work both independently and as integral part of wider team

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The GrabFood Marketing team is a young and dynamic team responsible for driving business growth through Merchant's activity and consumer demand generation. We make an impact by creating an insightful marketing campaign and deliver the best execution to the market. If you are looking for a good team environment and having a passion in food, then you should join our team!

Get to Know the Role

You will report to the Marketing Head - Deliveries, and lead the planning, strategy and execution of marketing initiatives for our local lifestyle restaurant partners on GrabFood. While driving for our partner growths, you also ensure that the actions resonate with and delight end consumers. You will work with the key accounts & strategy team to ensure our marketing efforts align with company-wide objectives.

You will be based onsite at our Grab Bangkok Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Own sub-brands under GrabFood to unlock merchants potentials and achieve their growth through marketing initiatives
  • Develop comprehensive marketing strategies and plans: Address business challenges, capture user insights, and unlock user demand with tailored-made proposals
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work closely with the Strategy and Key Account team to identify opportunity, develop tailored solutions and own the marketing executions
  • Embrace data-driven decision-making: Utilize data analysis tools to prepare insightful reports, evaluate campaign performance, and measure success.
  • Manage end-to-end campaign execution: Support the marketing team in developing to executing campaign plans, ensuring a smooth implementation and maximum impact.
  • Manage budget: ensure efficiency of the given spending

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in the marketing field (either in consumer/brand marketing, B2B, campaign management, partnership marketing or marketing communications) with exposure to online and offline media. Experience in business development is a plus.
  • Strong project management skills, and stakeholder management
  • Be able to initiate, translate into creative ideas for campaign execution
  • Passion for food
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate clearly in both written and spoken English.
  • Loves the thrill of being in a fast-paced environment

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and our workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles—the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility—we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

Get to know the team

The Mobility team is one of the core business teams in Grab responsible for managing and optimizing all transport services countrywide. We make an impact by providing daily best transportation service to passengers and offering both jobs and more than earning opportunities for drivers. If you are looking for fast paced, great learnings and working with all brilliant people then you should join our team!

Get to know the role

We are looking for a Senior Associate Mobility Business with creativity to boost growth and strengthen the transportation market in Thailand. We believe a successful candidate has great data analysis, critical thinking skills, strong rationale to cope with upfront unexpectation and high responsibility to execute your own workstream, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. In return, you will get an opportunity to lead your own project and see the real impact from what you do alongside with your supporting teammates!

Job Description

The Day-to-Day Activities

  • Own and drive key business performance metrics and exploiting opportunities to drive and capture growth for mobility business with sharp focus on affordability services
  • Transform large sets of data to
    • identify room for marketplace improvement, propose and drive execution plan
    • track and assess performance of initiatives and come up with next steps
  • Manage multiple, critical, time-sensitive initiatives with stakeholders across the organization to ensure quick and effective execution
  • Onground visit key cities to gather insights, opportunities for both drivers and passengers and propose growth strategies
Qualifications

The Must-Haves

  • A Bachelor’s Degree or above in Economics, Business Administration, Engineering, Statistics, and or similar fields
  • 2-3 years work experience
  • A passion to solve problems, with strong quantitative, creative, data analysis and project management skills
  • Ability to work independently and a flexibility to adapt to a fast-paced team environment
  • Very good English proficiency

The Nice-to-Haves

  • Work experience in data analysis, project management
  • SQL proficiency

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab:

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive.
  • Embrace the magic of new life and create lasting memories with your family through Maternity and Paternity Leave.
  • Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
  • Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We’ve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

We deliver the greatest impact and ideas when we bring together diverse perspectives. It is what enables us to spread opportunities to Grabbers and our partners. It’s not a box-ticking exercise; it’s who we are.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to know the Team GrabRentals (GR) is a core pillar of Grab's Mobility business, with the primary goal of securing vehicular and productive driver-partner supply for Grab's ride-hailing marketplace. The GrabRentals team houses its own strategy, partner management & productivity, pricing & product design, sales, marketing, operations et al. functions, and also works with other teams in Grab spanning business, operations, tech, and analytics. In the Strategic Projects team, we are focused on ensuring the optimization of our existing business and the growth of new businesses including Autonomous Vehicles Get To Know The Role You will play an important role within the business team leading the execution of autonomous vehicle pilots. You will be someone on the ground, directly overseeing the human operators who are essential to our daily service and ensuring that vehicles are charged, prepped and maintained. This role is a blend of people management, operational planning, and incident response, focusing on the safe and efficient execution of our AV missions. You will report to the Head, GrabCab and Strategic Projects, onsite in our Grab one North Office. Responsibilities Be the primary supervisor for our team of safety supervisors, in-vehicle safety drivers, and remote operators. Your main responsibility is to ensure they are performing their responsibilities safely during daily operations. Manage all aspects of driver and operator scheduling, including shift assignments and timekeeping. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know the Team

GrabRentals (GR) is a core pillar of Grab's Mobility business, with the primary goal of securing vehicular and productive driver-partner supply for Grab's ride-hailing marketplace.

The GrabRentals team houses its own strategy, partner management & productivity, pricing & product design, sales, marketing, operations et al. functions, and also works with other teams in Grab spanning business, operations, tech, and analytics.

In the Strategic Projects team, we are focused on ensuring the optimization of our existing business and the growth of new businesses including Autonomous Vehicles

Get To Know The Role

You will play an important role within the business team leading the execution of autonomous vehicle pilots. You will be someone on the ground, directly overseeing the human operators who are essential to our daily service and ensuring that vehicles are charged, prepped and maintained. This role is a blend of people management, operational planning, and incident response, focusing on the safe and efficient execution of our AV missions.

You will report to the Head, GrabCab and Strategic Projects, onsite in our Grab one North Office.

Responsibilities

  • Be the primary supervisor for our team of safety supervisors, in-vehicle safety drivers, and remote operators. Your main responsibility is to ensure they are performing their responsibilities safely during daily operations.
  • Manage all aspects of driver and operator scheduling, including shift assignments and timekeeping. Collaborate with hiring and training teams on the hiring, onboarding, and training of all operational staff
  • Be the critical link between operations and the product/engineering teams. Translate operational challenges, insights, and opportunities into actionable feedback to guide the design and iteration of the product and service offerings
  • Oversee all on-site depot operations. This includes managing the efficient parking, charging, and staging of autonomous vehicles to ensure they are mission-ready. You will supervise depot staff and ensure all activities are performed safely.
  • Establish, track, and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs). You will be responsible for the continuous monitoring of performance metrics such as safety and uptime, identifying trends, and generating insights for improvement
  • Design, implement, and refine Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for all aspects of operations, including safety protocols, incident response and overall coordination. Uphold and enforce all operational safety protocols, both in-vehicle and at the depot. Ensure the team is compliant with all company policies and regulatory requirements

Qualifications

Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Diploma or Degree holders
  • You have at least 2 years of experience in operations, logistics, transportation, or fleet management
  • Technical knowledge or direct experience with autonomous vehicles, robotics or IoT deployments
  • Demonstrated experience supervising drivers, operators, or a field-based team is required
  • Familiarity with safety management systems and risk assessment methodologies

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

We are looking for a visionary Lead Software Engineer to join our dynamic team in Vietnam. As an important member of our engineering leadership, you will drive the development of modern software solutions, mentor team members, and contribute to the technical strategy of our organization. You will work onsite at Grab office, CMC Creative Space, D7, HCMC and report to the Engineering Manager.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Lead and mentor a team of software engineers, promoting a collaborative and work environment
  • Design and implement scalable software architectures, with a focus on stream processing and real-time data systems
  • Collaborate with teams to define project requirements and deliverables
  • Promote the use of best practices in software development, including code reviews, testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD)

  • Contribute to the definition and evolution of platform availability and reliability SLAs
  • Optimize system performance, scalability, and security across our software stack
  • Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies in software engineering and data processing

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
  • 7+ years of experience leading teams or projects in software engineering, data engineering, or information security disciplines
  • Proven expertise in stream processing technologies such as Apache Flink or Apache Spark Streaming
  • Strong proficiency in Scala or Java programming languages
  • Hands-on experience with Apache Kafka and other message queuing systems
  • Experience with distributed systems and microservices architecture
  • Experience with cloud platforms, preferably AWS
  • Strong system design and architecture skills
  • Proficiency in DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines

Strong Unix/Linux skills, including scripting (Python, shell, or similar), system administration, and troubleshooting in distributed environments. Job Description Get to Know the Team: The Payments Experience team at Grab is dedicated to crafting a seamless and unified payment journey for all users - whether online or offline. We are a dynamic, cross-functional team focused on delivering, high-quality experiences that meet user needs. By understanding our users, we design solutions that not only enhance usability but also drive meaningful growth. Get To Know The Role As a Lead Product Designer on the Payments team, you will lead product design outcomes for several problem space teams, ensuring quality and excellence across these areas. You will work collaboratively to explore user needs and create impactful solutions. You will report to the Senior Design Manager, Fintech. The role will fully work onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will drive product design outcomes and strategic direction across teams by leading complex initiatives and ensuring solutions address value, usability, feasibility, and viability. You will facilitate cross-domain, function, and team collaboration by driving discussions, workshops, and explorations to align and increase efficiencies. You will develop problem-framing approaches , design simple solutions to complex problems, and seamlessly integrate multiple products. You will independently navigate complexities, driving problem exploration, solution discovery, and delivery while helping designers in adjacent teams deliver better work. You will defend design decisions, communicate results and their implications to senior stakeholders, and support business/product stakeholders. You will produce visual designs that elevate quality, consistency, and user experience credibility, using prototyping tools to create interactive and realistic prototypes. You will dedicate time to research the latest advancements, experiment with innovative approaches, and apply Service Design, User Research, Front-end Development, Accessible Design, or Design Systems. Qualifications What Essential Skills You will Need: A minimum of 8 years of experience, with a portfolio demonstrating design process, shipped work, and influence. Experience working on cross-functional product teams. Strong fundamentals in interaction and visual design craft and practice. Experience coaching others in interaction design, visual design, or prototyping. Proficiency in mobile and front-end web standards, development, and tools like Figma, Protopie, After Effects. Experience in Service Design, User Research, Front-end Development, Accessible Design, or Design Systems is advantageous. Stay updated with the latest advancements and experimenting with new approaches to enhance design outcomes. Provide a portfolio of your recent design work in English, showcasing your contribution and the impact of your projects. Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team:

The Payments Experience team at Grab is dedicated to crafting a seamless and unified payment journey for all users - whether online or offline. We are a dynamic, cross-functional team focused on delivering, high-quality experiences that meet user needs. By understanding our users, we design solutions that not only enhance usability but also drive meaningful growth.

Get To Know The Role

As a Lead Product Designer on the Payments team, you will lead product design outcomes for several problem space teams, ensuring quality and excellence across these areas. You will work collaboratively to explore user needs and create impactful solutions. You will report to the Senior Design Manager, Fintech. The role will fully work onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will drive product design outcomes and strategic direction across teams by leading complex initiatives and ensuring solutions address value, usability, feasibility, and viability.
  • You will facilitate cross-domain, function, and team collaboration by driving discussions, workshops, and explorations to align and increase efficiencies.
  • You will develop problem-framing approaches , design simple solutions to complex problems, and seamlessly integrate multiple products.
  • You will independently navigate complexities, driving problem exploration, solution discovery, and delivery while helping designers in adjacent teams deliver better work.
  • You will defend design decisions, communicate results and their implications to senior stakeholders, and support business/product stakeholders.
  • You will produce visual designs that elevate quality, consistency, and user experience credibility, using prototyping tools to create interactive and realistic prototypes.
  • You will dedicate time to research the latest advancements, experiment with innovative approaches, and apply Service Design, User Research, Front-end Development, Accessible Design, or Design Systems.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You will Need:

  • A minimum of 8 years of experience, with a portfolio demonstrating design process, shipped work, and influence.
  • Experience working on cross-functional product teams.
  • Strong fundamentals in interaction and visual design craft and practice.
  • Experience coaching others in interaction design, visual design, or prototyping.
  • Proficiency in mobile and front-end web standards, development, and tools like Figma, Protopie, After Effects. Experience in Service Design, User Research, Front-end Development, Accessible Design, or Design Systems is advantageous.
  • Stay updated with the latest advancements and experimenting with new approaches to enhance design outcomes.
  • Provide a portfolio of your recent design work in English, showcasing your contribution and the impact of your projects. We recommend you provide clear context, outline your end-to-end workflow, and demonstrate how you go from problem discovery to launch.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. The Singapore Operations team drives business growth for Grab Singapore, aligning with Grab's vision through strategic initiatives. Within this, the GrabFood team, part of the Deliveries family, collaborates across departments to enhance growth for the GrabFood vertical.

Get to Know the Role

We are looking for a proactive intern who will assist the team with planning, researching, and analysing strategic plans. You will work independently, collaborate on projects, and help develop special projects. To succeed in this role, you will embody independence and rigour. You will be fully onsite, your internship will run from May to December (Full Time).

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will provide operational, analytical and project management support for GrabFood merchant campaigns, including setup, documentation, and post-campaign analysis
  • You will analyse data to facilitate decision-making, identify issues, and develop solutions
  • You will conduct market research on competitive landscape and growth opportunities
  • You will support planning and execution of projects

Qualifications

  • Undergraduate in Business/Engineering or other relevant courses
  • Familiar with spreadsheets (can perform complex functions) , databases, project management, and deck preparation
  • Comfortable in a startup VUCA (Volatile, Uncertain, Complex, and Ambiguous) environment
  • Express ideas in writing and verbally, and can foster positive interactions with team members
  • Write and improve SQL queries to transform data from diverse databases and sources
  • Experience in data dashboards, reports, and visualisations development.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Driver Experience Team is connected and integrated with other Grab development centres that we consider strategic development centres. We improve a broad product portfolio that spans the entire driver lifecycle, including app experience, partner efficiency, and incentive and earnings products across Southeast Asia. Our focus includes the Mobility, Deliveries, and Payments businesses to be the preferred platform for driver partners across Southeast Asia. We aim to meet drivers' earnings expectations while ensuring the platform is rewarding and user-friendly.

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Head of Product, Driver Earnings and Progression, you will build products and features for SEA's driver partner community. You have experience launching new products at a tech company and taking ideas from experimental stages through to delivery.

This role is critical as the marketplace adapts and evolves. You will lead a cross-functional team across multiple regions, collaborating with top tech talent in Southeast Asia.

This role is based in Petaling Jaya and onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Oversee product concepts, roadmap, and strategies, ensuring agreement on goals and market trends.
  • Promote market analysis, user research, and focus groups to validate product concepts and prototypes, developing business cases for new programmes.
  • Collaborate with the design team to create compelling user experiences, and clear user stories for engineering teams.
  • Coordinate with partners across the organisation to plan and implement product strategies, manage dependencies, oversee product roll-outs, and gather customer feedback.
  • Lead product meetings with diverse team members to foster understanding and lead decision-making based on market insights and competitive landscape analysis.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You will have at least 5 years of direct experience in product management at a tech company in either platform or user-centric products, with some experience in consumer-facing products.
  • You will need to showcase your experience managing the product lifecycle including initial concept, market research, defining product requirements, working with teams and ongoing product management
  • You will have experience applying qualitative sense-making with quantitative, data-driven insights, ensuring that all decisions are grounded in analysis and practical understanding.
  • You will have experience conveying complex concepts and strategies to team members. This includes distilling technical details for non-technical leadership, translating strategic goals for engineering teams, and providing applicable guidance for operations.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. Job Description

Get to Know the Team

GrabAds allows advertisers such as brands and media agencies to use Grab Audience by online and offline advertising experiences.

Through our unique ecosystem and transacting user base, our clients can reach their desired audiences at scale, while driving measurable outcomes.

We would like YOU to join our journey to create value for our users, drivers, merchants, and advertising partners, while continuing to make everyday lives better across Southeast Asia.

Get to Know the Role

As part of Grab, Client Partnerships Philippines team, you will source and sell-through advertisers for campaigns with Grab Ads across both offline and online. You will pitch leading advertisers directly and through their agencies. You will work with the Grab Ads team and maintain a pipeline tracking towards a quarterly quota under an incentive scheme. Your goal is multi-million dollar annual revenue generation and showing advertisers positive results.

You will report directly to the Head, Client Partnerships. You will be based onsite at our Ortigas office with flexible work arrangements.

The Critical Tasks You will Perform

  • Pitch and win clients for GrabAds campaigns to set off new and returning clients.
  • Work with the Accounts Manager to help implement a campaign meeting and managing client's expectations.
  • Lead & Strategise existing main accounts
  • 80% Looking for new business; 20% Farming and upselling to existing accounts
  • Experience servicing Media Agencies and have existing relationships with most agency partners and direct brands.
  • Have a clear knack for winning media briefs, creating pitches for long-term/short-term wins

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You will Need

  • Minimum 3 or more years of experience in digital media sales in the Philippines; preferably w/ marketing/sales operations background.
  • Experience working and selling to senior marketing leaders on the agency and brand side
  • Previous sales experience selling in advertising or in sales operations
  • Familiarity/Expertise with out of home advertising in sales is a plus
  • Experience achieving targets on a quarterly basis under an incentive/compensation scheme.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Integrity team is dedicated to safeguarding our users on Grab. We use our datasets to address multiple challenges, from ensuring safety to preventing fraud. We are involved in the entire data lifecycle, including analyzing user behavior, identifying anomalies, and developing detection and prevention modules for suspicious activities. If you're enthusiastic about solving complex problems that have a direct, real-world impact, we'd love to have you on board!

Get to Know the Role

Reporting to the Senior Analytics Manager in the Integrity team (Trust, Identity & Safety), you will help analyze data to understand user behaviors and identify potential risks on our platform. Your insights will guide strategies to safeguard our diverse user base from multiple types of fraud and risk.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will analyze user and transaction data to uncover patterns, trends, and issues, aiding in the creation of inclusive and effective abuse prevention policies.
  • You will enhance detection by swiftly identifying latest trends and developing data-driven rules and strategies to address potential risks.
  • You will conduct statistical analyses to ensure detection systems align with industry standards, refining policies, strategies, and controls.
  • You will build and maintain dashboards for all stakeholders to provide visibility of key metrics, patterns and detection efficiency
  • You will collaborate across teams to address risks associated with Grab's products, processes, and payment methods, serving as a strategic partner in risk management decisions.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 2 years of experience as a hands-on analyst in a high-tech company
  • A technical degree in Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Data Sciences, Maths or related fields.
  • Experience in handling large-scale unstructured data. Experience in SQL or other data handling tools.
  • Business intelligence experience using tools such as PowerBI or Tableau.
  • Experience with any of the data analysis tools such as R or Python.
  • Experience with the application of experimentation and statistical techniques (such as hypothesis testing, probability distributions, regression, decision trees).
  • Understanding of the risk management space in digital ecosystems.
  • Proficiency in Gen AI/LLM's.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We're looking for a Lead Product Manager specializing in Customer Support to join our team in Vietnam. You'll lead the charge in developing and enhancing our customer support products, driving transformation in our service offerings.

Get to Know the Role

As a Lead Product Manager, you'll be at the forefront of shaping our customer support solutions to align with business goals and customer needs. Your insights will steer our innovative service enhancements. You will report to Head of Product, Safety & GrabSupport and work onsite at the Grab HCMC Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will direct the product strategy for our customer support solutions, ensuring alignment with business goals.
  • You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product roadmaps and prioritize features based on feedback and market trends.
  • You will analyze customer data and support metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and make informed product decisions.
  • You will develop and maintain product backlogs, document user stories, and outline requirements.
  • You will manage the product lifecycle from conception to launch and beyond, optimizing the offering post-launch.
  • You will mentor junior product managers to foster a culture of innovation and customer focus.
  • You will conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and competitor strategies.
  • You will work closely with engineering to ensure product delivery effectively and efficiently.
  • You will present product strategies and performance to senior leadership and stakeholders.
  • You will consistently gather customer feedback to enhance product offerings.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 5 years of experience in product management, with a focus on customer support.
  • At least 3 years of experience in a customer support or similar role.
  • Proven success in launching and improving products.
  • Leadership experience in mentoring product teams.
  • Expertise in applying product management methodologies and best practices.
  • Proficiency in using customer support platforms and tools.
  • Advanced skills in data analysis and reporting.
  • Strong abilities in project management and cross-functional team leadership.
  • Expertise in strategic analysis and planning to lead product innovation by identifying trends, assessing competition, and crafting growth roadmaps.
  • Competence in customer journey mapping and optimization.
  • Understanding of customer support processes and industry standards.
  • Familiarity with SaaS or technology industry trends.
  • Proficient in articulating ideas and delivering engaging presentations.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

From detangling complicated use cases to delighting our customers, the Grab Support (GS) team provides customer support and solutions to in-country business units for multiple verticals. We aim to out-serve our users and turn their not-so-good experience into a memorable and delightful one.

Get to Know the Role

As the Regional Workforce Management Assistant Manager, you will report into the Senior Manager, Regional Workforce and Business Analytics and work onsite in the Grab Pasig City office.

You will play a vital role in a dynamic team dedicated to inspiring excellence in workforce planning and financial management. Your primary responsibilities will include creating Power BI reports that provide valuable insights into workforce performance. You will enhance overall performance through trend analysis, project management, and the implementation of inclusive engagement frameworks and accurate data management.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will create Power BI reports that deliver valuable insights into workforce performance, using data analytics to identify trends and support informed decision-making.
  • Your role will also involve maintaining accurate headcount and system records, ensuring data integrity.
  • As the administrator of the Workforce Management (WFM) NICE scheduling system, you will troubleshoot any issues that arise to ensure seamless operation.
  • You will lead workforce management projects and collaborate on initiatives for process improvement.
  • You will help provide workforce financial projections and monitoring operational costs to improve efficiency.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • We are looking for a Bachelor's Degree holder with at least 4 years of experience in workforce management report and analytics.
  • You are proficient in Tableau, Power BI, Advanced Excel (VBA)
  • You have knowledge of data programming (Python, R), and SQL on AWS/ Azure

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Singapore Operations team oversees, shapes and grows the business in Grab Singapore. We contribute to Grab's vision of being Southeast Asia's superapp by providing everyday services that matter most to consumers in Singapore. We develop business strategies that help us achieve our vision in serving our community. As part of the Singapore Operations team, the Singapore Deliveries Team oversees, shapes and grows the deliveries businesses, namely GrabFood, GrabMart, GrabExpress, and the latest addition is Grab's venture into the Dine Out space.

Get to Know the Role

You will sit within the OmniCommerce & Strategic Projects sub-team. The OmniCommerce team runs Grab's new vertical responsible for growing dine out solutions in the market. Our goal is to help restaurants on our platform drive sustainable growth by becoming their demand generation engine both offline and online, with a full suite of solutions - content & discovery, reservations, table management and ordering solutions, deals, loyalty, insights & CRM, payments, ads.

You will report to the Head of OmniCommerce & Strategic Projects, working on special projects cutting across the whole of the Deliveries business (not limited to OmniCommerce). You will work onsite in Grab One North Office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Identify and drive strategic projects for Deliveries & OmniCommerce, to deliver impactful outcomes for the business
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders incl. Product, Commercial and Operations teams to drive implementation of projects; own and be responsible for the delivery of project outcomes
  • Navigate product, operational and people constraints / challenges to achieve project objectives
  • Evaluate project outcomes and key performance indicators to measure success and identify areas for improvement
  • Conduct and present studies on strategic topics and coordinating of cross-business line plans
  • Prioritise and implement ad-hoc plans on short notice

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 5 years of experience in Management Consulting, Strategy or Special Project roles in tech companies
  • You have experience leading strategic projects with measurable outcomes.
  • Experience in project management, including initiation, planning, execution, and closing.
  • You can evaluate project outcomes and derive data-driven insights.
  • You can collaborate with cross-functional teams and manage stakeholders.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

How do creatives fit into Grab?

A creative at Grab will humanize technology for the very people it serves, creating work that adds meaningful value to both the community and the business. We will build a brand that is enduring, endearing, and proudly made in Southeast Asia. That's how creatives fit into a place like Grab.

Get to Know the Role

How do you fit into the Art Director role?

If you're an Art Director with 5+ years of experience and zero chill for mediocre ideas, we want you.

If "what's the idea?" is your love language, and Photoshop is just how you flirt, we want you.

If you can turn "hmm" into "what if" then "ohh, that's brilliant," we want you.

If you dream in colors and think in gold, we want you.

If you have the taste, grit, and grid, we want you.

If you have a great, idea-led portfolio across digital, Out-of-Home, and social media, we want you.

If you don't (yet), make one, and we still want you.

  • Turn Grab Transport and GrabExpress briefs into compelling creative communication across all channels.
  • Design compelling layouts and visuals to bring those ideas to life
  • Give clear visual direction to the designers
  • Collaborate with writers, designers, marketers, and business teams
  • Ensure every output is aligned with brand guidelines
  • Report to the Creative lead

  • Minimum Bachelor's degree from relevant majors
  • Eye for design: layout, color, typography, and composition
  • English proficiency both verbal and written
  • Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator)
  • Capability to turn briefs into clear, impactful visuals

  • Understand branding and visual consistency

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Regional Collections team is an experienced and diverse group responsible for driving collection strategies, training, quality control, data, and analytics across multiple markets and segments. We help maintain portfolio quality within set targets. We are committed to new ideas, collaboration, and delivering measurable results. If you're looking for a supportive environment where you can make a meaningful impact, we'd love for you to join us! Get to Know the Role We are looking for Assistant Manager of the Regional Collections Analytics, QC & Training team to support the team in the data-related processes as well as quality control and training related processes in the Collections area You will report into the Manager, Regional Collections Analytics, QC & Training and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will be responsible for all regular reports and ad-hoc collection-related analysis for all countries and monitor backend strategies and ensure operations are running in all 6 countries You will work with country collection managers and the data team for all collection related inquiries and targets. You will provide support in designing and accomplishing dynamic collection strategies for backend (late, DPD >90+) collections, ensuring qualified accounts are endorsed to the External CollectionAgency (ECA) monthly and tracking their repayment and performance. You will assist country collection managers in preparing and forecasting budgets, including the number of agents and collection activity costs (e.g. SMS, Telco, Incentive, LOD, among others). You will support the in other initiatives such as UAT for system migration and testing of new technology to enhance collection efficiency and customer engagement. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need You have a degree holder in a relevant field such as Finance, Business, Data Analytics, Computer Science, or related disciplines You have a min of 5+ years of working experience preferably in the Fintech industry or financial services. You have knowledge of credit risk management, debt recovery strategies, and legal regulations are good to have. You have a strong understanding of database structures and tools such as SQL, Power BI, and other data visualization or analytics platforms (e.g. Tableau, Excel VBA, Python for data analysis).   • You will assist country collection managers in preparing and forecasting budgets, including the number of agents and collection activity costs (e.g. SMS, Telco, Incentive, LOD, among others).
  • You will support the in other initiatives such as UAT for system migration and testing of new technology to enhance collection efficiency and customer engagement.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have a degree holder in a relevant field such as Finance, Business, Data Analytics, Computer Science, or related disciplines
  • You have a min of 5+ years of working experience preferably in the Fintech industry or financial services.
  • You have knowledge of credit risk management, debt recovery strategies, and legal regulations are good to have.
  • You have a strong understanding of database structures and tools such as SQL, Power BI, and other data visualization or analytics platforms (e.g. Tableau, Excel VBA, Python for data analysis).

Additional Information

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The Regional Public Affairs team reports directly to the CEO, and leads high-impact projects that align commercial and regulatory goals. The team partners with business teams and public sector stakeholders to drive initiatives that leverage technology for societal impact. This role provides direct exposure to senior leaders and an opportunity to work across diverse business areas to drive strategy.

Get to Know the Role

The Public Affairs team plays a critical strategic role at Grab. Given the dynamic and often intense regulatory scrutiny across the region, this team is essential in navigating complex landscapes, engaging with internal and external stakeholders, and developing proactive strategy. In this role, you will create high-impact change and work with a range of teams across SEA. This role is ideal for a strategy professional interested in the intersection of tech and public policy, offering broad exposure and the chance to create meaningful change.

You will report to the Head of Regional Public Affairs and be based in Petaling Jaya, with travel across Southeast Asia as needed.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

You Will

  • Manage end-to-end delivery of projects, from defining clear objectives based on complex business and regulatory needs, to coordinating with cross-functional teams and ensuring efficient execution.
  • Partner strategy teams on commercial initiatives, ensuring strategic alignment between Grab's business and regulatory goals.
  • Co-create with strategy and product teams to adapt business initiatives to the context of current and anticipated regulatory developments.
  • Develop and implement advocacy strategy, collaborating with country public affairs and regional business teams to meet public policy goals.
  • Work with country public affairs teams to analyze public policy issues, develop positions, and provide advocacy recommendations.
  • Orchestrate efforts across multiple Grab teams to address public policy topics cohesively in business operations.
  • Execute campaigns that drive thought leadership and dialogues on key topics, e.g. through planning of dialogues, forums, roundtable discussions, policy programmes etc.
  • Support building lasting relationships with governments, policy-makers, academics, NGOs, tech industry representatives, and other thought leaders in Southeast Asia and globally.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 6 years of experience in project management to oversee complex multi-stakeholder initiatives, from problem statement and objective development, to planning, to execution; ability to define a clear set of problems / objectives to solve based on ambiguous / complex asks
  • You have an interest in technology policy issues, including the ability to identify social and policy implications of business strategy
  • You can bridge business and government objectives, translating interests to common ground and developing creative approaches
  • You can translate perception challenges and goals into actionable thought leadership strategies and plans, encompassing key messages
  • You have experience navigating dynamic situations to prioritise tasks and time -
  • You have experience in complex stakeholder management to drive understanding and buy-in across diverse teams
  • You have experience presenting insights to senior leaders

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and our workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles—the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility—we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

Job Description

Get to know our Team

The Grab Financial Risk & Compliance team acts as guardians of risk and compliance for all the grab financial products within Grab. The data science team leverages our rich datasets to find solutions to problems ranging from payment risk prediction with sequence based models, detecting money laundering with graph algorithms, to image recognition for automated ID verification. Our team is also at the forefront of researching new methods to stay ahead of emerging fraud tactics, contributing to the creation of intelligent and secure products.

The Day-to-Day Activities

  • Analyze transactional data to understand the patterns and trends of fraudulent activities, using statistical and machine learning techniques.
  • Collaborate with business stakeholders to comprehend the operational impact of fraud and translate business needs into analytical requirements.
  • Develop hypotheses around fraudulent behavior, design and execute experiments, tests, and data analyses to validate these hypotheses.
  • Create, train, and deploy scalable machine learning models for transaction monitoring and real-time fraud detection.
  • Evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics and datasets, ensuring high accuracy and efficiency in fraud identification.
  • Deploy and maintain fraud detection solutions in production environments, continuously monitoring their effectiveness and making improvements as needed.
  • Contribute to the team's innovation efforts and intellectual property creation in the realm of payment fraud detection.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest research and advancements in Graph Neural Networks, Sequence / Natural Language Processing / LLMs.
  • Work closely with other data scientists, software engineers, product managers, and the financial operations team to integrate fraud detection systems seamlessly into Grab's platform.

Qualifications

Must-have:

  • 4+ years experience as a data scientist or PhD in computer science, physics, stats, or related quantitative fields.
  • Strong Python, SQL, and relevant programming skills. Familiarity with numeric libraries, containers, and modular software design.
  • Experience with running end-to-end data science workflow for production environment, e.g. knowledge of putting models into batch prediction and scheduling (like Airflow/Kubeflow)
  • Experience with standard machine learning libraries like Tensorflow / Pytorch, XGBoost / LightGBM, Sklearn.
  • Good knowledge of state-of-the-art DNN architectures and machine learning techniques and algorithms (graph neural networks, diffusion models etc..)
  • Good written and oral communication skills. Strong teamwork and interpersonal skills.
  • Self-motivated and independent learner, detail-oriented and efficient time manager in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment

Good-to-have

  • Experience with distributed, large data processing like pyspark.
  • Experience with developing DNN architectures like GNNs or sequence models.
  • Experience working on tracking and A/B testing setup and reporting metrics to business stakeholders
  • Usage of graph databases and graph neural networks in production environments
  • Experience with stream data processing (e.g. flink)

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab:

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive.
  • Embrace the magic of new life and create lasting memories with your family through Maternity and Paternity Leave.
  • Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
  • Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We’ve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

We deliver the greatest impact and ideas when we bring together diverse perspectives. It is what enables us to spread opportunities to Grabbers and our partners. It’s not a box-ticking exercise; it’s who we are.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Our Finance Team has multiple responsibilities which includes leading, auditing, accounting, and controlling our finances. We manage the business' money and producing financial statement of the business.

Get to Know the Role

Tax Compliance

  • Preparation and filing of all tax returns and submission of other schedules / reports to the Bureau of Internal Revenue (BIR)
  • Maintain accurate records and documentation for all tax-related activities
  • Ensure tax accounts are well monitored and up to date
  • Improve tax savings and compliance projects
  • Collaborate with finance and tax on several automation projects
  • Keep updated on latest tax regulations and issuance

Your role will directly report to the Manager, Finance - Tax. You will be based onsite at our Ortigas office with flexible work arrangements.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Manage BIR tax assessments

  • Coordinate BIR personnel and tax consultants
  • Ensure submission of documents, schedules and other requirements
  • Provide reconciliation during tax assessments. If needed, prepare company position paper and response letters.

Business Partnership

  • Collaborate with other finance professionals and business operations team
  • Provide guidance / explanation of tax concepts and requirements to clients and stakeholders
  • Support in the registration of branches and other administrative office with BIR

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Must be a graduate of Bachelor's degree in Accountancy (Certified Public Accountant license is required)
  • At least 4 years of experience and in-depth understanding of tax laws and regulations
  • Experienced in handling tax audits
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills
  • Detail-oriented with excellent organizational abilities
  • Possess project management skills
  • Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite
  • Experience using AI tools

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
