Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know the team

As a Senior Product Designer in the CX team, you will join a group of product designers, researchers and content writers who are defining the future of how people enjoy the Grab app from a platform level view. Based in Jakarta, you will collaborate closely with product managers, engineers, analysts and business teams in helping us define the Loyalty segment for our customers and enriching the program.

Get to know the role

You will own Product Design outcomes, practice and quality for a cross-functional Problem Space Team, with influence on adjacent teams. You will work in a highly collaborative fashion, exploring the needs of our users and creating impactful solutions for the business.

If you have a user-centric approach, and thrive in collaborative environments, then the Grab Design team is the place for you. We're looking for exceptional designers who are excited by the opportunity to have a major impact on how millions of people across Southeast Asia interact with Grab. You will be reporting to the Manager. The role will be fully onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Guide Product Design outcomes and set direction across teams; create complex, projects.
  • Build the right solutions - addressing value, usability, feasibility and viability, and any necessary trade-offs with minimal waste, while safeguarding goals.
  • Defend design decisions and convince senior partners.
  • Guide collaboration across domains, functions and teams; facilitate their agreement and efficiencies by increasing discussions, workshops and exploration.
  • Guide problem exploration, solution discovery and solution delivery across teams; display autonomy to work and navigate complexity independently.
  • Develop problem-framing approaches, establishing new starting points that lead to new kinds of solutions, not just execution, across teams.
  • Design simple solutions to complex problems; knit together multiple 'products' in an experience and unlocking new value.
  • Produce visual design that elevates the quality, consistency, and credibility of user experiences.
  • Use a variety of prototyping tools and methods to create interactive and realistic prototypes with complex functionality.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Provide a portfolio of your recent design work in English, showcasing your contribution and the impact of your projects. We recommend you provide clear context, outline your end-to-end workflow, and demonstrate how you go from problem discovery to launch.
  • 4+ years of Product Design experience.
  • Experience working on cross-functional product teams.
  • Solid fundamentals in interaction and visual design craft and practice.
  • Solid knowledge of mobile and front-end web standards and development.
  • Experience with Figma, Protopie, After Effects, or other design tooling.
  • Experience in Service Design, User Research, Front-end Development, Accessible Design or Design Systems.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_title: Principal Machine Learning Engineer, AI Platform (Model Customization)
job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The AI Platform team empowers Grab teams to harness advanced AI efficiently and effectively. By developing cutting-edge tools and infrastructure, the team democratises AI capabilities, fosters innovation, and scales AI-powered solutions to elevate Grab's products and services. Get to Know the Role As a Principal Machine Learning Engineer focused on Model Customization, you will report into the Head of Engineering, Machine Learning and Experimentation Platforms and work onsite in Grab One North Singapore office. You will lead initiatives in dataset creation, fine-tuning, optimization, and deployment strategies. Your contributions will drive rapid model customization for diverse business needs, positioning AI as a transformative force across Grab's operations. The Critical Tasks You will Perform You will develop and advocate for long-term AI strategies to embed advanced AI capabilities across Grab's business domains. You will drive initiatives for dataset development (including annotation and synthetic data processing), fine-tuning techniques (e.g., adapters, LoRA, PEFT), and optimization strategies like quantization, pruning, and distillation. You will apply the latest AI research to design scalable, production-ready systems that generate measurable business value. You will design pipelines to streamline model customization, encompassing training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring for operational efficiency. Collaborating with leadership, you will ensure organisational AI efforts align with strategic goals, identifying opportunities for impactful AI applications. You will mentor team members, cultivate innovation, and build technical expertise within engineering, research, and product teams. Qualifications What Essential Skills You will Need You have at least 10 years of mastery in deep learning, generative models, transformers, multimodal architectures, and reinforcement learning techniques. Proficiency with ML frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, or Hugging Face, enabling advanced model creation and deployment. You have experience with methodologies for fine-tuning models, such as PEFT, LoRA, and adapters. You are competent in optimising models through quantization, pruning, distillation, or other techniques to improve efficiency and performance reliability. You have expertise in dataset development, annotation frameworks, synthetic data generation, and evaluation methodologies, ensuring datasets meet model requirements for customization. You understand how to translate newly-published AI techniques into practical tools or systems that scale efficiently. You have Python proficiency and experience with processing libraries and frameworks such as Ray, Spark, or Dask. You have familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), containerization, CI/CD, and microservices architecture to ensure your implementations are scalable and maintainable. You have experience deploying AI solutions in user-facing products alongside product teams, balancing innovation with functionality to deliver tangible outcomes. You can mentor technical teams, foster a culture of learning, and inspire innovation in fast-evolving technical environments. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Job Description

Get To Know The Role

  • Manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue. You will be responsible for existing relationships with merchants to drive growth for GrabFood. You will lead elements of business identification, partnerships, account management, and execution strategy.

The Day-to-day Activities

  • Manage a portfolio of key restaurants with a focus on building lasting relationships and increasing profitability/revenue
  • Liaise with merchants for merchants funded promo program, merchant commission scheme, new products/features, etc
  • Identify bottlenecks and potential issues related to merchant operations and the content management process, and deliver solutions to these issues
  • Evaluate strategic and partnership opportunities, performing a broad range of quantitative and qualitative analyses
  • Analyzing data and develop initiatives to increase revenues/profitability for your portfolio and make decisions that builds strong operational performance for your accounts
  • Drive growth of key accounts, measured by deliveries and GMV
  • Work across functions to tailor merchant specific needs (e.g. customized reporting, marketing support, integrations)
  • Deliver business improvement projects to create value for both merchants and GrabFood
  • Drive operational excellence by working with the merchants and operations teams

Qualifications

  • Bachelor (or above) degree in Business/ Management or equivalent
  • Minimum 1-3 years (for an account manager role) or experience in sales, business development, partnerships or equivalent role
  • Experience in F&B industry is a plus
  • Excellent written and spoken communication skills in both English and Bahasa Malaysia. Ability to speak in other languages or dialects such as Mandarin is an added advantage
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to identify and provide comprehensive solutions for varying customer needs
  • Ability to fuse business, strategy, finance and legal concepts to lead complex, multi-faceted deals
  • Demonstrated ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations
  • Have a competitive edge and thrive in a team environment
  • Be very organized and communicate well
  • You must be a self-starter as we'll look for you to manage your own time and priorities here
  • Energetic, enthusiastic and calm even in a dynamic and fast paced environment
  • A highly independent and individual with excellent team-working skills

Additional Information

Our Commitment

We are committed to building diverse teams and creating an inclusive workplace that enables all Grabbers to perform at their best, regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity or sexual orientation and other attributes that make each Grabber unique.

The Fulfilment Tech Family is at the heart of allowing Grab to outserve our consumers and partners in different businesses and marketplaces across Southeast Asia. Our mission is to offer the best products and experiences to our driver partners as to increase adoption and engagement of our services. Improve driver partner opportunities and efficiency to fulfill consumer orders without fail, rain or shine. And to create efficient marketplaces by determining an optimal price that is both sustainable and loved by our partners and consumers.

Get to Know the Role

You will report to the Head of Analytics, Fulfilment and you will work closely with different teams within a business line (Product, Business, Engineering, Design and Data Science) to understand data requirements, identify key metrics, and provide data-driven insights. You will also work with stakeholders to evaluate the feasibility of new business/product ideas and provide appropriate recommendations.

  • You will drive impact: Drive significant improvements across our platforms, enhancing user experience, and contributing to our mission of excellence.

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 6 years in data-related or quantitative fields, with experience within D2C or B2C context such as Marketplaces, ECommerce, OmniCommerce, Retail Marketing Analytics, etc.
  • You can help solve complex problems, narrowing down multiple options into the best approach, and take ownership of open-ended ambiguous business problems. Propose novel solutions that go beyond common practice

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know our Team:

The Singapore Operations team oversees, shapes and grows the business in Grab Singapore. We contribute to Grab's vision of being Southeast Asia's superapp by providing everyday services that matter most to consumers in Singapore. We develop business strategies that help us achieve our vision in serving our community.

As part of the Singapore Operations team, the Strategy & Strategic Projects team is responsible for the Singapore Country Strategy and works on top agenda, high impact projects spanning across all the businesses in Singapore (e.g. GrabPay, GrabFood, GrabCar, GrabMart).

Get To Know The Role

In a hybrid work arrangement, you will report to the Manager, Strategy & Strategic Projects while supporting the Strategy & Strategic Projects Head and Team in conducting and presenting studies on strategic topics for Grab Singapore and coordinating cross-functional strategic plans, with the opportunity to work with senior executives for strategy brainstorming.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will ensure a well-coordinated Country Strategy for Singapore by coordinating with other Grab teams (both local and regional) and facilitating cross-team collaboration.
  • You will support planning and analysis of high-impact strategic plans, including conducting research and data analysis, identifying issues and solutions, and advising on practical implementation.
  • You will provide executional and project management support for strategic plans and support strategic discussions with external partners.
  • You will update senior management across multiple businesses.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You will have distinguished academic track record with a degree in Finance, Business, Economics, or Management.
  • 2-4 years in Analytics, Business Intelligence, Management Consulting, or Strategy roles in tech companies.
  • Experience in SQL and understanding of Python or R.
  • You will have experience to problem solve challenges, stakeholder management skills with experience to collaborate at all levels.
  • You have experience operating autonomously in a dynamic work pace and can understand and apply broad, long-term goals at Grab.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

The GrabFin Lending team sculpts the Go-To-Market (GTM) strategy for our wide array of partner lending programmes in Singapore. Reporting to Assistant Manager, Partner FS Ecosystem, we are inviting you to be part of our dynamic commercial team that helps catalyse growth throughout our partner lending ecosystem.

Get to Know the Role

If you are curious about driving data-driven solutions and a burning desire to democratise financial inclusion across marginalised segments, we believe you'll amalgamate well in our inspiring environment. You will be on a hybrid work arrangement.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Build comprehensive dashboards to track performance and main metrics across all lending programmes
  • Conduct data analysis to evaluate performance of business initiatives
  • Execute and streamline daily operations and administrative work across all lending programmes
  • Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders for business operations and marketing execution
  • Account management across partnering merchants (eg. Troubleshooting product issues, Communicating and respond to merchants queries)
  • Daily monitoring and tracking of inventory across all partnering merchants
  • Manage consumer experience by performing segmented market research to ensure lending programmes align with consumers' needs

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have minimally 3 years experience in Data Analytics, Business and Strategy.
  • You have strong proficiency in SQL and Excel.
  • You are comfortable working with large datasets, making use of graphs, models, and equations to delve into trends and derive actionable steps.
  • You have high levels of adaptability, comfortable with ambiguity and tight deadlines, and working in a VUCA (Volatile, Uncertain, Complex; Ambiguous) environment.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

In our Strategy and Analytics team, we are dedicated to applying data to drive strategic decisions for our Commercial and Support functions. We work with multiple teams and partners to provide comprehensive data insights that help us better serve our consumers and partners in the marketplaces across Southeast Asia.

Get to Know the Role

It takes a village to give a safe and delightful service to our customers. As things get more complex, "the village" needs experienced data analysts who can lift their head above the noise and guide us through data insights on what is best for our customers.

You will support data projects working with different teams across Grab with the purpose of giving our customers the best service in the world.

You will be directly reporting to the Data & Reporting Analytics Manager. You will be based onsite at our Ortigas office with flexible work arrangements.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Functional

  • You will independently assemble large and complex data sets that meet the business or analytical needs
  • You will build and deploy data models that help improve support experience
  • You will work with the Business or Operations Teams to understand their problem statements and conceptualize analytics frameworks that convert business problems into technical hypotheses
  • You will Design and recommend A/B testing to evaluate the model performance and provide interpretation of the experiment results, and provide data-driven recommendation
  • You will develop data insights and performance dashboards

Customer

  • You will have to be the radical advocate for our users on the quality of their experience with us above anything else
  • You will lead the charge: Influence and serve to deliver through others

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need:

  • We are looking for someone who has at least 3 years of data analytics experience
  • You have project management skills - track record in executing and delivering projects independently
  • You can work with partners across several organization levels and several cultures
  • Bachelor's degree with academic track record
  • Experience of analytical tools such as Power Apps, PowerBI
  • Knowledge in SQL to extract large disconnected datasets on Azure/AWS data platform
  • Knowledge of data programming (Python, R)
  • Familiar with User experience function and tools is good to have
  • Familiar with startup environment and understanding of dynamics between design, engineering, product and customer service

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.

  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Grab Support team provides 24/7 assistance to our Grab Partners, including drivers, passengers, and merchants, in using Grab's products. Our dedicated team handles service inquiries and resolves disputes, delivering exceptional customer service and promoting relationships.

Get to Know the Role

The position involves managing daily KYC operations, reporting directly to the Head. Key responsibilities include overseeing the adherence to KYC Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and ensuring compliance with Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) among team members. The role requires coordination to meet productivity and data quality targets, identifying and escalating operational issues as needed. You will be based onsite in Grab Jakarta office.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Daily Operations Management
  • The Position will report to Head
  • Oversee daily KYC operations, ensuring that the KYC Service Level Agreement (SLA) is tracked and monitored effectively.
  • Ensure all team members follow Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).
  • Team Coordination
  • Ensure that daily productivity and data quality targets are met by all team members
  • Identify operational issues and escalate them to the manager or relevant unit as necessary
  • Collaboration and Documentation
  • Collaborate with other units to facilitate KYC operational guidelines for team use
  • Work with other units to develop guidelines related to user challenges during the KYC process
  • Process Improvement
  • Initiate new strategies to enhance the efficiency of KYC operations
  • Data Confidentiality
  • Maintain the confidentiality of customer data at all times

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree with experience in KYC for minimum 5 years
  • Proven experience in managing KYC operations
  • Experience with KYC process and regulatory requirements
  • Ability to escalate issues appropriately
  • Ability to work collaboratively with different units to improve operational guidelines
  • Ability to ensure team adherence to SOPs and achievement of productivity targets
  • Commitment to maintaining data confidentiality

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team "Strategic work is rarely creative." If this statement sounds ridiculous to you, join the club. We're Looking For a Creative Director Who Has magical thinking and masterful craftsmanship, which he/she/they use to solve real business problemsand maybe win some awards. Champions doing what's right for the brand. Can turn the team into magical thinkers and masterful crafters. Has relentless optimism. Believes that good enough is not good enough. Can already think of 20 different ways to make this recruitment ad better. Get to Know the Role First, Let Us Introduce You To Grab Creative Studio Grab Creative Studio is spread across the markets in which we operate. The Singapore Creative Team is based in Malaysia, alongside the Regional and Malaysia teams, which means you'll be part of a big, sometimes noisy bunch :) We're responsible for building the Grab brand and maintaining its integrity across the region. Our mission is to build brand love in everything we do and create memorable experiences for our users through purposeful creative work. You will report into the Executive Creative Director, Regional and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will be co-leading the Singapore Creative Team with a copy-based CD, working directly with the Regional ECD and Country Marketing Leads. You will also have the opportunity to work on Regional projects on occasions. You will be responsible for setting and pushing the standards of the Creative team, ensuring that only the highest quality of visuals/copy that are on brand leave the door. You will be working and aligning with Marketing to develop strategies, tactics, and ideas that don't just meet the numbers, but also build the brand. As Grab is a fast-paced company, you will be managing multiple projects at any given time and working with Creative Producers to ensure the team is productive, motivated, and delivering work that meets your high standards. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

"Strategic work is rarely creative."

If this statement sounds ridiculous to you, join the club.

We're Looking For a Creative Director Who

  • Has magical thinking and masterful craftsmanship, which he/she/they use to solve real business problems…and maybe win some awards.
  • Champions doing what's right for the brand.
  • Can turn the team into magical thinkers and masterful crafters.
  • Has relentless optimism.
  • Believes that good enough is not good enough.
  • Can already think of 20 different ways to make this recruitment ad better.

Get to Know the Role

First, Let Us Introduce You To Grab Creative Studio

  • Grab Creative Studio is spread across the markets in which we operate. The Singapore Creative Team is based in Malaysia, alongside the Regional and Malaysia teams, which means you'll be part of a big, sometimes noisy bunch :)
  • We're responsible for building the Grab brand and maintaining its integrity across the region.
  • Our mission is to build brand love in everything we do and create memorable experiences for our users through purposeful creative work.
  • You will report into the Executive Creative Director, Regional and be based in Petaling Jaya, working onsite.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will be co-leading the Singapore Creative Team with a copy-based CD, working directly with the Regional ECD and Country Marketing Leads.
  • You will also have the opportunity to work on Regional projects on occasions.
  • You will be responsible for setting and pushing the standards of the Creative team, ensuring that only the highest quality of visuals/copy that are on brand leave the door.
  • You will be working and aligning with Marketing to develop strategies, tactics, and ideas that don't just meet the numbers, but also build the brand.
  • As Grab is a fast-paced company, you will be managing multiple projects at any given time and working with Creative Producers to ensure the team is productive, motivated, and delivering work that meets your high standards.
  • You will be leading the design and development of effective communications and brand campaigns, which include digital creative work such as online display ads and in-app comms as well as customer experience design.
  • You will be providing guidance for the juniors, together with other senior Creatives in the Regional Creative team.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • You have at least 12 years of agency experience, where you have led and executed large integrated campaigns (including for digital marketing).
  • You must submit a portfolio that showcases your excellent visual design and conceptualisation skills.
  • You have strong technical knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, especially Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign.
  • You have formal design training in art or other design disciplines, plus a working knowledge of copywriting.
  • You have strong communication skills in managing stakeholders from all levels.
  • You have experience not just in managing art directors and copywriters but also in guiding the team to produce excellent creative work consistently.
  • You have experience in managing workflow for the development of multiple creative assets.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

Welcome to Grab's Financial Services Team - a dynamic, group improving financial services. We're transforming services from digital payments to insurance, making them accessible and efficient. We're not just a team, but a community united in driving Southeast Asia forward. Join us in redefining the future of finance.

Get to Know the Role

The Marketing Specialist for Lending at Grab supports the growth of Grab's lending products. You will help develop marketing plans, implementing marketing campaigns, and analyzing their performance. You will report to Lending Marketing Lead within this role and will have hybrid working arrangement.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

Support Product Marketing Strategy (30%): Help develop and implement marketing strategies for Grab's lending products. This includes conducting market research, competitive analysis, and assisting in business planning.

Campaign Execution (30%): Help plan and implement marketing campaigns to grow user acquisition, engagement, and retention. This includes managing campaign logistics, tracking campaign performance, and making necessary adjustments to meet goals.

Performance Analysis (20%): Help analyze product performance and market trends to identify opportunities for product enhancements or new product development.

Stakeholder Management (20%): Help manage relationships with all partners, including partners and vendors, to ensure successful execution of marketing strategies.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 1 year of experience in a marketing role in the financial services or FinTech industry. Experience in lending product marketing.

  • Experience working with a cross-functional team. Experience coordinating with Product, Sales, and Customer Service teams would be beneficial.
  • Analyze campaign performance, market trends, and product performance. Familiarity with marketing analytics tools and platforms would be advantageous.
  • Experience managing marketing campaigns or projects, including planning, execution, and performance tracking.
  • Market plans and results to team members and stakeholders.
  • Proficiency in using marketing software and tools, such as CRM systems, email marketing platforms, and social media management tools.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and our workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading superapp. We are dedicated to improving the lives of millions of users across the region by providing them everyday services such as deliveries, mobility, financial services, enterprise services and others. More than that, we provide the opportunity for them to have a better life. And that aspiration starts inside Grab because we believe in a seamless blend of work and home life, making every aspect of life better for all.

Guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles—the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility—we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia. With our unwavering commitment to our values, we believe that we're more than a service provider; we're agents of positive change.

Job Description

Get to know the Team

You will be part of the pioneer marketing team in a new & rapidly expanding market, to witness first-hand and actively contribute to the exciting growth of Grab, in making everyday essential services more accessible to the masses, safely & securely. Marketing team is a highly motivated team responsible for building the Grab brand through brand and promotional campaigns that persuade, excite and build brand loyalty among users and identifying and strengthening strategic opportunities with cross-departmental teams and external partnerships.

Get to know the Role

In your role as ‘Marketing Supervisor’, you will be responsible for leading Cambodia and Myanmar's Country GrabFood Marketing team and Creative team in designing and directing communications deliverables that include partnerships, ATL/BTL advertisements, marketing creative campaigns, activation ideas, customer experience design, and end to end process of consumer-first promotions. Your job scope also covers collaboration with various business and operations leads in identifying growth opportunities for the company.

Key Responsibilities

Marketing planning:

  • In-line with the overall business strategy, support the Marketing Head in developing the Marketing strategy and campaigns
  • Understand business performance in terms of trends in demand and supply and provide appropriate recommendations in the Marketing strategy
  • Study and give ideas and directions on marketing campaigns based on successful international marketing campaigns

Campaign Management

  • Develop marketing briefs with clear communication objectives and timelines, and based on key insights
  • Collaborate with the Creative Team to identify out-of-the-box, memorable campaign ideas
  • Identify appropriate target audiences and channels such as In-App, Social Media, Email, Web, and key opinion leaders (KOLs) pages.
  • Track and optimize campaign performance in terms of reach, engagement and conversion across all channels.
  • Articulate performance of communications in marketing campaigns and provide insights on the local market, industry trends, and competitor activities to recommend and develop strategies that meet the constantly evolving business landscape

Marketing Operations

  • Collaborate with internal teams such as Mobility, Mex/Deliveries, Operations, and Customer Experience to ensure marketing campaigns are executed efficiently, accurately, and effectively. (if required, will also have to be in charge of internal and external stakeholders for assigned projects.)
  • Monitor, plan and execute consumer in-app communications, promotions and rewards using Grab's internal tools and systems, in collaboration with the Marketplace team.
  • Monitor, plan and execute house ads/paid ads inside of the Grab app with the regional GrabAds team.
  • Organize and coordinate company or partnership events, on-ground activations and digital events.
  • Work with vendors for delivery of marketing materials and assets for consumers and partners.
  • Assist with localization and reviewing regional content
  • Track and analyze the effectiveness of promotions to provide insights in order to improve offers and to drive business results.

Qualifications

Requirements:

  • Energetic and enthusiastic; embracing opportunities to thrive in a dynamic & fast-paced environment.
  • Insanely creative, open minded, daring and hungry to create campaigns that are memorable
  • Able to work independently. Can multi-task comfortably to deliver on agreed deadlines.
  • Highly detail-oriented to ensure quality of marketing messages across all communications channels.
  • Great interpersonal skills to communicate well with stakeholders.
  • Bachelor degree preferably with a focus on Marketing, Advertising, Communications, Public Relations and/or Business Administration.
  • 3-4 years of relevant marketing experience with a track record in planning integrated marketing strategies and executing campaigns.
  • Working knowledge of reporting software and office/presentation tools (Google Slides, Excel & Google Sheets, Word).

Additional Information

Benefits at Grab:

Benefits

We care deeply about your well-being and are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • Protect and provide for your loved ones with peace of mind, knowing we have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • Craft a benefits package that suits your unique needs and aspirations with GrabFlex, because we believe in empowering you to thrive.
  • Embrace the magic of new life and create lasting memories with your family through Maternity and Paternity Leave.
  • Life can be overwhelming, but you're never alone. Our confidential Grabber Assistance Programme is here to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Your well-being is our priority. Benefit from our holistic well-being initiatives through Wellbeing@Grab, including health programmes, informative webinars, and vibrant carnivals.
  • Achieve a harmonious work-life balance with our FlexWork arrangements, allowing you to adapt and thrive in your personal and professional life.

We’ve got many different benefits hyper localised in each country. Speak to your recruiter during your interview to find out more.

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique. If you require accommodations to fully participate in the recruitment process, you are encouraged to include your request(s) when applying.

We deliver the greatest impact and ideas when we bring together diverse perspectives. It is what enables us to spread opportunities to Grabbers and our partners. It’s not a box-ticking exercise; it’s who we are.

job_summary: Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to know the team As part of our Grabber Technology Solutions team, the Lead IT Service Improvement Specialist will play a crucial role to ensure continual improvements of our IT services across Grab. This role requires a strong understanding of IT Service Management (ITSM) best practices, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to collaborate effectively with various IT and other service delivery teams. This role is based onsite at Grab's office in Kuala Lumpur, and you will be reporting to the Senior Manager of Service Management Office. Job Responsibilities Process Ownership: Own and drive the effectiveness of GTS Service Request Management, Incident Management, and Problem Management processes. This includes ensuring adherence to processes, identifying areas for optimization, and implementing improvements. Data Analysis and Reporting: Develop and maintain service management KPIs and reports to monitor the performance of our IT services. Analyze data to identify trends, root causes of issues, and opportunities for service improvement. IT Service Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within GTS services to enhance performance, quality, and business satisfaction while minimizing service disruptions. Service Catalog Management: Manage and maintain the IT service catalog, ensuring it is accurate, up-to-date, and effectively communicates the services offered by GTS. Knowledge Base Governance: Govern the knowledge base, ensuring its quality, relevance, and accessibility to the GTS team and our users. ITSM Platform Business Analysis: Act as the business analyst for incoming enhancements and changes to our ITSM platform (Freshservice), gathering requirements, documenting them, and working with technical teams for implementation. job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know the team

As part of our Grabber Technology Solutions team, the Lead IT Service Improvement Specialist will play a crucial role to ensure continual improvements of our IT services across Grab. This role requires a strong understanding of IT Service Management (ITSM) best practices, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to collaborate effectively with various IT and other service delivery teams.

This role is based onsite at Grab's office in Kuala Lumpur, and you will be reporting to the Senior Manager of Service Management Office.

Job Responsibilities

  • Process Ownership: Own and drive the effectiveness of GTS’ Service Request Management, Incident Management, and Problem Management processes. This includes ensuring adherence to processes, identifying areas for optimization, and implementing improvements.
  • Data Analysis and Reporting: Develop and maintain service management KPIs and reports to monitor the performance of our IT services. Analyze data to identify trends, root causes of issues, and opportunities for service improvement.
  • IT Service Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within GTS services to enhance performance, quality, and business satisfaction while minimizing service disruptions.
  • Service Catalog Management: Manage and maintain the IT service catalog, ensuring it is accurate, up-to-date, and effectively communicates the services offered by GTS.
  • Knowledge Base Governance: Govern the knowledge base, ensuring its quality, relevance, and accessibility to the GTS team and our users.
  • ITSM Platform Business Analysis: Act as the business analyst for incoming enhancements and changes to our ITSM platform (Freshservice), gathering requirements, documenting them, and working with technical teams for implementation.

Qualifications

At least 8 years of experience

  • Strong understanding of ITIL framework; particularly in Knowledge Management, Service Request Management, Incident Management and Problem Management.
  • Experience developing actionable ITSM dashboards using PowerBI or other tools
  • Experience in data analysis to identify and drive service improvement initiatives end-to-end
  • Proven experience in ITSM and managing ITSM platforms (e.g. FreshService, ServiceNow, etc.).
  • Experience in problem solving methodologies (e.g. Agile, Kaizen, etc.).

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Grabber Technology Solutions (GTS) aims to be a technology leader that provides predictive and seamless experiences to all Grab employees (Grabbers). We are a diverse team of technology practitioners looking to outserve Grabbers with positive, personalized IT experiences, and we are looking for individuals with similar customer-centric and innovative values to join our growing team.

Get to know the role

The Senior Manager, Workplace Technology leads the strategy and operations for deploying workplace technologies across Grab offices. This includes developing a best-in-class workplace technology roadmap and ensuring all systems are secure, scalable, and aligned with business goals. The role covers a range of technologies such as physical security systems, AV solutions, and IOTs. The ideal candidate will drive innovation to enhance employee experience, increase operational efficiency, and maintain high standards of safety and compliance. You will be reporting to the Head of Corporate IT.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategic Product Manager: Drive the product roadmap and workplace technology strategy in partnership with stakeholders and cross-functional teams. Focus on AI-first solutions that support business goals, with emphasis on security, compliance, and scalability.
  • Technology Management: Oversee the deployment, configuration, and maintenance of workplace technologies, including physical security systems, environmental sensors , AV solutions, and automation tools for building systems.
  • Operations & Infrastructure Management: Lead a team to manage end-to-end workplace technology operations, including budget planning, asset lifecycle management, service delivery, and support for platforms owned by the department.
  • Vendor Management: Manage technology vendors to ensure high-quality support and service delivery, in alignment with defined KPIs and SLAs.

  • People Manager: Manage a high-performing team by assessing capacity and skills, aligning resources to business needs, and partnering with HR and leadership to support staffing decisions.

Qualifications

Qualifications:

  • At least 8 years of experience in technology consulting and enterprise or digital architecture, with a strong focus on workplace technology systems.
  • Knowledge in physical security technologies, AV/VC systems, and IoT sensor networks.
  • Fundamental understanding of automation technologies (Workato, UiPath, Knime, etc.) and AI technologies (Gemini, OpenAI, etc.)
  • Knowledge of cloud technologies and services across AWS, Azure, and GCP..
  • Proven ability to influence senior stakeholders backed by strong communication, collaboration, and stakeholder management skills.

  • Occasional travel may be required to support office locations.

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

We're a high-performing team of passionate, fun-loving, and individuals with varied backgrounds who come together to support a common mission: enable Grab to deliver faster, better, and more efficiently with every roll-out. Our team members are spread across various countries, managing multiple initiatives to deliver features that touch the everyday lives of millions of customers across Southeast Asia through Grab. Our team fosters a collaborative and inclusive culture, emphasizing innovation and excellence.

Get to Know the Role

As a Technical Program Manager, you will manage a portfolio of complex, cross-functional projects from start to finish, primarily focusing on how Grab serves businesses across SEA. Working closely with stakeholders, you will plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate with cross-functional partners. Reporting to the Senior Technical Program Management Leader and working onsite at Grab HCMC office, you will bridge various Engineering and business teams, working with people from all parts of Grab to deliver impactful features.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • You will manage project timelines, define milestones, track and report progress, identify risks, and resolve impediments to ensure project success.
  • You will collaborate with cross-functional teams of Engineers, Product Managers, Designers, Analysts, and QA to deliver programs successfully.
  • You will serve as the primary interface for complex programs that span multiple engineering organizations, ensuring alignment and transparency.
  • You will coach teams on various delivery frameworks and methodologies best suited to their execution needs, promoting continuous improvement.
  • You will drive roadmap planning and prioritization processes, ensuring strategic alignment and efficient resource utilization.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • At least 5+ years of experience managing Agile software projects with proven delivery and technical leadership.
  • Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and experience leading cross-functional teams.
  • Solid technical background in software development, enabling effective collaboration with engineering teams.
  • Experience with risk management — anticipating, mitigating, and resolving project risks.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, including experience working with senior leadership and cross-functional teams.

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to Know the Team

You will be part of GrabAcademy, the Training & Partnerships team dedicated to provide holistic learning and development support for our driver-, delivery-, and merchant-partners.

The role co-leads the Grab SkillsFuture Queen Bee initiative, a nationwide upskilling programme launched by SkillsFuture Singapore (SSG). Through this initiative, Grab supports Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in the Food Services, eCommerce & Retail sectors to bridge skills gaps and meet their needs.

Additionally, you will be involved in training facilitation and delivery, marketing, business development and related activities to create meaningful impact for our partners, consumers, and the community.

Get to Know the Role

You will report to the Head of Training Strategy and Partnerships, at the Grab Tampines office, to lead the implementation of skills, training solutions and interventions to achieve business growth and transformation for the network of Grab partners and SMEs within our value chain.

Responsibilities

  • Lead research on industry landscape and market trends, including working with multiple stakeholders within and beyond Grab, to understand critical skills requirements, project future skills demand and business objectives
  • Diagnose the skills gaps and needs and identify measurements of the success of the network
  • Formulate a training needs plan by identifying skills and training opportunities, reviewing existing skills and training solutions and interventions, sourcing for new and/or developing bespoke skills and training solutions and interventions to address the needs of industry and Grab's business verticals
  • Leverage Skills Frameworks and relevant SkillsFuture resources in creating the skills and training solutions and interventions
  • Develop an implementation plan and organise the participation of Grab partners & SMEs in the network
  • Manage and foster relationships with multiple stakeholders to ensure effective and sustainable implementation
  • Evaluate the effectiveness of the skills and training solutions and interventions and fine-tune the long-term implementation plan.

This role is based onsite in the Grab Tampines office.

This is a 2 year renewable contract position with the possibility to convert into a full time employment.

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

The Must-Haves

  • Bachelor's Degree and above
  • You have at least 10 years of professional experience, with learning & development and project management experience
  • Certification in ACTA/ACLP
  • Excellent facilitation skills to deliver engaging and impactful training sessions

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

job_description_formatted:
Company Description

About Grab and Our Workplace

Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.

Job Description

Get to know our Team

When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on millions of lives on a daily basis. We are empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve millions of passengers, driving partners, and fellow Grabbers.

Get to know the role

This role is required because we are expanding our regional infrastructure security capabilities. In return, you will work with a great team working on complex architectures and managing cloud security of one of the largest cloud deployments in the region. You will report to the Engineering Manager IIand be based onsite at Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.

The Critical Tasks You Will Perform

  • Solve defined problems by building components/features with 3+ years of codebase expertise
  • Ensure reliability via design reviews, monitoring, and OE standards
  • Write clean, maintainable, well-tested code using proper data structures/algorithms
  • Give and receive constructive code review feedback
  • Proactively resolve issues and communicate updates
  • Secure container environments and enable quick vulnerability remediation
  • Implement vulnerability detection in build pipelines to block production risks

Qualifications

What Essential Skills You Will Need

  • Proficient in deploying public cloud services in AWS, Azure, or GCP.
  • Comfortable to code in at least one high-level programming language - Java, Python, or Golang
  • Experience with Computer Science fundamentals in algorithms and data structures.
  • Committed to maintaining a set of software engineering skills.
  • Understanding clean architecture principles.
  • Experience with web frameworks and understanding of RESTful APIs.
  • Knowledge of Kubernetes for container orchestration and management

Additional Information

Life at Grab

We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:

  • We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
  • With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
  • Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
  • We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
  • Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

What We Stand For At Grab

We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
